Reader's Choice
1312212.content:
There was no reason for Texas to have lost. By all accounts, she was the superior gunslinger between the two of them. With out unevenly matched they were, it wasn't even a fair competition. Georgia's pride had gotten her to sign off in a challenge that she couldn't possibly win. It would take nothing less than divine intervention for her to come out on top.

At least, that's what Texas thought.

As the two of them went for their guns, something happened that ruined what was supposed to be the sheriff's moment of triumph. Her hand darted for the holster and she went to yank her gun free... only for it to get stuck. That momentary flounder hindered her for just long enough for Georgia to pull out her gun and take aim. After a few tugs, Texas managed to free her gun only to have it blown away mere seconds later. She yelped and fell to her knees as she clutched her stinging hand.

The once confident woman stood completely frozen, her mind reeling from the shock of what just occurred. She lost in a gunfight. She lost in a gunfight. And not just to anyone, but to Georgia, the slowest marksman she had ever known. There was no way that could possibly be the case. How could Georgia beat her, but do it fair and square? If she had cheated in some fashion, then Texas could almost forgive the embarrassing loss, but that wasn't how it went down. She just got outgunned... by Georgia.

As Texas sat stewing in the muck of her defeat, Georgia was soaking up the adulation of her goons as they watched the whole thing unfold from the windows of the sheriff's office. She had often fantasized about this exact moment playing out and it was even sweeter than she thought it'd be. Now everyone in town knew who was the better woman. No one would ever question her authority after today. All that was left for her to do was claim her prize.

The cruel mare whistled a hardy tune as she gradually walked over to Texas who still sat staring at her hand in shock. The former sheriff was so stunned by what happened, she didn't even notice Georgia approaching until she was in arms distance. She was brought out of her trance by the sound Georgia clearing her throat and she looked up to meet her gaze. As her replacement leered down at her with a sinister grin, it finally occurred to Texas just how frightening she was.

"Any last words before introduce you to your new life?" she snickered.

"B-best two out of three?" Texas stammered with a hopeful smile.

"Nope"

With that addressed, Georgia turned her back to Texas, letting the mortified weasel soak in the image of her enormous rear end. From where she sat, Texas could already smell the rank fumes immigrating from her crack and a wave of fear induced nausea washed over her. She wasn't sure what Georgia had in store for her, but she didn't need to be a mind reader to know that she would never get to enjoy the taste of fresh air ever again. After Georgia sufficiently frightened her former rival, she hooked her fingers into her waistband and lowered her tight black jeans onto the ground, exposing her sweat soaked ass.

"Mayor Vivian's been running me ragged all day. I've been on my feet for a while now, so you'll forgive me if I smell a little rank" she said with a grin as she looked back at Texas, a shiver running down her spine as she drank in her fear.

“G-Georgia, please… don’t…” Texas whimpered as she fell back with her hands out in a pitiful attempt to stave off what was to come.

“Really, Texas? Are you really trying to get out of our agreement? I expected better from someone as honest as you” She teased as she wiggled her smelly rump in front of her face.

Texas tried to think of a something she could say to rebuke her, but she knew that Georgia had her dead to rights. The incorruptible lawman prided herself on her integrity, and as such never went back on a promise or an agreement. She had staked everything on her ability to outshoot Georgia and came up short. As sick as it made her, she had no choice but to abide by her personal code of ethics.

“Y-yeah, b-but--”

“Ah ah, I don’t wanna hear it! The only ‘but’ that you should be concerned with is the one in front of you!” Georgia chided.

Texas’ eyes widened to the size of dinner plates as Georgia jumped up into the air and came down onto her butt aimed squarely at her face. As she came crashing down, Texas opened her mouth to scream, but it would end up being a huge mistake as her mouth was soon filled with the taste of Georgia’s sweaty ass flesh. The impact completely flattened her and left an ass-shaped groove where she once stood. Everything was dark and her senses were completely dominated by the metric ton of rank horse booty.

While she was in absolute hell, Georgia was in a state of pure euphoria as she ground her massive flank on top of her long time rival, revelling in every crack and squelch that came from beneath her.. After years of playing second banana to her goody-goody boss, she couldn’t think of a more fitting way to celebrate her promotion.

After grinding her into the dirt for almost half an hour, she stood up to admire her handiwork. Texas’ face was frozen in a look of utter horror, her flattened body all but glued to Georgia’s meaty flank. The pitiful sight was enough to make the heartless mare bust out in laughter, though she wasn’t quite satisfied yet. She needed to make sure that Texas really knew where her place was in life and she knew just how to do it.

She grabbed Texas by her paper thin ponytail and slowly peeled her body off of her butt before holding it up in front of her face. The crushed weasel whimpered helplessly she looked at Georgia with pleading eyes. She prayed that there to be a sliver of mercy buried deep down in her ex-deputy’s heart, but it was for not as Georgia snickered at her expression.

“Don’t give me that look. You’ve had this comin’ for a long time. All those years I spent bein’ your lacky are gonna come back to haunt ya, because now things are gonna be different around here. I bet you’re expecting me to lock you up now, right? For me to haul you over to jail so you’ll never have to see my face again? Oh, if only you were that lucky. Nah, I got somethin’ better in mind for you, Texas. Startin’ now, you’re gonna be my deputy!” she cackled.

Texas’ gasped and her eyes went wide once again. Back when Georgia worked for her, she would often throw out snide remarks about what she would do if the roles were refused. She paid no mind to it at the time, but now her comment took on a terrifying new light.

“N-no! Please! Anything but that!” she wailed.

“Scream all you want, but it’s already been done. While I was gettin’ ready for our showdown, I called up Vivian and pitched her my idea. It took me a while to sell her on it, but then I told her a brief rundown one what the job entails. After that, she thought you were perfect for the job! Speakin’ of which…”

She grinned from ear to her as her other hand grabbed onto Texas’ dangling legs and stretched the flattened weasel out as much as she could.

“I think it’s about time you got started!”

With that, she whipped Texas' stretched out body between her legs and began using her to floss her rancid buttcrack. She hit every nook and cranny, leaving no part of her crack untouched. This went on for some time before she grew bored with the game and decided to bring it to a end. She bent her knees and pulled on Texas’ body as hard as she could, wedging her so deep into her crack that she could feel her face pressing against her pucker. The smelly mare bit down on her bottom lip as she let loose an earth shattering fart directly into Texas’ face.

Georgia sighed in content before pulling the former sheriff out of her sweaty crevice, her smile widening she admired her handiwork. Texas was absolutely soaked in her sweat and judging by the weary, glassy eyed expression on her face, it was clear that she had all but given up on resisting. Georgia snickered and unceremoniously deposited her new deputy into the back of pants before pulling them back up and giving her right cheek a slap.

“Welcome aboard, deputy! I’m sure you and I are gonna along juuuuust fine…”

With that business settle, she happily trotted back to the office with her prize pressed tightly against her ass.

“Mmm… today was a good day” Georgia mused before letting out another brassy fart.
1312212.title: Georgia shoots the gun out of Texas' hand!

13122121.content:
"Deputy! Where the hell is my drink?!"

"S-sorry boss!"

Live wasn't easy for the former sheriff turned deputy. Her new position called on her to wait on Georgia hand and foot, acting more as a servant rather than her partner in law enforcement. She would have cook her meals, wash her clothes, serve her drinks, give her back and foot massages, and so on. That was the part of the job that she could almost tolerate.

When she wasn't serving her boss, Georgia would use the poor woman as her plaything. Texas would be stomped flat, sat on, and chewed up, with little to no warning or provocation. This cruel treatment used to only happen whenever Texas tried to assert herself, though it wasn't long before the fight had been thoroughly beaten out of her. She grew to truly fear Georgia, more so than even her most sycophantic of underlings and it was this fear that kept her stepping out of line. Not that it really helped all that much. Georgia had demonstrated many times that she didn't need any justification to abuse her hapless deputy.

That day had been particularly draining for Texas as she was tasked with massaging Georgia's naked rear while she laid flat on her stomach. Every few minutes she would blast Texas in the face with a noxious fart which she was required to inhale in deep breathes. Not only that, but the heartless sheriff actually expected Texas to serve her drinks while massaging continuing to massage her butt.

Texas soon stood before her boss with a big fake smile permanently decorated onto her face and a bottle of whiskey in her outstretched hand. She had been reprimanded for not being cheerful on the job and had to force herself to smile at every waking moment of they day. Georgia nodded her head in approval before snatching the drink out or her hand and downing the whole bottle in one quick shot before letting out a belch that rattled the windows of her office.

“Your response time has been lacking as of late, Texas. This job isn’t getting too hard for ya, is it?” Georgia asked with a tone of mock concern.

“N-No! Course not! Ah love mah job!” Texas’ said hastedly.

“That’s all well and good, but I can’t in good conscience allow you to carry such a harsh workload” Georgia said as she rolled off of her lounge chair and onto her feet. She surprised her laughter as she looked down at her deputy’s horrified expression.

“You don’t gotta worry none, Texas. There are plenty of folks in these parts who’d be happy to pick up the slack for ya”

“Boss, no…!” Texas cried as she trembled violently.

“Sorry, but I’ve made up my mind. Get your stuff packed up while I go sign your pink slip” Georgia said sternly before she began walking over to her desk. She was stopped mid-stride as Texas lounged forward and latched onto her ankle, her eyes wide and her expression conveying intense emotional distress.

“Please don’t fire me, Georgia! Ah promise ah won’t be so slow no more! Ah’ll work twice as hard and ah won’t never complain!” she wailed.

Georgia grinned down at her once respected rival. One could be forgiven for assuming that Texas had actually grown to enjoy her job, but they’d be wrong. When Georgia saddled her with the position of deputy, she wanted to make sure that there was nothing for her to go back to should she rebel. She did this by making sure that every act of violence, extortion and strong arming done to the good people of Gold Springs were done under the orders of the deputy.

Or course, Texas would never commit such heinous acts even by proxy, but that didn’t stop the townsfolk from thinking it. They were quick to turn on their once noble protector, viewing her with more scorn and disdain than they did any criminal. As bad as it was working for Georgia, Texas knew that she was the only thing protecting her from a town full of people who wanted her head on a pike.

“Hmm… well… I guess I can give you another chance. But if I see you slacking off even once, you’re outta here! Get me?”

Texas sighed in relief and wiped the sweat from her brow. “

“Thanks Georgia…”

“I’m sorry, I didn’t quite catch that. What did you just say?” Georgia asked as she narrowed her eyes.

“I-I said, ‘thank you so much, Boss’!” Texas said with as wide a smile as she could manage.

“That’s what I thought I heard. Now. It’s gettin’ late and I need to get some paperwork done. You know what to do” Georgia said as she pointed a thumb at her massive office chair.

Texas didn’t even hesitate as she crawled over to the chair and laid down squarely in the middle. She wasn’t a stranger to this kind of treatment and while she never quite got used to it, she was just grateful to have not been fed to the proverbial lions. Georgia smiled at her excellent response time and got into position, her naked rear hovering precariously over Texas’ body. No longer did she beg Georgia for mercy like she used to, but she could still feel the fear radiating off of her as she awaited her fate.

Georgia decided to forgo her usual teasing as she had quite a bit of paperwork to get through. She brought her massive rear down onto Texas with a satisfying *squish* and after grinding her but back and forth to get herself comfortable, went to work. She shivered in delight as she felt Texas' tongue lapping up the sweat from her meaty flank, desperate to have her approval under the threat of termination. Her hard work was rewarded with a quick but powerful fart directly into her face, though that didn't deter Texas in the slightest as she continued to service her boss' rear.

"Mmm, that's it... keep at it Tex, and you just might make employee of the month!" Georgia cooed condescendingly as she glanced back at her butt.

This routine would carry on for years to come, with Texas playing her part as Georgia's servant, waiting on her hand and foot while inhaling more of her rancid body odors. Eventually, Texas' mind began to break down from the constant abuse and she began to legitimately enjoy her job. She became Georgia's loyal slave, happily serving her boss and performing any task asked of her no matter how degrading. Gold Springs became a hive of criminal activity as Vivian established her absolute control over it and it wasn't long after Georgia retired to her new estate built at the edge of town. No one would ever see Texas again, though those brave enough to get within five feet of Georgia's home swear that they would occasionally see her and Georgia lounging out on the lawn, the former sheriff resting her head on her arms while Texas happily rested her head between her owner's colossal buttcheeks. Such talk was disregarded as rumor, but Georgia did nothing to deny it when asked.

13122122.content:
"Now my new deputy lets let you soak up my stink for a good while I explain your new duties to you."

Texas groaned under her ass, how could this have happened? The entire world was upside down.

"You'll be doing a lot of ass licking and worship as my new deputy. You see you'll be more of a moral officer than anything else. Now don't that sound nice?"

No it didn't... it sounded horrible! Her muffled cries were music to Georgia's ears.

"But that's not all you'll be doing of course! You see you are going to be below me in every possible way and the lowest part of my body, my feet, are going to be where you will be at the most!"

With that she got up off of Texas who breathed in some clean air only for it to be immediately fouled up by Georgia's foot being pressed down on her nose and mouth.

"Get a big whiff! Yeah sniff it bitch!"

It was so gross and rancid, and the idea of being under them all day was a literal nightmare. She wanted to cry but didn't want to give her former deputy the satisfaction.

"I'm not hearing sniffing, do it, you have no choice! Or do you want to smother under my ass for the rest of the day?"

Texas couldn't handle that so quickly complied and sniffed up the gross cheesy stench. She coughed and the cruel female above her laughed in triumph.

"You know as fun as this is, lets get an actual audience. Come now deputy crawl behind me as we make our way to the center of the town."

With no choice but to obey she crawled after her tormentor and soon the entire town turned out to see what was going on. Georgia let the crowd gather for awhile and went it got to the right size she announced what was going on.

"Today is the day this town has a new sheriff! And today is the day Texas here becomes my deputy. I'm going to demonstrate to all of y'all just what this little bitch will be doing from here on out. Well? Let's go plant the first of many kisses on my smelly feet!"

The crowd gasped in surprise. Was this really going to happen? Yes it was! Texas crawled her much smaller frame forward and then began kissing Georgia's feet. This went on for several minutes.

"Oh but don't think that's all she'll be doing. Why don't you go ahead and lick them all nice and clean you silly weasel."

Texas whimpered she really didn't want to do this but she knew she was beaten and didn't have a choice. She stuck out her tongue and began lapping at the broad and now dirty soles of her opponent's feet. She hated how she was now in this inferior position. She still couldn't believe she had lost. And the taste... it was so awful!

The crowd was now starting to laugh and jeer at her. How quick the tables turned!

"You silly girl, what are you doing?"

"Do her feet taste good?"

"By golly I bet those feet reek!"

The humiliating taunts and phrases hurt Texas to the core of her soul. She felt less than the dirt she was licking up.

"Ooh that's nice, yeah get every little crevice and inch of my foot. What a good little foot lapping girl you are! You know what they say, idle hands are the tool of the devil. Why don't you massage one foot while you lick the other!"

The cruel suggestion was put into action and now Texas had to rub one stinky foot while licking the other. Her entire world had shrunk down to the new sheriff's feet. The odor hadn't gotten much better despite her diligent cleaning. The air was still full of the vinegar stench of sweaty feet.

"Enough for the moment my loyal deputy. Why don't you tell the crowd how weak you are. How I'm the better shot and how you love serving me!"

"Please... please don't make me say that." Texas asked in a quiet pleading voice.

"Do what I say! You whiny weasel, I own you! Do you want to be back under my ass?? Get to it!"

With no choice Texas loudly proclaimed what had happened.

"I lost... she's the better person for the job. I failed as the sheriff. She's the better shot. Georgia owns me. I'm going to be her deputy and serve her every day of my life."

The crowd lost it, they laughed and mocked her even more. Her once proud visage was now full of shame, embarrassment and despair. All Texas wanted to do was curl up into a ball and block out the sounds of their mockery.

"Well I'm sure you've all been quite entertained but I need to be heading back home and really putting my deputy to use. So ta ta for now, you'll be seeing me around I'm sure."

She waved the townsfolk off and told Texas to crawl after her. Once more she was on all fours following behind the new sheriff and her new master. She had been stripped of her position, humiliated, sat on and been forced to clean nasty feet. That was in public.. what would the cruel monster do to her in private?

"Ah home sweet home. You know you'll be doing all the little household chores around here when you aren't serving my feet. I sometimes let this place go a little so you might have to give up some sleep for the first few nights as you'll need to be serving me directly when I'm awake."

Could this nightmare get worse?

"All right time to sit and relax on my recliner while you properly worship my feet. I don't just want you to lick and kiss 'em I want you to really get into it. Make me believe they are the most wonderful tasting morsels you've ever tasted. Make me believe you think their smell is heavenly. Get to it before I have to punish you!"

Obeying the commands had now become second nature and she quickly bent to the awful task. The feet had gotten dirty again from the trip to the house and the taste of dirt soon coated Texas's tongue.

"Come on more enthusiasm! And thank me for teaching you your place!"

Texas redoubled her efforts to please the sheriff. She took long broad licks and planted french kisses on every part of her foot.

"Thank you so much Georgia! I should have been at your feet the first time we met. Thank you so much, they are just delightful. I love your feet, thank you for teaching me where I belong!"

"Hahaha ain't life grand?"

Texas of course would disagree but she didn't have that luxury. Instead she continued to serve at the feet of her former lackey. Her sense of self diminished as she debased herself from the amusement of Georgia!

131221222.content:
Georgia was enjoying life but Texas really wasn't that good at foot worshiping. Probably wasn't her fault since this was the first time she had to do something like this but Georgia wasn't about to tolerate no excuses!

"You call that foot service? Pathetic!"

"I'm sorry Georgia, I'm trying my..." Texas's statement was interrupted by a rather vicious kick to her face.

"Don't you dare use my name like we are friends, you will address me as ma'am or boss from now on. Is that clear?"

"Yes ma'am." Texas replied meekly. She was terrified of what Georgia would do to her if she didn't instantly comply with her demands. "I'll try to do better boss."

"Yes you will but first you need to be punished for your incompetence."

Georgia pulls Texas across her lap and begins to spank her something fierce. The poor weasel cried out in humiliation and in pain as Georgia showed her rear end no mercy! After at least a hundred powerful smacks from the mare she was pushed to the ground.

"Now apologize."

"I'm sorry for not taking care of your feet better boss."

"Good, now keep worshiping them until I say stop, and put some feeling into it!"

Texas tried, she put on a fake smile on her face and pretended to greedily lick her soles like they were the sweetest tasting pudding. It was hard since she hated every second of it. Georgia was amused at her pathetic groveling and attempts to avoid further punishment, ah life was good for her.

The sun was going down and it was now about 7:30. Most folks stayed up until about midnight and then rose up at 8:00. So it was a surprise when Georgia said. "All right, bed time bitch."

"It isn't even 8:00 though ma'am." Texas protested.

*SLAP* In an instant slap to the face sends Texas to the ground. Georgia's foot engulfs her face as she pushes down on it adding pressure to her mouth and nose.

"Never disrespect me again! Never challenge one of my instructions again! You will go to bed like a disobedient baby every day at 7:30. Now go crawl to your room and go to sleep!

Texas again meekly obeyed and crawled away. She got into bed and cried, she wasn't tired despite the exhausting day, it was too early to go to sleep! Instead she tossed and turned for hours before finally drifting off.

That morning she was given some gruel to eat on the ground out of a bowl and then she was taken back into the town square. There Georgia once again sat down and demanded a massage. Of course this attracted a rather large crowd of curious onlookers.

"Tell the public how much you love serving at my feet."

Texas, now totally shamed spoke up so people could hear her.

"I love serving your feet Georgia! This is the highlight of my day. Thank you for letting me massage your feet, it makes me so happy to know that I'm helping you feel good."

The crowd thought this was quite amusing. Texas pushed her thumbs into the arches of her owner's feet, rubbed all over the soles and rubbed her toes. Sadly for the former sheriff her efforts simply were not good enough for Gerogia.

"You call that a massage? Pathetic! You must want to get punished!"

Georgia stomped down on Texas's body with her feet. She focused mostly on the breasts and stomach as she didn't want to knock her slave out but a few milder strikes targeted the face.

"You like that bitch!? You like how everyone in the town is laughing at you for being such a fuck up. That's it cry for me, cry in front of the whole town you weak little baby!"

The mocking laughter and the pain were too much for poor Texas. She was broken as her body unleashed a torrent of tears. Her sobs were loud and pathetic as the whole town realized the sheriff was all hat and no cattle. She was pathetic. The people she used to bring to justice walked up now and laughed at her as she sobbed on the ground.

"Y'all want to use her whore mouth? She's not that good at worshiping feet and could use some practice but I bet it will still be fun for you."

And fun it was. The villains of the town throughout enjoyed making the once uppity sheriff thoroughly clean their feet. They mocked her and spat on her and told her she was scum. Texas started believing it was true. What kind of sheriff cleaned the corrupt citizens of a town in full view of everyone? She was pathetic.

"I'm sorry, I'm so sorry for trying to interfere with your lives. Please forgive me." Texas begged as the townsfolk laughed and jeered.

She spent the day licking feet clean, massage and worshiping. At one point she had a known cattle rustler's feet down her throat while massage another criminal's foot as a third sat on her stomach waiting for her turn. It was sheer hell. Hours in the hot sun servicing dirty, sweaty and foul feet. She wasn't even given water to drink, Georgia just had townsfolk spit in her mouth for hydration.

Finally it was time to return to her new home. Georgia was very pleased with how worn out and pathetic her slave looked. Of course her day was not complete, it was time for her feet to be serviced now!

"Kiss every part of them, worship them. Then you can get started on sucking each toe individual, give them lots of attention you foot slut. And smile, I want to see your face bright and cheery as you pay homage to your Master's feet!"

Texas knew she was being conditioned to obey and accept her place. This knowledge did nothing to ease her sorrow and shame. For the hundredth time she cursed her failure in defeating her one time deputy. As she lapped at Georgia's soles she realized that this was only the second day of her servitude. How much worse were things going to get?

After an hour on her knees it was once again 7:30.

"Time for bed, no crying or you don't get breakfast tomorrow. Go crawl into bed."

Texas obeyed but again, sleep was difficult. As she closed her eyes and tried to will her tired body to pass out she heard Georgia on the phone.

"Oh yeah things are going quite well."

Laughter.

"I plan to. No I don't expect she'll try to escape, she had no where to go and she knows I'll skin her if she tired."

"Oooh now that's an idea. She sucks as massages anyway so losing her paws wouldn't be that big of a deal."

Terror spiked through Texas's mind. Was she talking... amputation? She didn't know if Georgia was being serious or if this was some kind of sick mind game. Georgia probably knew Texas couldn't get to sleep that early... but still. It worried her. She vowed to get better at massaging feet with her hands.

This was her life now. She needed to be the best possible slave she could be to avoid permanent harm to her body! With that chilling though she cried herself to sleep.

1312212221.content:
That night Texas was tormented with nightmares of being a limbless circus freak. She woke up frightened multiple times panting and in a cold sweat. It was awful.

That morning she was given gruel to eat from a dog bowl again and Georgia questioned her.

"Why did you scream last night?"

"I'm sorry boss, I did not realize I did. I had... nightmares."

"About what?"

Scared and embarrassed Texas told her about overhearing the conversation and how it had given her nightmares.

"How dare you eavesdropped on my conversations you disrespectful lackey. You serve me, you don't spy on my conversations."

"I wasn't try to spy, its just that the walls are thing and..."

Georgia interrupted her words with a kick to the face followed by a hearty stomp to her already sore ribs.

"Shut up!" The mare pressed her bare solo onto Texas's face making sure she couldn't open her mouth to speak.

"You are getting too damn lippy, quit being difficult. For the crime of spying on me you'll be punished. Just so that you know, I was talking with your old friend Roxxie Roo on what fun things to do to you. I wasn't really going to cut off your limbs you stupid fool. Why would I cripple my new slave? Your massages could use some work but you'll get better. I certainly don't want to have to take care of you as a useless cripple, you'll be the one who does all the household chores and work around here. So get that stupid thought out of your empty brain and worry more about how you are going to be punished for your transgression!"

She was relieved she wouldn't have her limbs taken from her! Roxxie Roo was such an awful person though, she and her had butted heads a long time. She was a corrupt outlaw and they had fought for years back and forth. The thought that she had some say on what was going to happen to her was a scary thing.

"Such a frightened little girl, Roxxie is going to have so much fun playing with you today."

Texas let out a little whine but didn't dare speak out against it happening.

"Aww little baby afraid of getting punished, well you should be. Roxxie is on her way over and she's bringing a few things we are going to use on your disrespectful ass. While we wait for her massage my feet and get yourself prepared. Once she walks in the door you will crawl to her, kiss her toes and then humbly apologize for ever giving her a hard time. Do I make myself clear, girl?"

"Yes ma'am." Texas replied.

Texas massaged to the best of her ability for 30 minutes until her arch rival arrived. Not wanting even further punishment she crawled over to Roxxie Roo and kissed her toes.

"I am so sorry for all the things I've done in the past. You were always the better woman, please forgive me for my improper behavior ma'am."

Roo laughed and laughed. "Holy shit Georgia you got this little bitch trained already!"

"Ehh not yet but soon. She was eavesdropping on us earlier so we're going to use your toys to teach her not to pull that shit again."

Roxxie grinned broadly as she opened her bag and pulled out cane and a paddle. Texas shivered a bit, both devices looked quite mean.

"Bend your ass over the table here, its time for your punishment."

Texas bowed her head, "Yes ma'am." And stiffly got into position. Roxxie had the cane and s he gave a firm whack to her ass caused her to flinch badly. The second strike was even harder and it elicited a sharp cry of pain.

"Hahaha, look at the tough law woman now. Remember when you arrested me for tax evasion? Little petty shit charge like that really ruined my day. Well now I'm about to ruin yours!"

*WHACK* *WHACK* *WHACK* Three strikes in rapid succession from the criminal led to further cries of pain from Texas.

"Now now Roxxie don't take all the fun, its my turn too!" Georgia instructed and began slamming the broader spanking implement into Texas's already pained rear end. The pain wasn't as concentrated in a narrow band like the cane was, but the blow struck her entire ass all at once. Texas honestly wasn't sure what was worse!

She was crying freely now as the two alternated in beating her. Her skin was raw and blistered from the combined assault from the two of them. Texas began sobbing and begging for mercy as the two laughed at her.

"Yeah let me hear your cries, little bitch!" Roo in particular liked hitting her as hard as she could.

After they hit her a few more times, just to teach her that her begging wasn't the reason they stopped, they let her collapse onto the ground. Her nose was runny and her ass and face were red. Tears coated her fur and she looked an absolute mess.

"Now time for you to worship 4 feet at the time time, cunt!" Georgia demanded and they had Texas lay down on the ground while they both sat in chairs with their feet propped up on her face.

They pressed their feet hard into Texas's face. Texas was forced to lick their soles and suck on their toes. At times they even playfully smothered her beneath their feet. Something that terrified the poor girl.

"Tell us who calls the shot around this town?"

"You do ma'am, Georgia and Roxxie call the shots."

"That's right and are just our lackey, our slave, our foot licking chore monkey. Ain't that right?"

"Yes boss."

The two laughed some more and continued forcing her to worship their feet. Time passed slowly for Texas as she served the two but eventually the hours started to catch up to them.

"Oh look here, its 7:00, time for bed time."

"Yes boss." The fight had completely left Texas, she couldn't even protest or argue.

Texas planted one last kiss on each of their toes and then crawled to bed.

"That's right do what your mommy tells you to do." Roxxie laughed as Texas obeyed her owner. Texas flushed with shame and wanted so badly to attack her but she was the weaker woman. Georgia had taught her that, her fate was to obey her betters.

As she crawled into her room and into bed she overheard the two chatting. She tried to block it out as to not get in trouble for "spying" on them again but she couldn't help but hear Roxxie's comments to Georgia.

"Damn girl you really have her under foot. She didn't even try to fight back or argue against going to be at 7:00. She even let me, her hated arch rival, cane her ass until she was practically bleeding. She'll have welts for days. You really are stronger and smarter than she ever was. The town is going to be yours to control for as long as you want it."

That was a chilling thought. Texas believed in law and order and it was clear the two villains who had beat her did not. She was beaten down and utterly destroyed physically, mentally and emotionally. But could she truly allow the town she loved to fall to ruins without at least trying to fight back against her new master? Could she?

13122122212.content:
Texas was in no condition to fight back, not only was she physically weaker having to subsist on gruel and ingesting dirt and pathogens from nasty feet she was also mentally in a shattered and depressed state. There wasn't much fight left in her, and certainly not enough for a physical confrontation.

That morning she was once again worshiping Georgia's feet. Her tongue snaking in between her toes and her lips paying homage to her new boss.

"You know foot slut I've been thinking. You might not think what's happened to is all that fair so tonight I'm going to have the town decide who will be the new sheriff. We'll hold us a good old fashioned election. If you win then you'll be done with my feet but if I win this it for the rest of your life. Aren't you glad you have a chance to win back your position?"

"Yes ma'am." Texas automatically said while continuing to kiss and lick her toes.

"Only been a few days and your training has come along so well. You know exactly how I like to be addressed and your food cleanin and servin abilities have improved. This is really your rightful place and after today you won't be questioning it. Now, stay on your knees and keep worshiping my feet for the next couple of hours and then its time to to back to the town square."

***

Later that day Georgia arranged it with the mayor. They were each going to give a speech in front of the town and then the town would vote that day. Texas saw light at the end of the tunnel, surely the town would recognize all the good she had down? Surely they would see what an awful person Georgia was and vote against the mare. She had hope and Georgia saw that in her eyes, instead of being mad she was ecstatic, seeing that hope die would be such a turn on!

Texas was the first to give her speech. She begin by talking about how she had reduced crime and made sure the people were safe and...

"YEAH BUT YOU LICK FEET!" Roxxie interrupted. The crown tittered and giggled as Texas looked embarrassed and uncertain.

She tried to shake it off but now she was off her game and stuttering as she tried to get through her plea to elect her.

"Speaking isn't your strong suit Texas, your mouth was made for licking my feet." This time it was Georgia who interrupted. She didn't shout out as loud as Roxxie but everyone heard her and everyone had seen Texas licking Georgia. More laughter and mummer of general agreement. Clearly Texas's mouth wasn't meant for public speaking!

Completely derailed now Texas ended quickly before she could be embarrassed any further. As she walked away Roxxie began chanting "Foot slut, Foot slut, Foot slut." Almost everyone in the crowd joined her and Texas returned to her seat utterly mortified. It was Georgia's turn now but before she went up she grabbed Texas by the ear and pulled her to where Roxxie was sitting.

"Sit in her lap while you listen to a real woman of the world speak!"

Georgia begins her speech and she is eloquent and poised. Texas could see she had the crowd eating out of the palm of her hand and needed to do something. She opened her mouth to heckle her like she was heckled only to have Roxxie to cover her mouth with her paw and shush her loudly.

"Shhh no talking, here let me rock you back and forth little baby girl." Roxxie mocked as she prevented Texas from speaking. The people around her laughed and pointed and Georgia grinned at the team work she and Roxxie had.

Texas tried a couple times more but each time she was shushed like a little child. In the end she gave up trying to interfere and just sat there and hoped the townsfolk could see how wrong all of this was! They had to!

Finally it was time to vote and the mayor began to count the votes. Vivian smirked as she looked through the votes, the town wasn't a big city so it didn't take that long.

"Well folks this is a new one! For the first time ever, this town has elected a new sheriff with a unanimous vote!" Texas waited with baited breath, had the entire town seen through Georgia's lies?

"Congratulations Sheriff Georgia!"

Texas collapsed to the ground. She didn't get a single vote? Not one vote?

Georgia thanked the crowd and promised to be a great sheriff. "Also feel free to step by the sheriff's office anytime you like. If my little foot girl ain't working on my feet y'all are free to use her anyway you want!"

The crowd roared in delight and began chanting. "GEORGIA! GEORGIA GEORGIA!"

The mayor walked up and said a few words. "Now I'm going to pin the sheriff badge on our wonderful new sheriff. I think it is fitting that while I do so, her stupid useless pea-brained opponent come kiss my feet and then her owner's feet. What say you people of Gold Springs?"

"Yes!"

"Do it!"

"Texas is such a loser!"

"Make her suck your toes!"

Texas had no fight in her and pathetically kissed the feet of the mayor who smirked down with amusement. And then she kissed the now familiar feet of her former deputy. Georgia accepted the badge and then attached a leash to her now lifetime lackey and foot bitch.

"Thank you townsfolk, now I'm going to go home but before I do please line up, I'd like to shake your hand, paw or whatever and then this little weasel here can kiss your feet. She's the lowest bitch in this town, and she should pay homage to her superiors!"

The crown loved it and Texas ended up kissing the feet of every single person who voted against her! Most made remarks about how wonderful Georgia was and how pathetic Texas was in comparison. Shame and humiliation filled Texas's body to the brim. It was the worst day of her entire life.

Texas crawled behind Georgia as they went back to her place. Her knees and hands hurt but she didn't dare complain.

"Unless we are in a hurry, you'll crawl when we go into town. Got it, you lazy foot licking piece of trash?"

"Yes boss." Georgia intoned.

"What a good minion. I honestly thought it would take me awhile to fully break you, but your all done aren't you? Your too scared to fight back. Your too ashamed at how the town views you to even think of yourself as a normal person anymore. This is what I wanted but wow, this wasn't even a challenge."

Texas felt tears well in her eyes. Georgia was right, this was pathetic. She was pathetic.

When they arrived home she had to massage her owner's feet. It was around 8:00 so the foot massage didn't last long before Georgia ordered her to bed.

"I will always win at everything, and you will always lose. Now go to bed like a naughty little child. You wretched little baby, I can't believe you couldn't even get one pity vote from someone in the town. What a wimpy loser. Go on, git. Got bed while I chat with my friends on the phone about how easy it was to make you my bitch."

Texas obeyed feeling lower than she had ever been in her life! Her fate was sealed, there was new sheriff in town!

131221222121.content:
Texas woke up to another day of hell. She was fed gruel and had to thank Georgia by kissing her feet and repeating.

“Thank you for feeding me boss. Thank you for teaching my place ma’am.”

Georgia delighted in showing her former employer just where she fell in the pecking order of things. After the feeding and humiliation Georgia decided that it was time to play a new game with Texas. For this game she trussed her slave up in a classic hog tie, her feet left inches in front Georgia’s face.

“Today I’m going to show you that even the air you breathe is mine to give or to deny. Let’s start with some nice loving foot worship, and for your sake it had better be impeccable.”

Texas didn’t quite know what her owner meant but she quickly replied, “Yes ma’am” and got to work licking the large soles of her ruler. Her tongue caressed the arches and every inch of her feet. Her mouth suckled on her toes and ensured every bit of the foot was paid attention to.

“Well I’ll be darned; you are actually taking care of my feet pretty much perfectly. But you know I still want to play with you, and what the boss wants, the boss gets!”

Texas was in a horribly uncomfortable and helpless position. Georgia soon made it worse by gagging the former sheriff with her used handkerchief and then tied it in place. She returned to her seat and then casually placed her toes in front of Texas’s nostrils.

“My feet smell nice, don’t they? Tell me you love them.”
