14.content:
April Briggs knew from the moment her alarm clock rattled to life at the crack of dawn that something was off. Maybe it was her city-slicker senses, but she knew today wasn't going to be an ordinary day.

That feeling only continued to build when she arrived at the sheriff's office and found it suspiciously empty. Usually Texas would have already been here for an hour, diligently studying crime reports and trying to find out who might be behind them.

The deputy kicked into detective mode as she sniffed around around her boss's office, her fox nose acutely picking up the scent of something... exotic. April was new to this city, but not that new; Texas's workstation reeked of the land down under, and she knew that Roxxie Roo must be involved.

"Aw, varmints." April said out loud, unconsciously picking up one of her boss's mannerisms. "I guess I gotta save the day today."

----------------------------------

April knew from previous run-ins with the detestable kangaroo that she was most likely roosted in her old hideout, a small shack on the edge of town with a stable designed to hold her unruly horse, Buttserscotch.

"How should I do this?" she thought to herself. "I can stay silent, sneak in undetected, scope the place out and find out where she's holding Texas. Then I can break her free and we can take on this stupid marsupial together."

"Or..." she instinctively reached down and felt to make sure her pistol was in its holster. "I could burst down the front door with the element of surprise and hold her at gunpoint. There's no way she wouldn't give up Tex's location if she were staring down my barrel."
14.title: Texas is missing! It's up to April to save ...

choices: Go for the broom closet!
Jump in the laundry chute!
141.content:
The sun had still not quite risen from the slumber of night, and it was under the cover of early dawn that April descended upon Roxxie's hide-out.

The old shack sat next to Butterscotch's stable, and a lit lantern resting in front of the door told the deputy that the house was occupied. She knew from her days of dealing with hostage situations that entering through the door was a death sentence; if she wanted to remain undetected, she needed to slip in through the window.

April scampered across the lawn and hopped through an open window, right into the hallway. She immediately noticed that Roxxie wasn't exactly the cleanest kangaroo in the west, as the floor was covered in old food packages and discarded articles of dirty clothing. She was always impressed by how much the gigantic crook managed to disgust her.

The thumping noise of approaching hops began to shake the foundation of the hallway, and April knew that she had to hide quick. As far as she saw it, she had two options; she could either try cramming herself into the broom closet, or hop into the laundry chute leading to the basement.

The hops grew louder and louder, and April knew that she had to decide fast or she would be mincemeat.
141.title: Play it sneaky: Try to avoid detection and find...

1411.content:
April quickly decided that the broom closet was her best best, and she scampered silently over to open its door. Much to her displeasure, the handle was a squeaky old thing that clearly hadn't been oiled since its installation. She struggled to turn it enough to throw open the door without notifying the approaching kangaroo to her presence, but she finally managed to do it.

April began pulling the handle and prepared to jump in, expecting to find a nook she could cram herself into. She was met with an unpleasant surprise when the door swung open and a group of dirty mops that had been propped upon it fell outward, smacking her in the face and crashing to the ground with a loud clatter.

"Oi, what was that??" came Roxxie's voice from another room.

April's face turned pale white. Her position had been given away.

Suddenly the hops started speeding up rapidly, and they grew closer at an exponential rate. April's heartbeat spiked as she saw the kangaroo turn the corner, her gigantic body moving at a breakneck pace.

"If it isn't April!" Roxxie called to the fox, who was now sprinting in the opposite direction as fast as her legs could carry her. "That was a bad call opening the broom closet. Looks like you're gonna get SQUASHED, mate!!"

April's body slammed into an exit door and her hands flung themselves onto the handle in a desperate attempt to pry it open. Much to her horror, the doornknob snapped off in her arms, leaving her standing in front of an unbudgeable piece of wood. She turned around just in time to face the kangaroo rapidly closing the gap separating her from being smushed.

"Oi, I couldn't be happier right now!" Roxxie exclaimed as she turned her behind to the deputy and hopped backwards, sending her enormous butt flying towards the door. "I get to do this TWICE today!"

The door burst open from the force of the gargantuan marsupial slamming against it, and then it landed on the sandy ground outside with a thud. On top of its frame, Roxxie's bum completely buried poor April, flattening her into a mushed pancake spread across the door's surface.

"Oh, that's the ticket..." the villain laughed to herself as she felt her weight fully settle on the helpless deputy, squishing her beyond belief. The poor fox couldn't regret choosing the broom closet more than she did now.

After what felt like hours, the kangaroo finally stood up off the squelched mammal and reveled in her accomplishment. She had pressed poor April so hard that the deputy was now a sticker on her front door. She looked almost like she were some kind of cartoony halloween decoration.

"What a lovely new addition to my house!" Roxxie laughed as she stood up and tried to jam her front door back in place. "I think I'll keep you on there as a warning to any other law officers that think they can snoop inside MY hide-out!"

-----------------------------------------

THE (BAD) END!
1411.title: Go for the broom closet!

choices: April pops her head out for long enough to take a quick breath
April keeps her head down and tries to stay conscious
1412.content:
April wasn't sure why, but something about the broom closet seemed like a trap. She decided instead to opt for the laundry chute along the wall. She figured to herself, "Hey, it's clear from this hall full of old underwear that she doesn't use this thing."

April was wrong.

For a terrifying three seconds the girl was dumped and submerged into what felt like a tub of used underpants. She gagged out loud as she dug her way out, each movement forward brushing ten pairs of dirty undergarments against her face. Her nose wouldn't have an easy time forgetting the distinct smell.

Just as April was about to climb out of the laundry, she heard the door to the basement swing open and realized she was going to need to stay hidden. She had to force herself to sink back into the disgusting clothes a bit to avoid being spotted.

The deupty's fox ears perked up, listening intently for the hops coming down the stairs. She was surprised when, instead, she heard what sounded like the footsteps of leather boots rather than the hops of a kangaroo. She peeked her eyes up a little and realized that she was looking at none other than Georgia.

"Are you sure the stable is gonna be able to hold Texas while we're both away?" Georgia shouted back to the kangaroo upstairs as she continued her descent. "I'd hate to have her slip out of our hands before we can have our fun with her."

"No worries mate, Butterscotch is keeping a close eye on her!" came the reply.

April struggled to breathe with her nose buried in the used underwear, and it was getting more and more difficult to bear with each passing second. She was concerned that the near-toxic fumes all around her could knock her out if she didn't peep her head out for fresh air soon. She sure didn't want to find out what would happen if Georgia spotted her, though.

"Sheriff Georgia..." the mare said to herself as she loaded her six-shooter and looked at herself in the mirror. "I like the ring it has to it. Hope Roxxie doesn't mind playing deputy."

April was losing it. The disgusting stench was far too much to bear, and she knew she had to take a breath soon. But could she risk it??
1412.title: Safety... for now!

14121.content:
"GASP!"

The sound of April's lungs struggling to cram in as much fresh oxygen as possible came out way louder than the fox had expected.

"Huh?"

Georgia's eyes lit up with a predatory ferocity as she realized she might not be alone. April had to put all of her energy into resisting the temptation to scream in terror at the fact that the gargantuan mare was now onto her.

"Is that an intruder, trying to foil our plans?" she asked, her long nose scanning the room for any sign of the invader. "I know from the fact that I can't see you right now that you're much smaller than me... you'd better hope your hiding spot isn't goo obvious..."

The horse threw open a few cupboards and began digging through them, and April watched her do so from the holes in the laundry hamper. Georgia leaned forward as her hands swept the contents of the shelves to the side, and in doing so unintentionally showed poor April just how enormous her infamous rump was. The villain's girthy buttcheeks swayed back and forth as she cleared out more possible hiding spaces, almost taunting the fox with what she would have to deal with were she caught.

"Wait a second..." Georgia laughed as she stopped her search and turned around, her body now facing the hamper April was crouched within. "I would've heard the stairs squeak if you had come down that way. You MUST have came through that blasted chute!"

April realized she could no longer safely hide here, and the stillness of the scene jumped into action as she tried to scamper out. Roxxie's dirty underpants scattered all over the room as April's emergence from the basket sent them flying as if a volcano were erupting. She darted right for the stairs, but she only got halfway up before she felt a hand grip around her leg and start yanking her down.

"No, please, no, I'm sorry!" April shouted as her head thudded on each stair she was dragged down. "

"No dice, foxy!" Georgia shouted as she pulled the tiny deputy over to her wooden chair like a ragdoll. "You're about to get SAT ON!"

------------------------------------------------

"NO, PLEASE, ANYTHING BUT..."

April's screams for mercy were converted to desperate "MMMMPHS" as the enormous mare's disgusting butt engulfed the surface of the chair, smothering her beneath a rump ten times thicker than her own body. She had thought an up-close encounter with Roxxie's dirty underwear was an unpleasant experience, but having her face packed between her gigantic foe's asscheeks as she could hear the smug victor's jeering taunts proved to be way worse.

"Oh, excuse me, I'm so rude." Georgia laughed as she felt the powerless fox squish underneath her like a grape. "I interrupted you. What was it you didn't want me to do?"

The fox couldn't even entertain a reply; her lips were buried so deeply in the rippling fabric of Georgia's tight shorts that they weren't capable of doing anything of struggling. She was no longer able to fight back in any way; she had been turned to a chair.

"How excellent, we got both you and your dumb sheriff on the same day..." Georgia commented to the twitching hand jutting out from underneath her plump bottom. "I think I'm gonna go do the same thing to her right after this..."
14121.title: Squish.

choices: April wakes up staring at Roxxie and Georgia!
April wakes up still with the underwear.
April wakes up in the dryer!
14122.content:
April held on for dear life surrounded by the awful stench, she desperately needed air but it would mean being discovered by these titanic tormentors. "Come on Georgia that town's waiting." Roxie said in anticipation. "Ok hang on I've got to take care of all my panties!" Georgia said. "Just throw em on mine and you can wash em later." Roxxie said. April heard what was said and started to panic internally!

April peaked an eye out of the mountain of soiled underwear just in time to see a landslide of horse panties collapse on top of her. "Ugh the bin is full! I'm only halfway done!" Georgia said angrily. "What do you think your gargantuan rump is for? Crush it down girl!" Roxxie said. Meanwhile April was gagging in disgust as the new panties were stained with sweat and... other things. Georgia started crushing the pile with her hands first to get it lower, this act just mildly inconvenienced April as she was forced down as well. Next Georgia plopped her butt down on the stack with tremendous force. This absolutely creamed April flattening her instantly! Georgia ground her rear back and forth driving the pile down. April groaned as she was ingrained into varies fabrics of the panties belonging to the fat women. Georgia got up and examined her handy work, the underwear had been crushed into a smelly cube like what trash compactors do. Satisfied, Georgia dumped the remainder of her undies the walked out of the laundry room with Roxie leading the way.

April couldn't believe her luck, she was currently a flattened decoration on a BBW's panties! After the pressure left the stink set in, it was awful she thought. April tried to move any part of her battered body but nothing was responding. Another whiff was all it took then she passed out amongst the undergarments.

What happens next?
14122.title: April keeps her head down and tries to stay con...

141221.content:
April groaned, coughing up a mouthful of underwear sweat she had swallowed, then opened her eyes. Instantly she knew she was doomed.

"Oi! Wakey, wakey, little fox!" Roxxie laughed, as she and Georgia stared down at her.

"I don't think you're supposed to be here, deputy. Do you have a warrent? No? Well it doesn't matter. You're not leaving either way." The huge mare laughed. Instantly April tried to roll to her feet and run, but Roxxie had been expecting it, and with a powerful stomp, flattened the fox to the floor, an imprint of the roo's huge foot squashed into her body. Georgia just chuckled.

"There. Now you get to hang around with us for a little while." Georgia grinned. "So, you like my underwear, hmmm? Well, you're in luck. Because I think I can make your life heaven." Her evil grin widening, Georgia grabbed a particular pair of underwear from the pile, looking much filthier and much more ragged than the rest, and reeking of horse ass. "These here are my lucky panties, but sadly they're a little worse for wear because I use them so much... I think they need patching. And you're just the patch for it!"

April screamed in fear, but in her flattened state there was little she could do as Georgia peeled her up with one hand, placed her in the inside back of the disgusting underwear, then yanked them on. Immediately the fox's screams were silenced with a loud squish, as she was buried deep, deep within Georgia's ass crack and drenched with her foul sweat.

"Mmmm... Her fur feels so nice buried in there... I think in a few days or running and riding she should be bonded to them permanently. Just as she should be..." The mare purred. Next to her, Roxxie just laughed.

"Ha! Sounds perfect... In fact, I might do the same with Tex. Seems like a perfect place for her..." The roo turned and stomped upstairs to get the weasel, leaving Georgia alone to enjoy her new underwear. True to her word, in a few days April became a permanent part of her underwear, just as Tex became a permanent part of Roxxie's. The two lawgirls lived out the rest of their lives dealing with the sweat, stink and constant crushing of their rival's asses, doomed to be stuck with them forever.
141221.title: Uh-oh...

choices: Georgia finds April and wants a tattoo to match Roxxie's.
Roxxie wakes up and catches April.
April escapes and heads back to town to prepare for their takeover.
141222.content:
April had a rough night's sleep in the panty bin waking up periodically attempting escape but her form was much to flattened for it. Just then she jolted awake once more, but this time it was an actual jolt! She was moving again but she still wasn't a hundred percent. That being said she still climbed out of the underwear pile. It seems that they had washed Georgia's half while she was asleep.

April was worse for wear but she was on a mission, a mission to find Tex! She noticed that it was sunny out, this surprised her considering that she showed up to this place around sundown. Currently one of April's legs was completely reformed, but the other one was about the width of a pancake. Despite this she still climbed up the stairs to the main floor.

As soon as she was up there she spotted Georgia at the front door talking to a short armadillo woman with an odd looking black bag. April ran to cover behind a large chair that hid her easily and listened in on their conversation. "I can't thank you enough for what you've done for us. Tex has been a problem for too long, and because of you she won't bother us anymore! You've made us very happy, especially Roxxie." Georgia said with glee. "Oh it was my pleasure, I'm always happy to help out girls like yourselves. I never much cared for Tex she seemed too intrusive, thank goodness she's done for." The armadillo woman said. "Ha ha yeah. Hey can I get your phone number we're gonna face more pests like Tex's deputies and some outlaw lizard guy, your methods could really scare some people outta town lickety split." Georgia asked admiringly.

April was concerned over this conversation, as her leg finally reformed to the appropriate width she began to search the house for Tex. They couldn't be telling the truth, Tex has been squashed before but they couldn't permanently keep her that way. Could they?

April checked high and low concerned about her friend's wellbeing. Finally there was one last room she hadn't checked. A room with a big wooden door that said "Roxxie's Room" in big white letters. She creaked open the door and saw the massive Roo asleep on a massive reinforced bed. Roxxie was sleeping on her stomach so her butt was up in the air. Currently she was wearing a thong letting the stench of her rear fill the room. April checked the room but still didn't see Tex. Meaning that there was one place left to check, Roxxie's body. April looked all over her body keeping her ears open for any small groans or whimpers but came up short.

Just as she was about to leave she noticed something out of place on Roxxie's rump. It was a small brown speck resembling the tip of a finger. April sprang to action eager to save the sheriff. She quickly picked up a rifle on the ground and began to pry Roxxie's cheeks apart. It wasn't easy but April's adrenaline was kicking in and used all her might to pull apart the giant butt before her. The smell was awful as April came face to face with the Roo's disgusting butt crack. As soon as April felt that they were apart enough she shoved the rifle between them to keep it open. Next she looked at Tex, but what she saw terrified her completely.

April couldn't believe what had become of Tex. She had become a tattoo! Literally! The outline of her body was covered with dark blue ink. She was also looked like a cartoon in a stance that resembled Porky Pig's at the end of a Looney Tunes episode. Also her tongue was sticking out, and right above that was a speech bubble that said "I love kangaroo booty more than anything!". It dawned on April that the armadillo lady talking to Georgia was a tattoo artist. The only thing to indicate that there was a real living thing beneath the ink was her darting bloodshot eyes that were staring at April. The worst part however was that Tex's new body was completely ingrained into Roxxie's skin! April scratched every inch but there was nowhere to peel off Tex. This was it Tex would never reform, she'd live out the rest of her life as a tattoo on one of the grossest rears in the west.

Tex shed one tear then darted her eyes at the door. April was confused then realized she was telling her to go. "I can't just leave you here." April said concerned. Tex's eyes went back to the door, April then reluctantly grabbed the rifle and said "Bye Tex." she yanked it out and the cheeks clapped together sealing her doom. April ran to the doorway and tried to formulate an escape plan, but it wasn't going very well.

What happens next?
141222.title: April wakes up still with the underwear.

choices: Roxxie has April tattooed to her other buttcheek
Roxxie does something else with April
Georgia gets to have fun with April
1412222.content:
"Well, howdy there..." A deep voice echoed from behind April. Her antics near Roxxie's butt had stirred the kangaroo bandit from her sleep. The fox sprinted towards the door, but the roo's lasso was faster. It flew over April's head and snagged shut around her waist, stopping her dead in her tracks and causing her to fall down. The bandit quickly began to reel in her catch whilst heavy footsteps thundered closer.

Georgia quickly came to see what all the commotion was about and cracked the biggest smile as she saw her partner in crime pulling April within arm's reach. Roxxie showed no mercy, grabbing the fox by the throat and wringing her little neck until she nearly fainted. With her victim subdued the roo smiled at the mare.

"Ya thinkin what ah'm thinkin?" The bandit could barely hide her enthusiasm.

"Ah'm thinkin we're gonna rid ourselves of two lawbringers today." The mare replied with a broad smile.

"An' ain't this one just the sweetest little thing. Ah'm sure Texas will be happy to know that April is now safely with us." The roo taunted. She turned to face her butt and spoke to it. "Ya hear that Tex? Yer dumb cousin's gonna be joinin us too."

"That tattoo gal is probably still close enough to catch up to. We can get you a nice matchin pair o dumbass tattoos." The mare suggested, but Roxxie just chuckled.

"Aw, that's sweet, but ah can't have all the fun. You sure you don't want her?"

What do the bandits decide to do with their new victim?
1412222.title: Roxxie wakes up and catches April.

14122221.content:
"Nah, she's all yours." The horse said with a cruel smile, turning around and leaving Roxxie alone with her victim. "Should ah chase after the tattoo lady?"

"Yes please. I'll get this one all prepped and ready for her big moment" The kangaroo bandit spoke ominously, looking April in the eye. The fox's gaze was wavering after the roo's savage treatment. Again Roxxie squeezed the deputy's throat in her strong hands before throwing the fox onto the floor.

April tried to get on her feet, but she was dazed from being throttled by the roo. She struggled to find her feet and shake off the lasso that put her into this mess. She just about finished slipping the heavy rope from her waist when a heavy foot planted itself on her back. The heavy stomp immediately pushed her down onto her belly and forced the air from her lungs. When the cruel bandit stepped off her victim the fox was barely given time to prepare. Roxxie already had her pants on her ankles and a huge exposed butt looming over the helpless deputy.

With a loud thump Roxxie made the whole hideout creak and groan. Her fearsome butt had ended more fights than she could count and thanks to it's intimidating size there wasn't a trace visible of the fox being smothered beneath it. To make things worse the bandit began to grind her big rear back and forth on top of the pinned fox. Slowly April felt herself getting shoved inbetween the flabby cheeks. Where it was mainly the crushing weight she had to deal with before, the deputy found her new predicament to be even more horrifying. The dirty cheeks pressed against her from all sides, squeezing her tightly with every clench of the roo's butt. All manner of grime and filth was rubbed into her whilst the stench began to sting in her nose. The foul bandit felt her victim slowly flatten between her asscheeks and gleefully made the fox even more miserable with a loud fart.

The deputy can scarcely believe the smelly hell she has entered at the hands of the bandit. Suddenly April feels her world shift. The evil roo had stood up, but she was stuck firmly between those massive asscheeks. With a big smile Roxxie carried her prey over to Georgia, who was waiting for her along with the tattoo artist.

"Good news, Rox. Look who's still here." The mare joked.

"Yes, I heard you had another... job for me?" The armadillo calmly inquired, seemingly indifferent to the roo's missing pants.

"That ah do. Already got 'er wedged back there. Should be almost flat enough for ya to work the magic." The kangaroo said excitedly. The tattoo artist nodded and prepared her tools.

Roxxie Roo grunted loudly and began to clench her buttcheeks together with unbelievable force. The fox couldn't move a muscle as she was slowly squashed flat between the two heavy walls of flesh. The pressure on her skull was enough to nearly make her faint, but it was a silent, stinky fart that pushed her over the edge. When the roo bandit felt her prey go limp she calmed herself down again and parted her smelly cheeks wide. The armadillo moved in and got to work.

In the deepest depths of Roxxie's asscrack two new tattoos graced her dirty hide. Sheriff Texas and her favorite deputy, both reduced to two-dimensional images, infused into the roo's skin. Between the two of them was the roo's twitching butthole. It expelled farts on the regular, frequently nauseating the two lawbringers turned tattoos. When April finally came to she panicked, but she no longer had limbs to move or a mouth to scream with. Instead she could only concentrate of the wretched stink. How was she able to smell it without a nose? Light barely reached this deep between the roo's cheeks, but there was enough to see the weasel on the other cheek. They both looked horrified at one another. Nobody would ever look for them here. They were doomed to be stuck right next to the kangaroo's butthole forever. A fact the cruel bandit was quick to rub in with several nasty bursts of gas.

Without any law enforcement Georgia quickly and heroically took it upon herself to be the town's new sheriff. Together with her partner in crime she robbed the people of Gold Springs blind. Any unfortunate saps who tried to stand up to the duo were quickly shown where the last lawmen had gone before getting shoved up Roxxie's ass or meeting a similarly gruesome fate at Georgia's hands. Their reign of terror lasted decades, just like the roo's special weasel and fox tattoos.
14122221.title: Roxxie has April tattooed to her other buttcheek

choices: Texas is in trouble! Save her!
Discretion is the better part of valour. Sneak out when they leave.
141223.content:
When April woke up, she was wet, cold, and still buried under a pile of laundry. Before she could process all this however, the dryer she had been dumped in started to spin to life, whirring the poor fox girl around like a centrifuge, all while blasting her with hot air. April screamed with terror as she was flung around with the rest of the now-clean laundry and dried out, but with a stroke of luck, she managed to kick the door open from the inside and was flung out onto the cold stone floor, landing with a thud. Slowly, the fox pushed herself to her feet, groaning from the thoroughly unpleasant experience she had just gone through.

"O-ok... Not the best start... but I'm in now! And... kinda clean. I've still got a chance of finding Tex..." The fox shook herself off, took a deep breath, then began to sneak back up to the house, climbing the wooden stairs from the basement to an old, rickety door, which rested slightly ajar. April peered through the gap, and just barely stifled a gasp at what she saw.

Beyond the door was Roxxie's living room, which was dominated by two large chairs, currently filled by Roxxie and Georgia. However, what had made her gasp was the sight of the tiny weasel hand sticking out from beneath the oversized kangaroo's ass, occasionally giving a weak twitch to show she was still alive.

"Ha! Of all the bodies in the west, Tex, yours is the most fun to crush into a pulp!" Roxxie laughed, bouncing in her chair and clearly enjoying the loud squishing noises that came from beneath.

"And when I become sheriff, she's yours permanently." Georgia said with a grin. "My first act of office will be to close the case on the whereabouts of that weasel, and my second will be to appoint her deputy to my ass! No-one will ever come looking for either of them."

Behind the door, April gulped fearfully. If she didn't do something, Texas could be crushed into a permanent tattoo on Roxxie's ass... but those two were some of the toughest fighters in the west. If April went in guns blazing, she wasn't sure she could win. April placed her hand on her gun and took a deep breath. She had to figure out what to do...
141223.title: April wakes up in the dryer!

1412231.content:
April had sworn an oath the day she became a deputy that she would always fight to protect the lives of those in danger, and those words could never apply more than right now. Much to her horror, the trusty sheriff had been turned into a living seat cushion, and there was no way she could let this atrocity go on another second.

April wondered how she should best enter the living room to catch both crooks off guard. They might have dwarfed her in size, but they weren’t immortal; if she kept them at a distance and trained her weapon on both of them, she could force them to let her and Texas slip out the back. They certainly wouldn’t be willing to take a bullet for the flattened officer.

The girl took a step into the room and held her pistol in the air. “Freeze, you oversized rats!” she barked with authority. “You get off the sheriff right now, kangaroo, or the only place you’ll be bouncing to is the MORGUE!”

“Oh, crabapples!” Georgia sarcastically feigned defeat at the sight of the tiny fox standing in the doorway to Roxxie’s room. “It looks like we’ve been caught by the law! Whatever shall we do??”

“That’s right.” April called back with dead seriousness as she took turns training her gun on the two gigantic targets in the room. “I’ve got you in my sights, and if one of you takes even a single step towards me your eggs are gonna be scrambled like… AH!!!”

April gasped with surprise and pain as a wooden stick of some sort smacked her across the back of the head, knocking her to the ground. Her body hit the living room’s carpet and her new perspective showed her that there was a third target she should have been keeping track of: Smiling Jacks. The small rabbit was standing over her with a sheepish grin, a herding rod held in her hand like a baseball bat.

“Thanks Jacks! I don’t think she expected to see all of us here in one place.” Georgia called out as she placed her oversized boot on April’s gun and slid it away from the hands of the downed deputy. “I don’t know why we didn’t coordinate sooner. Now what should we do with this little nuisance?”

“Oi, I’ve got an idea!” Roxxiee called from the couch as she shifted her weight onto her right side, exposing the sweat-drenched furniture beneath her and the squelched sheriff plastered across the seat. “How about you slide ‘er down under so she’s niiice and comfy with her best friend.”

“AHHHHHHH!” The space between sticky underside of the kangaroo’s rump and her filthy chair looked like the worst crevice in the world, and there was nothing the deputy would like less. The poor girl tried to run, but Smiling Jacks bonked her on the head again with the herding rod, and then Georgia’s hands wrapping around her ankles sealed the deal: April was screwed..

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------

The fox’s body thumped onto the chair, the two slick gargantuan buttcheeks of the sweaty villain looming over the piece of furniture like a titan. She looked over and made eye contact with the Sheriff, whose body was a completely pancaked mess, her skin slicked with Roxxie’s sweat.

“April, no…” Texas’s windpipes managed to wheeze out as she realized her friend was caught. “Not you too…”

“Aww, you look so cute together!” Roxxie laughed as she wriggled her bottom tauntingly above the heads of the two helpless foxes. "I’ve gotta say goodbye for now, but you’ll have plenty of time to catch up in the next few hour!”

Texas and April both burst into cries for mercy as the gigantic lass’s disgusting bum started moving back into place, its rancid smell registering more and more in their nostrils as it approached.

Their bodies were slowly pressed into pancakes as Roxxiee took her time letting her ass sink into her favorite chair. Now, much to her delight, she felt the desperate squirms of two squished goody-two-shoes beneath her instead of just one. The tickly feeling of their bodies getting smushed to putty beneath her made her laugh out loud.

“I get a turn next, right Rox?” Georgia said with a snicker as she watched her enemies vanish completely underneath the jiggling cheeks.

“Hahaha.” the kangaroo was now sitting still, and the feeling of her sweat pooling onto the squelched bodies beneath her filled her with contentment.

“Of course, Sheriff Georgia.”
1412231.title: The Price of Bravado

choices: April hears someone coming and hides.
April looks for Tex but is caught in the process.
April finds Tex and escapes.
1412232.content:
"Ah I'm so tired, I think I'm going to hit the hay!" Georgia said stretching. "Righ behind ya, lemme just get the sheriff." Roxxie said trying to get up with some resistance, until finally a wet slap sounded out as she got up revealing Tex flattened out butt print body with the middle of her face pointing up like a triangle from where it was in Roxxie's crack. Roxxie grabbed Tex an heaved but she wasn't coming off it was as like she had bonded with the chair.

"Huh? Looks like she's stuck." Roxxie said confused by this. "What!? I wanted her under my rump tonight!" Georgia said pouting. "Easy girl, Tex has had a long day. Being squished twenty-four-seven has some side effects. We'll pick up where we left off in the morning. She's not gonna reform, and even if by some miracle she did, Butterscotch is a real light sleeper. So let's just get some rest." Roxxie said hopping to bed. "Alright Tex, enjoy your little break because tomorrow your moving to my chair where I'm gonna crush you into a permanent cushion!" Georgia said turning around and slammed her butt down on Tex then let out an Earth shattering fart, PPPPPPPBBBBBBBBRRRRRRTTTtttt. Georgia then rose up leaving behind a wider, smellier, butt print that was Tex.

April waited for Roxxie and Georgia to get settled in their beds. As soon as it seemed like they did she rushed over to Tex. She saw April and her pupils got big. April gave her a reassuring smile then grabbed a hold of her body. She heaved with all her might for a while. Midway through taking a break, April noticed a crowbar propped up against the wall. She shoved the bar beneath Tex and tried as hard as she good. Eventually her body flew off the chair and into the kitchen. This created a loud banging noises as Tex ricocheted wildly. Finally it stopped and April rushed in. The place was wreck and Tex was nowhere to be seen. April had to get Tex but she'd have to find her first.

What happens next?
1412232.title: Mission Accomplished, Sorta

choices: Attack now!
Surrender?
April takes too long, and Roxxie finds her...
14122321.content:
"Tex? Tex!?" April called out in whispered tones, frantically looking around the ruined kitchen for any sign of the weasel, but realised that she must have ricocheted off into one of the other rooms. The fox was just about to dash in after her, when she heard heavy footsteps tromping down the hallway towards her. Thinking quickly, April flung open one of the cabinets and tucked herself inside, just as Roxxie stomped into the room, dragging the flattened, smelly Texas behind her.

"Oi! I know you're in here, fox! No-one else would be stupid enough t' break in here and try to rescue my new fart cushion!" She says, glaring around the kitchen. With no response, the roo just growls and starts flinging open cabinets. "You'd better come out now, fox! Give up now and I might let you leave. But if ya don't... then Texy here becomes my new toilet, and your tongue's gonna be my toilet paper!"

As the roo continued flinging open cabinet doors, she was getting closer and closer to April's hiding place. The fox had to do something now, or she was doomed for sure!
14122321.title: April hears someone coming and hides.

choices: Roxxie standing in the doorway, more angry than ever!
Nothing, Roxxie is still recovering.
Roxxie, but something miraculous happens!
141223211.content:
April's heart pounded as she hid in the cabinet. If Roxxie found her, no one would be coming to prevent them from being playthings for these disgusting ladies. As she backed up further Roxxie was getting closer. Just then April felt the cold touch of metal on her hand as it brushed by a cast iron skillet. Having lost her gun, this was the closest thing to a weapon she had, things had changed, it was time for a fight.

After searching almost all of the cabinets Roxxie crumpled up the flattened Tex into a ball in anger. She arrived at the last cabinet she hadn't checked. She slowly creaked it open hoping to terrify the small fox, but something was wrong. She didn't hear any yapping or pleas of mercy. Roxxie's flung open the door to see what was wrong only to be met with a metallic force that smashed her face into a disk. Roxxie was her unaccustomed to any part of her being flattened and showed this as she dropped Tex and fell to the floor in agony.

With lightening speed April scooped up Tex and tucked her under her arm like a football player. She sprinted to the door only to see that it was bolted up tight. Her hopes were dashed but then she saw a back screen door. April kicked it into high gear running to their last shred of hope. "Don't worry Tex we're almost to safety." She said to the squashed ball that was her friend. However as soon as they reached the door she accidentally rammed into a khaki clad butt that blocked the doorway. The smell stained her nostrils and she was pushed back by a massive fart that came from the rump. April writhed on the ground for a moment then looked up to see a smirking Georgia squeezing her hips past the tiny doorway. April desperately needed a new escape route, but it's not going to be in front of her, April looks back and sees...
141223211.title: Attack now!

141223213.content:
Hundreds of thoughts were rushing through April's head. What was she going to do? Right as she was about to come to her decision, her cupboard door was flung open and she was staring at Roxie's face. "Get over here!", she yelled and grabbed April. "Well, since you didn't make your decision, I'll make it for ya." She threw the fox on the floor and started jumping and smashing her ass on her. April began to lose her shape, right as Georgia came in. "What's going on here," she moaned. "We got us a stowaway," Roxie sneered. "I think it's only fair I let you handle her," she said tossing the flattened deputy to Georgia. "Good. I needed a bathroom break anyway."

She dragged April into the bathroom and set her face up on the toilet. The mare dropped her pants as squatted her fat ass on April's face. April heard Georgia's stomach growl as a loud fart rang out of her ass. FFFFFFFFFFAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTT.... "Ooh, yeah. That's the stuff," Georgia groaned. "And that's just the beginning." As she said that, April's mouth was filled with Georgia's shit. A constant stream flowed into her, and she couldn't do anything to stop the massive mare. All she could do was accept her new fate as Georgia's new toilet.

For the rest of their days, Texas and April were sat on and farted on every day 24/7. There was also an occasional anal vore and the use of them as sex toys, and since no one cared that the two officials, no one even bothered to look for them. April and Texas were no more than fart cushions and toilets.
141223213.title: The end, for both of you...

choices: Take the long way: Walk all the way to the gold mines through the hot desert
Take a shortcut: Walk to the nearest town and try to find a ride
Maybe Roxxie left her horse, Butterscotch, behind. How hard could it be to tame?
142.content:
April kicked down the front door of Roxxie's hide-out with a thud, her gun drawn and her eyes trained for anyone inside.

The tension rose as she entered the kangaroo's garbage-covered living room and found nothing but empty space; there were no signs of the blasted criminal or her captive.

"Hmmm..." April thought to herself as she thumbed through the home, each room presenting nothing but another vacant dead end. "Where could she be?"

The deputy walked down the stairs to the basement and found it to be empty too, but her ears perked up when a familiar scent entered her nostrils and she realized that Texas had been here. Her boss's smell seemed to emanate the most from the plain table in the center of the room, its surface adorned only with a flashlight-equipped mining helmet.

"A mining helmet..." April thought out loud as she picked up the clue. "Someone must have left it behind in a hurry. I bet that blasted kangaroo took Texas to the gold mines... but why?"

It wasn't much to go off of, but it was something. It was up to the deputy to make her way to the mines: But how?
142.title: No One Home

choices: The villains gloat and explain their evil plan.
The villains don't rise to the bait, and leave the girls to their nasty fate.
1421.content:
Going to town was all well and good, but if April had any chance of saving Tex before the villainous duo did... whatever to her, then she needed to most fast, and that meant taking a shortcut across the desert. The fox took a deep breath, checking that she still had her water bottle on her belt, then set off through the back door of Roxxie's house and started walking, first over the hills it was nestled in, then through the flatter scrub-land, then finally, the dry, endless desert, sun shimmering off the golden sand. This wasn't going to be pleasant.

Almost an hour later, April stumbled out of the desert back onto the dusty trail near the gold mines. The fox was an absolute mess. Five minutes in a snake had stolen her water bottle, ten minutes after that she had lost a shoe, and 15 minutes after that she had been trampled by a herd of stampeding bison, leaving her dishevelled, her clothing torn, her fur covered in hoofprints, and to top it all off she was absolutely drenched in sweat, looking like she had just emerged form a swimming pool. As she staggered along, her vision blurry and her head cloudy, she nearly walked straight into Roxxie and Georgia, emerging from one of the many now-empty goldmines that littered the area.

"S-stop right there, evildoers!" Deputy Briggs stammered, drawing her gun, but it felt like it was made of lead. She could barely raise it, let alone aim, and her arm shook like mad. She wouldn't be able to hit the broad side of a barn. The two 'evildoers' looked up, then smirked and cracked their knuckles, advancing on her.

"I-I said stop! I-I'm warning you! I really am! I-" *click*

The fox pulled the trigger on the gun, and was rewarded only with a click. Apparently the snake had stolen her bullets too. April gulped and looked up, just in time to be pulled into a smothering bearhug, her face and most of her upper body being lost in Georgia's cleavage, completely smothering her. With no air, and the energy already drained from her body, it was all she could do to give a few weak kicks before passing out, completely at the villains' mercy.

~~~


When April slowly awoke, she was in a cool, dark place, and tied up tight. She groaned and opened her eyes, finding herself looking at the inside of a rocky cave, with the two villains busying themselves around the cave.

"April... that you? Are ya'll awake?" A familiar voice whispered behind her. The fox turned her head, and realised that she had finally found the sheriff, and was tied back-to-back with her, bound tightly to one another.

"Tex... I'm sorry, I screwed everything up... What are they gonna do to us?"

"Ya'll didn't screw anythin' up that wasn't already screwed, Deputy." Texas said soothingly. "As to what those varmints are up to... I ain't sure. But I guess I know one way to find out... Ah don't know what you're plannin, ya scum, but ya'll won't get away with it! Me an' mah deputy'll see t' that!" Texas yelled loudly at Georgia and Roxxie, causing both of the massive girls to turn and glare at her.
1421.title: Not the brightest idea.

choices: The middle track continues on its downward slope, outrunning Georgia and Roxxie!
The middle track hits an upward slope, and the two villains catch up!
14211.content:
"You know what?" Roxxie's kangaroo ears perked up as her teeth formed into a wry smile. "I think I'll tell you exactly what we're going to do to you."

The kangaroo seemed to take great pleasure in watching the facial expression of her captives realizing their fate, so she decided to spell out exactly what was going to become of the poor foxes. In order to do this, she rolled a dusty old chalkboard from her workstation and began to scribble out a diagram of what looked like some strange double-sided plank the two foxes would be strapped onto.

As the kangaroo was running through the rigamaroo of her planned squelching and Georgia was absent-mindedly waiting for her partner to finish so she could begin crushing, Texas decided to make a move. Her hands wove into her toolbelt and managed to grab her trusty hunting knife, something her captors had foolishly failed to deprived her of. All it took was five seconds of wittling and she had snapped the binds of both her and her partner.

"April, RUN!"

The two foxes sprinted away from the scene, their tiny legs carrying them as swiftly as they possibly could. Behind them they heard the thundering footsteps of the two gigantic villains, and they knew that if they were caught they'd be squished flatter than imaginable. Their opponents had the height advantage, and the longer strides of their longer legs had them gaining on the fleeing canines at a startling rate. The sheriff and her deputy needed a steed.

The group rounded the corner of a cave and found not a steed, but the next best thing; a mine cart. The rolling box-on-wheels was standing at the front of the chamber with a long stretch of track before it on a downhill slope. The two foxes hopped in and shoved off, leaving their gigantic pursuers in the dust.

Unfortunately for them, there were 2 other minecart tracks to the right and left of the one they had entered. Georgia and Roxxie were each big enough to fill up an entire minecart on their own and still have their over-inflated butts jutting out over the edges, so they each had to take their own ride.

Suddenly, the hostage situation had turned into a high speed chase. Texas and April were rocketing down the track, the two cart-riding villainesses just barely behind them to the right and left. If the terrifying horse and her gigantic kangaroo friend managed to get their carts paralell to Texas and April's, they could easily leap the gap between them and royally ruin the weeks of the poor officers.

"Pray this cart goes faster, April..." Texas whispered as the track they had selected continued rocketing on its downhill descent. "If they catch up to us, we're mincemeat!"
14211.title: The villains gloat and explain their evil plan.

142112.content:
"This blasted thing better be fast!" Texas shouted to April as the mine cart rocketed down the rickety old tracks. "I don't think they're gonna let us get away a second time!"

The gigantic villainesses trailing behind behind them were hoping for the opposite, their eyes trained on the tracks for any opportunity to catch up with the sheriff and her deputy. Their hefty bodies gave them the weight to rocket the metal vessels downhill, but Tex and April's head start was keeping them a fair distance away.

"I think we're really gonna make it, Tex!" April said with relief. "There's no way those two are gonna..."

Just as the deputy uttered the last word of her sentence, the track turned around a sharp corner and revealed a steep uphill climb. The creaky old wheels of the cart began to heave as it struggled to make the ascent.

The cackling laughter of the two criminals coming from behind grew louder and louder as Roxxie and Georgia closed the distance. The sheer momentum of their weight made the upward climb easy for their carts, and the two lawgirls could only watch in horror as the distance between them shrunk with each second.

"Oi, looks like you two got the short end of the stick!" Roxxie shouted between giggles. "I'm gonna make some PANCAKES out of you goody two-shoes!"

The villain leaped from her cart with a kangaroo-sized hop that sent her soaring through the air. She threw her legs out from under her as if she were doing a cannonball into a swimming pool.

The sheriff and her deputy looked up and saw Roxxie Roo's GARGANTUAN butt flying toward their crowded mine cart.

Texas gulped.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------

The sound of Texas and April being squished like bugs bounced around the walls of the mine as their cart was completely filled with Roxxie's enormous bum. The evildoer's cheeks jiggled from the impact as they completely filled up the little metal vehicle, reducing its contents to a flattened paste buried somewhere deep beneath them.

When the carts finally came to a stop at the top of the hill, there was much rejoicing to be done between the two sheriff-slayers. Georgia couldn't contain her joy at the sight of her partner-in-crime sitting where Texas and April had been only a moment ago. They had been completely trapped beneath the weight of Roxxie's rump, which was practically overflowing the tiny cart.

"What a sight!" Georgia said between snorts. "You absolutely SQUASHED them..."

"Sure did, mate!" Roxxie replied as she wriggled her sweat-drenched butt back and forth on top of her defeated enemies, squelching them even flatter. "Trapped 'em down under... oi... their struggling is even tickling me a little bit."

The massive criminal attempted to stand up off the pulverized sheriff and her poor deputy, but her cheeks failed to move an inch. Her ass was simply too big for the cart she had hopped into; it was stuck.

"Oh, blast it!" The roo complained as she jiggled her buttcheeks even more atop the obliterated pair in an attempt to stand up. "I'm gonna need you to pull this thing off of me!"

Georgia grabbed hold of the scrawny metal square attached to Roxxie's enormous hips and pulled with all her equestrian strength, but it didn't budge an inch. The darn thing was stuck to her rump like superglue.

"It's no use..." Georgia fell over backwards from the sheer force of her pulling. "We're gonna have to walk back to town and use some kinda jelly or something....that thing is jammed on you good and tight..."

Roxxie's ass cheeks were crammed into the cart so intensely that they had practically formed a sound-proof seal, but some sound managed to escape the thing. It was the tiniest hint of an "MMMMMPH", a sort of moan of dissaproval that sounded like it was coming from two different sets of windpipes.

"Oi, quit your complaining!" Roxxie said to the lawgirls smeared beneath her rump. "This isn't fun for me, either! I'm gonna be sweating like a hog in there. I'm gonna be one sticky 'roo by the end of this!"

The end.
142112.title: A very, very unlucky turn

14212.content:
"I'd love to tell you what we're planning, Texas." Georgia said with a wry smile, "But frankly, it's gonna be a lot more fun to let you figure it out for yourself. Roxxie, you ready to get medieval?"

"Oi, as always!" the kangaroo said as she turned around from the table. Much to the horror of the two captives, her face was covered by a welding mask and she held a blowtorch in her hand.

The foxes tried to wriggle themselves free from the table, but their restraints bound them tightly and kept them from moving a muscle. They weren't just tied down to the table below them; they were laying atop two long, slim wooden planks. Their eyes grew wide with fear as the masked villain approached them and sparked a blue flame from the end of her welding tool.

"Georgia, give me a hand, will ya?" She asked with a grin.

"Of course, darling!"

The enormous mare grabbed Texas's plank and stood it upright, as if the fox were about to be prepared for some kind of crucifiction. Roxxie took April's plank and did the same, standing it back-to-back with the piece of wood Texas was tied to.

"Perfect..." the kangaroo laughed devilishly as she took her blowtorch and ran it along the center of the planks, fusing them together into one piece of wood with the squirming sheriff on one side and her stone-faced deputy on the other. It almost looked like some kind of totem pole dedicated to the world's unluckiest two law enforcement officials.

The terrified girls had no idea what they were in for, but knew something awful was about to happen when Georgia began to lay down on her stomach, her enormous butt hanging up in the air behind her.

"Alright, Rox!" the future sheriff called out. "It's SQUELCHING TIME!"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --

"NOOOO!" came the unified scream of dissaproval from the trapped canines as Roxxie shoved poor Texas's end of the pole right into Georgia's asscrack, the poor fox squishing into a flat paste as her body was crammed into the desert-sweat-drenched crevice that was her former deupty's rump. Her squealing voice couldn't be heard outside the squooshy confines of the jiggling cheeks, but everyone in the room knew the unfortunate sheriff was enduring the most disgusting thrashing she had ever received.

With Texas buried in Georgia's overbearing butt, April was left lying face-up on the plank, her eyesight aimed at the rocky ceiling of the gold mine's interior. It was clear to her now that she had been lured into a trap, and due to her own incompetence the villains had practically just turned her beloved boss into a sentient piece of toilet paper.

The feeling of guilt was replaced by the overwhelming feeling of fear as Roxxie Roo glared down at the pathetic deputy, her arms still pathetically trying to wriggle out of their perdicament.

"Looks like it's my turn now..." the kangaroo said with a sensous tone as she slowly swung her hits around, her gigantic bum inching in on April's vision a s a reminder of just how massive she was. "We're gonna make a goodie-two-shoes sandwich!"

"You don't have to do this!" April cried out as Roxxie's rump came closer and closer to burying her alive.

"You're right, I don't!" Roxxie tickled the deputy's nose with her tail in a taunting display of dominance. "I WANT to."

With that the kangaroo completely her descent, the fox's screams for help being slowly converted to muffled mumbles for mercy as the marsupial's heaving buttcheeks slowly sank down into their new seat. April's body was compressed like a pea being rolled over by a truck tire, her figure becoming a completely smushed mess beneath the kangaroo.

And then, there was peace. The incredibly cruel and sadistic villainesses held their positions, a newfound quiet taking over the cold insides of the gold mine. There was a serene warmth in knowing that, beneath the silence, the pain-in-the-ass police officers were completely trapped, their faces crammed so tightly into the sweaty crevices of their enemies' nether regions that they were almost inseparable.

"Well, I guess that takes care of that..." Georgia said with a laugh as she let a little fart erupt onto the sheriff's poor little face. "You wanna go get some gold?
14212.title: Squash.

choices: April races for the old mine
April takes off towards Ghost Town
April takes another look at the map, revealing even more options
1422.content:
April had no time to waste. Whatever Roxxie had in mind for the sheriff couldn't be good. There was a nearby farm that could lend her a horse, but before she left the building she spotted something unusual in the living room. Laid out on a table was a tattered map of the area.

"What in the world..." She hummed to herself. It wasn't like Roxxie to keep a map. Maybe someone else is involved in this. The thought sent a shiver of fear down her spine. That vile kangaroo on her own was already a nightmare to deal with. If she had help the odds would not be in April's favor. The deputy studied the map closely, talking to herself.

"So that's where you're taking her... or is it?" The longer she stared at the aged paper the more worried she got. In the hills one of the old gold mines was marked. If Roxxie had taken Texas into the hills, that's where the roo bandit would be. But a similar circle was drawn around Ghost Town. There was nothing there but misery. Everyone had long abandoned it except for Molly, one of the weasel's fiercest rivals. A corpulent rat unlike any other with a cruel streak a mile long and a burning hatred for the weasel. Her disdain stretched out to anyone who dared set foot in Ghost Town, disturbing the vast network of rat warrens beneath. Even the bandits in the region knew better than to go there. What could Roxxie possibly have planned for the sheriff?

April snatched the map off the table and took off, racing for the nearby farm. After a short round of negotiations she had gotten herself a horse and she was ready to save Texas. But a new dilemma presented itself. Where had Roxxie taken the sheriff? The helmet suggested the gold mine, but the map added Ghost Town as a second option. April's gut told her the mine was the right answer, but she was doubting her judgment. The odds were good she would run into Molly if she went to the abandoned town. The deputy shivered at the thought. But she couldn't let her fears stand in her way. If Texas was in Molly's hands, she had to intervene fast. The monstrously fat rat proudly kept a tally tattooed on her butt of all the sheriffs and deputies that met their demise at her hands. The young fox woman would not let Texas become another notch in that grim score.
1422.title: The mystery deepens

choices: Molly uses her voodoo magics to ambush April
Molly's minions ambush April
Molly uses her voodoo magics for a dramatic entrance
14222.content:
With no further evidence to hand April followed her gut feeling. And unfortunately it told her that she would find Texas in the abandoned ghost town. She gulped, shaking off the pangs of fear that place gave her. Maybe if she was fast she could stop the sheriff from ending up in Molly's ratty paws. Soon the familiar boggy smell of swampland filled her nose. This place used to be a bustling little town called Silver Lakes. But one day a nearby river flooded the whole town, turning the surrounding lands into a soggy mire. For reasons unknown however, the waters never really receded and the town was abandoned shortly after. Most of the buildings in Silver Lake have now sunken into the ground, some nearly vanishing completely.

The swamp surrounding Silver Lakes had begun to grow it's own ecosystem, plantlife teeming wildly in the muddy ground. It was a strangely green patch in the middle of the unforgiving desert. Mosquitos started to plague April as she ventured closer to the town itself. Not a hint of activity could be seen amidst the sunken buildings, but the deputy knew this place was not abandoned. She felt like something had been watching her ever since she entered the narrow road through the swamp. Suddenly her eyes widened as she spotted a familiar figure just outside of town.

"What the... Roxxie?" The deputy said, squinting her eyes. The roo bandit was laid out against a small tree, covered in cuts and bruises, her right eye swollen and blackened. April didn't need to guess to understand what had happened here. Molly had betrayed her partner in crime and taken Texas. But once she got close the roo gasped and shook awake.

"Stop, you loon. You wanna end up like me?"

The fox had no time for the bandit's antics and got off her horse, grabbing a length of rope from the saddle. As she got closer to Roxxie the bandit's one functioning eye widened with fear.

"What are you doing?" She stammered.

"Makin' sure you don't go anywhere. Roxxie Roo, you're under arrest." She said with no small amount of satisfaction in her words.

"Whatever, beats dying out here." The roo replied, surprising the deputy. April had expected more swearing, shouting and fighting. But the bandit was in a pretty dire state. Whilst she got to work tying the bruised villain up Roxxie continued muttering to herself.

"I don't get it. We had a deal. I'd bring that damn weasel over here and that fucking voodoo rat would make sure she never leaves. But then I show up as promised and she has her minions beat me up and steal Texas from me. Ow!" She yelps as April pulls her bindings tight. Molly might have a burning hatred for the weasel, but she was too scatterbrained to stick with any of her fiendish plans for more than a day. The deputy finishes her handiwork, leaving the roo tied to the tree and walking off into town.

"What the hell are you doing?" Roxxie yelled.

"Gettin' Texas back." April replied without looking back.

"What? Don't tie me to a tree and then commit suicide you maniac! You wanna take on Molly on her home turf? Did you breathe too much swamp gas or are you deputies just naturally insane?! She's got more henchmen than you have bullets!" April gulped. She knew Roxxie was exaggerating, but there was some truth to her words. She was about to take on a whole bandit lair full of enemies by herself. But Texas would do the same for her. No time for cold feet now. She ignored the kangaroo's ravings and walked into town.

The main road was the only thing still intact in Silver Lakes. Most of the houses and shops had sunken into the soggy ground, only the rooftops still visible. The small church tower still poked defiantly from the earth. With every step April took into this spooky village the hairs on her neck rose up further. She was certain Molly or one of her goons was looking at her, but there wasn't a hint of light anywhere. She knew that the fat rat bandit lived in a network of tunnels and warrens beneath Silver Lakes from having interrogated one of her minions. All she had to do was find an entrance. The little church tower almost seemed like a cliché, April smirked bitterly as she got closer. With her revolver in hand she got more and more jumpy, every noise from the bog adding another bead of sweat to the nervous fox' forehead.
14222.title: April takes off towards the ghost town

1423.content:
April slowly creaked the door to the stable open and crept in, being careful not to crunch any hay under her feet as she entered. A feeling in the pit of her stomach began to creep up as she saw the gigantic horse sleeping in the center of the room, its body easily dwarfing her 5 to 1. She had to hope that a horse whose job was carrying around a thousand-pound kangaroo could stomach a new passenger.

"Oh, the things I have to do for you, April..." she said to herself as she prepared to leap onto the sleeping beast's saddle and wrangle it into submission.

"HYAH!" the slim fox leapt onto Butterscotch's saddle and tugged on her reigns, trying to wrestle her into obedience. "Up, girl, up! I'm gonna take you for a ride!"

Butterscotch was NOT going to let that happen without a fight. As the haze of sleep faded into consciousness, she realized she was being boarded by someone who was not her master, and she began bucking back and forth like a malfunctioning mechanical bull.

"Woah girl, woah girl!" April shouted as she struggled to stay on top of the jerking mount. "Calm down! Calm down!"

The fox gulped as she felt her hands lose their grip on the rope, and without her hold she had no way to remain on the blasted horse. Butterscotch bucked her backside in the air, sending April flying up towards the ceiling of the stable. Her head hit the woody surface above with a "thud", and before she knew it she had fallen back to the earth and smacked into the muck-covered floor with a wet "splat".

April was collecting herself and beginning to pry herself out of the mud when she realized that she was now lying in a large shadow. Her eyes slowly scanned upwards and her pupils grew into huge saucers as she saw Butterscotch's gigantic butt looming over her like a guillotine.

"Gulp."

Butterscotch bucked her legs up in the air and threw them out to the side, sending her massive rump falling down towards the poor fox at mach speed. April tried to leap out of the way, but her shoes had sunk a little too far into the muddy floor to escape in time. For a split second, she realized just how helpless she was.

SPLAT!

Butterscotch slammed her rear onto the ground, crushing poor April like a bug. Much to the fox's displeasure, the animal let out an absent-minded fart only seconds after buying the pathetic creature. The loud commotion of the fight for control had subsided, and now there was just the silence of the horse sitting contentedly in its own stable.

Roxxie and the other crooks had no idea it was happening, but they were the luckiest villains in the world: They had taken Texas out of the game for good, and her dumb deputy had accidentally got herself squashed by a stupid horse!
1423.title: Very Hard to Tame.

choices: Villain #1
Villain #2
Villain #3
Villain #4
more choices

The day was starting off like any other for the deputy. People moved about the town like they normally did, doing there work, trading, tending to their lives as such. You’re trespassin’ on our property and that means you gotta pay” she said before dropping him harshly onto the ground and slowly lifting her foot up before hovering it over him. Percy remained frozen in fear at the intimidating sight, his mind racing for anything he could say that’d save from from his impending doom.
15523211.title: Percy is stuck all the way to Peggy's house.

choices: Percy plays it safe and kisses her
Percy attempts to run under her
155232112.content:
"W-Well uh, you can hardly blame me for followin' after ya. A lady as lovely as yourself has to be used to all sorts of fellas following you, right?"

Peggy's foot halted it's decent at that moment. The giant sow stared down at him with suspicious eyes, making Percy fear that his attempt at flattery had only succeed in agitating her somehow.

"Your not wrong... but most of em don't have the gall to follow me into my house" she said slowly as she began to lower her foot again.

"I'm sorry, I just couldn't help myself! I was so taken aback by your beauty that I just HAD to get a closer look!" Percy cried with all the conviction of a preacher singing the praises of the lord. Once again, she halted. His impassioned words managed to do the trick as she stared down at him with wide eyes, her already pink face turner a deeper shade of pink. Percy breathed a sigh of relief once she finally pulled her leg back.

"You... you really think I'm beautiful?" she asked as she fiddled with one her of pigtails.

"You kiddin' me? A heartbreaker like you belongs in the big city as one of them eh... movie type folk!"

Peggy let out an airy giggle as she fanned herself. His mealy mouth and disingenuous platitudes made her hot under the collar and gave her butterflies. Despite her extreme narcissism, she was a very self-conscious young lady that yearned for approval, especially from the opposite sex. Her poor hygiene, bad temperament, and frightening size often made boys hesitant come within five feet of her.

"Well, I'll uh... just get out of your hair now, miss. Have fun at that weddin' of yours! Love the dress, by the way. Really brings out your curves!" Percy said as he flashed her the most dashing smile he could. He almost felt bad for putting her on like that, but he was just glad to have been spared yet another squishing. He turned to exit when suddenly the door slammed shut. He blinked and looked up to see Peggy's arm stretched out with her palm pressed flat against the wooden surface.

"Leaving so soon...?" she cooed in a sultry tone of voice.

Percy swallowed and looked back at her, a chill going down his spine when he saw her staring at him with bedroom eyes. He was beginning to regret his decision to charm his way out of trouble.

"I-I don't mean to be rude ma'am, but y-you uh, I really need t-to get back to work..." he stammered with a nervous smile.

"Aw, poor dear... you must be all tuckered out from all that hard work..." she tittered as she advanced on him slowly, her hands running along her thick hips.

"I-It's tough b-b-but I uh... I can manage"

"Why don't you take a load off, lawman? Let little ol' Peggy take care of you~" she murmured before plucking the badge from his chest and tossing it into her mouth. Percy watched in a mixture of fear and awe as she effortlessly chewed up the piece of metal before sticking her tongue out and showing him what was left of it. She somehow managed to masterfully bend and twist his badge into the shape of a heart.

"That's... wow..."

"I can do more things with my tongue if you wanna see~" she said as she batted her eyelashes at him.

Percy trembled slightly as Peggy knelt and shut her eyes, her plush lips pursed as she moved in to kiss him. His eyes darted around the room for anything that could save him when his eyes landed on her window. He could probably duck underneath and dart over to it before she even knew what happened. Then again, that plan could go south in many different ways, the most disastrous being if he couldn't get her window open in time. He was already familiar with Peggy's bad side and he didn't want to risk offending her again.
155232112.title: He tries to flatter her

choices: Percy manages to talk himself out of his predicament
Percy learns Peggy has some unexpected kinks
Peggy is remarkably gentle with her lover
1552321121.content:
Percy was more afraid of her wrath than disgusted by her love. There was no other way out of this. He closed his eyes and leaned into Peggy's kiss. Her thick lips smothered half his face and her breath was nearly vile enough to make him reconsider his actions on the spot. Too late, her hands reached down and grabbed his shoulders, helping to stabilize the amorous pig. She suckled and smacked loudly, her tongue teasingly dragging along his closed mouth.

The overwhelming affectations of the pudgy pig woman were hard to resist, even more so because she was starting to really lean into her kiss. Percy was forced to deal with more and more weight piled on to him until his legs could not keep up a moment longer. With a loud thump Peggy fell forward onto the floor. Her eyes shot open and the first thing she saw was her lover gone missing. A flash of anger raced through her as she thought he'd try to run off, but a funny feeling quickly doused her rage. A distinct wiggling coming from beneath her large breasts. She sat back up and saw Percy's tail waving around in the corner of her eye. She looked down at her impressive rack and between those precious globes of her rested the gecko's head. He'd gotten himself wedged between them when she fell over. He was lucky her dress had enough give in it not to tear or there'd be hell to pay.

"Hahahahahaha... you got some balls, scales. Most men ain't got the guts to be that forward. But if you think you're ready to go whole hog with me, I won't leave you wanting." She snorted at her own pun, peeling Percy free and walking over to the bed with him in her arms. She unceremoniously dumped him on the smelly straw bedding and walked over to her dresser to prepare for what was to come next.

The gecko's mind was racing. How did it get to this so quickly? He couldn't possibly go down on that? The stench alone would kill any boner and a lady of her size was going to need something a fair bit... bigger than him. He dreaded to think what she had in mind to solve this. He had to get out of this, but if she found out he got her all aroused and then tried to flee... Percy shuddered at the thought of what Peggy might do to him.

"Well, c'mon then big boy. Take a good look at this fine slice of pork." The pig cooed, making his scales stand on end. She hadn't just taken off the dress. Peggy was standing in front of him completely naked. Some depraved corner of his mind was turned on by all the bare flabby body on display. But his mind was mostly filled with fear as he pictured her trying to go down on him. But things were about to take a surprising turn.
1552321121.title: Percy plays it safe and kisses her

choices: "See you tomorrow, stud~"
"Where do ya think you're going? This date ain't finished yet~"
"You know what? Forget bein' classy~"
15523211211.content:
As the amorous pig sauntered over to him, Percy racked his brain to think of a way to excuse himself without potentially offending her. Reasoning her was completely out of the question, so the only option left to him was to appeal to her vanity. He cleared his throat and readied himself, as he needed to come off as cool and charming as he could possibly manage.

"I must admit Madam, your breathtaking beauty led me to reason that you were thr type to favor the more... conventional method" he said placing a hand on his chin. He felt a weight lift of his shoulders once Peggy came to a halt with a confused look of her face.

"Whats that mean?" She asked curiously.

"Surely you jest!" Percy laughed. "Someone as lovely as yourself must be aware of the unspoken rules of courtship, right? Experienced lover know them like the back of their hand!" He cried incredulously.

Peggy's confusion quickly turned to anger as she glared down at thr mouthy little gecko. He was tredding on some dangerous territory suggesting that she wasn't experienced in lovemaking. Granted, he was literally the only man that she'd ever brought into her room, but she didn't want to be reminded of that fact. Her response was exactly what Percy expected and he was quick to clarify his statement.

"Of course, it goes without saying that someone like you would be well versed in matters of the heart. See, I haven't beem with a woman as classy and ravishing as you in a very long time and while I'd love to jump right into the lovemakin' aspect of the relationship, I know that classy women are the type to start slow and build up to that wonderful moment" he explained.

He fought the urge to grin as Peggy nodded with every word, her anger fading into genuine curiousity as she listened. As horny as she was, she was still self-conscious enough to not want her inexperience to be out in the open. She huffed and folded her arms, her gigantic breasts being pushed up by her meaty arms.

"Ah'course I know about that kinda stuff! I was just... testin' ya! To see if you were a real gentlemen! A lady has to have standards, you know" she said with a smug chortle. Silence hung in the air as the two stared at each other, Percy waiting to see what move she made next. After a while she cleared her throat to speak again.

"So what do experienced lovers do before thing get all hot n' heavy? And before you say anything smart, I already know the answer! I just... wanna make sure you know too!" She added defensively.

"What they don't do is make love on the first date. That's the kinda behavior that only low brow types engage in. You and I have just met, so now we spend some time a'flirtin' with one another while we do our normal business. That's when we start datin' and by, oh say.. .the hundredth date, that's when we really hit it off!"

Peggy frowned as she listened to his explanation. Her ideal relationship consisted of long nights of passion and having every inch of body thoroughly worshiped throughout the day, so all his talk of waiting and flirting didn't exactly appeal to her. Her apprehension was exactly what the cunning deputy expected and he was quick to address it.

"Let me ask you something. What's the longest time you've gone without a nice home cooked meal?"

"Um... maybe about thirty minutes. That was way back when and it only happened cus' our stove wasn't workin' Why? You tryin' to say somethin' about my size?!" she growled, her giant fists clenching. Percy darted over and calmed her down as he took hold of her and kissed it.

"I would never even dream of it. If more girls were built like you, no man would ever wanna be single" he said with a wink. Peggy couldn't hide her elation as she swooned at his praises, her heart beating faster and her lust for him growing ever more intense.

"Good sex," he continued, fearing the suddne warmth he felt radiated from below her waist. "Is like waitin' for a big meal. The longer you wait, the better it tastes when its time to eat! Get what I'm sayin' here?"

Bringing it down to a food metaphor seemed to do the trick as Peggy's body language relaxed. As badly as she wanted to pounce onto him and ride his tiny little body into the dirt, playing the waiting game seemed like a smarter choice. She sighed and backed away from him, the disappointment quite clear on her face. For a brief moment, pity overtook Percy and he couldn't help but try and bring her spirits back up.

"No need to pout, madam. We got all the time in the world to get to know each other while we start datin'. I'll put on my best suit and you get all prettied up, and we'll go out the classiest establishment in all of Gold Springs! Doesn't that sound like somethin' you'd like?"

"Yeah... I guess so..." Peggy said softly, a smile forming on her face as she blushed. The way he described it seemed so uniquely pleasant to her.

"Welp, I gots me a town to look after so I'll just see myself out" Percy said as he slowly made his way over to the door. He was relieved to see that she wasn't following behind him like before.

While he talked a good game, he didn't plan on seeing her again any time soon. Avoiding her wouldn't be too difficult given much of a boisterous trouble maker she was. All he had to do was avoid answering any calls that pertained to her and her brothers. It wasn't the most honorable thing for him to do, but the alternative would be to spend even more time with her, he was didn't think he could stomach much more of her affection.

He was about to leave when Peggy spoke up again, her voice heavy with desire.
15523211211.title: Percy manages to talk himself out of his predic...

Kiss her ass
Eat her out
15523211213.content:
With quaking steps, Peggy swayed her way over to Percy laying stunned on the bedding. Upon reaching him, she got down on all fours and crawled overtop of his prone form, staring down at him lustfully. Percy clenched his eyes shut as he braced for impact.

But it never came. In its place, Percy felt a wet muscle drag up from his neck to his cheek. "Teehee." Forcing his eyes open he sees Peggy still hovering over him.

"Uhhh... what's happenin'? Ain't ya gonna, ya know, claim yer prize?" Percy asks, to confused over the situation to keep his mouth shut. Peggy giggled a bit more at his "eagerness" to start.

"I'll have you know that I ain't about to squash you up for lovin' me. I can be soft and gentle if a want to, and it just so happens that I like bein' gentle to the man that shares my bed." She explains as she rolls over and flops down next to him.
