The same deliberate effort was applied to her pants and undergarments until the weasel was dangling in the air with not a thread of clothing left on her. She'd never felt so embarrassed in her life. Vivian put little Texas back down on the pile of scraps that used to be her outfit. The mayor couldn't help but salivate a little, seeing the naked weasel standing on her desk.

"Aren't you looking tasty right now..." She murmured, before her next cruel plan unfolded. She couldn't just east the sheriff, that's barbaric. Texas would probably be all stringy and chewy. She needed to be tenderized and Vivian knew exactly how. The weasel wasn't given a moment's pause before she found herself in the mayor's crushing grasp once more. This time Vivian stood up, reaching behind her and dropping the sheriff on the soft seat of her chair. The quilted fabric was still warm and Texas could only scream in terror as the now enormous butt of Vivian came back to add to that warmth.

The mayor laughed heartily as she felt the little weasel get crushed beneath her. She'd taken care to ensure only a single buttcheek would land on her. No reprieves by hiding between her cute little buns, the sheriff would feel the full weight of her vengeance. In mere moments she felt the body of Texas squish flat and with a gleeful smirk she rubbed her butt back and forth. Rubbing it in further didn't seem to do much, but damn did it feel good. She could keep the flattened weasel here for the rest of her days and never grow tired of it. But keeping Texas around was too much of a risk. It was time to end this.
155312111111.title: Vivian can't resist playing with her food

choices: Texas is digested
Texas forces Vivian to cough her up
Texas survives the trip through Vivian
1553121111111.content:
Vivian leaned down on the flattened weasel one last time before standing up and retrieving Texas. Her smile grew a mile wide just seeing the pathetic little stain her cute butt had reduced the sheriff to. If only all lawbringers were as good at kissing her ass. She'd squished the weasel so thoroughly it actually took a bit of effort to peel her free from the cushioned seat. Finally as the sheriff began to reform a little she came loose. The mayor held her by one of her feet, dangling her before that massive smile. The huge toothy grin was nothing short of unnerving.

"Y'know, in a strange way I'm going to miss this, Texas. Sure you were a constant pain in my neck with your baseless allegations, but my girls have had so much fun with you over the years. Remember that time we locked you in your own prison so all the inmates could have a few days of fun?" The weasel cringed at the thought. It had taken her weeks to wash out the stench of that little encounter. "Or when we strapped you to Roxxie Roo's horse? I didn't think you'd walk away from that one. But now it seems like our time has run out. Let's hope the next sheriff has enough common sense to know who's in charge around here. Then again, if they can be presented to me like a tasty morsel too, maybe I can get used to this. By the way, how did you end up so small?"

"Ah got a strong suggestion, but ah'm never gonna tell that to the likes o' you." The tiny weasel huffed proudly. She was almost certain Abra was behind this. Who else could pull tricks like this off? But the less Vivian knew about the witchdoctor, the better. Maybe she'll end up getting shrunk too somehow.

Every time you question or complain, de time is reset and you must endure another fifteen minutes of service. De spirits already be bettin on how many hours you'll be here tending to me every desire." Suddenly the challenge sounded a lot more real. choices: Stench Potion?
Something a little more crazy
15531213112.content: A potion to increase her stench?
15531213112.title: Stench Potion

choices: Abra has fulfilled her usefulness, time for Roxie to test out the changes!
She hunts down Texas
155312131121.content: The potion made her insides twist and turn, like she was digesting a years worth of out of date beans in a matter of seconds! Her armpits began to get damper, bringing with them a toxic, swampy smell. The massive Roo looked down at Abra menacingly
155312131121.title: Stench Potion?

choices: She changes Butterscotch into an anthro
She supersizes the horse
155312131122.content:
Roxie looked a little disappointed, unaware that this was just water with a few spices mixed in.

The reason was, Abra noticed the perfect way to torture Texas, no, the entire town. Her eyes fell over Butterscotch, Roxie’s immensely disgusting horse.
155312131122.title: NOTHING!

choices: Butterscotch lets Roxxie Roo ride on her back
Butterscotch eats Roxxie Roo
Butterscotch sits down on Roxxie Roo
1553121311222.content:
The witchdoctor had mistaken the foul stench in Roxxie's abode to be the kangaroo herself. But it smelled like the lion's share of it originated from the bandit's horse. With a curious and mischievous glance the cheetah approached Butterscotch. The large mare seemed a little uneasy at the sight of this eerie woman covered in trinkets.

"Careful there, doc. Ol' Butterscotch is in a mood lately." Roxxie warned, but Abra seemed undeterred.

"She be a beautiful horse." She commented, admiring the strength and power radiating off the mare. Butterscotch needed to be strong. Hauling a fat bandit like Roxxie around was no easy feat. The witchdoctor looked the stallion in her eyes. The horse huffed and bristled in return, growing more and more uncomfortable with the presence of the witchdoctor.

"It be fine, ya mighty beast. Little Abra here means you no harm." Her eyes seemed to glint with a strange aura and to Roxxie's surprise her horse relaxed. It seemed almost entranced by the cheetah's gaze.

"How did ya do that? I gotta have you around more often when Butterscotch is moody." She said jokingly.

"De spirits see potential in dis animal. Can I give her a little treat?" Abra asked the roo, holding up a sugar cube.

"Hahaha, sure. I reckon she ain't gonna get any fatter from that." Roxxie hollered, amused by the cheetah's politeness.

Emboldened by the kangaroo's words, Abra fishes two more sugar cubes from her robes, presenting them all to the horse. Butterscotch looked at them curiously at first. She couldn't tell how or what, but something seemed off about them. But her big belly soon overrode any hesitation and she slurped them all out of Abra's hand. The mare whinnied with glee, letting the witchdoctor pat her head. Abra struggled to keep her composure, the urge to laugh maniacally at her deed growing strong. She politely excused herself and prepared to leave.

"Where ya goin, doc? I thought you were gonna improve me so I can beat Texas once and for all." The confused roo asks. The cheetah thought fast and gave her an excuse. "De spirits need time to attune your body. Sleep well tonight and by tomorrow you will be unstoppable."

Roxxie just gave a half-hearted nod. She wanted to crush Texas today. But she had no idea how these crazy concoctions are supposed to work, so waiting a day is what it would take. She let the witchdoctor out, pondering for a moment if she should keep Abra hostage, just in case she'd been trying to trick her. But as the thought passed her mind the cheetah snapped around and stared her in the eye. Either she had amazing timing or she knew what the roo was thinking. It was unsettling either way and Roxxie could do without having the cheetah in her house.

The moment Abra was out of sight of Roxxie's lair she ran as fast as she could. Her magic would kick in soon, and she didn't want to be anywhere close to it when it happened. If her hunch was correct, this was going to decimate that stupid little town and possibly a few more.

The kangaroo bandit sat back in her chair, patting her belly and wondering how she'd notice the potion's effects first. She glanced over to Butterscotch, who seemed calm. But something was off about the horse. The roo couldn't place it immediately, but things didn't seem right. Her face turned red at the thought of Abra having done something to hurt her horse. But then Butterscotch lets out a short whinny and grows six inches taller before the roo's eyes. A few seconds later another whinny paired with more growth. Roxxie quickly opens the pen and pulls her horse outside. She had no idea when this would stop, but she didn't want her horse to hurt herself by bursting through the roof. She also kinda preferred her lair not to be destroyed by her horse growing huge.

Butterscotch whinnied loudly, growing faster and faster. She cleared the last door just moments before her butt would've become too big to fit. She looked at her frightened owner as the roo got more and more puny. The strange taste of those sugar cubes should've tipped her off immediately, but the horse's sweet tooth got the better of her judgment. Both horse and bandit wondered when this would end. It took a considerable amount of time but when Butterscotch had finally stopped growing she stood tall enough to see Gold Springs in the far distance. She looked down to see the bandit and gave the closest thing a horse has to a chuckle. Roxxie Roo was downright tiny, no more than a mouthful for the mare. Her words were barely decipherable anymore, but she seemed upset.

It was then that Butterscotch realized one of her hooves was planted right in the middle of the roo's lair, demolishing it completely. The destruction awoke something in the horse. She looked over to the distant town again and felt a malicious urge to go there. But first she wanted to deal with the kangaroo.
1553121311222.title: She supersizes the horse

choices: Butterscotch is feeling a little peckish
Butterscotch begins stomping on buildings
Butterscotch makes a beeline for the sheriff's office
15531213112221.content:
Cruel thoughts coursed through the horse's head. At this size there was nothing Roxxie Roo could do to her. She had free reign to go where she wanted and do as she pleased. A single step would reduce her partner in crime to a flattened puddle, like she'd done so often with Texas. Maybe she could sit on her or swallow her up. Butterscotch looked at her former rider with glee, sending a shiver down the bandit's spine. Roxxie knew that stare. Her horse only looked at Texas like that when she was about to punish her. The enormous mare leaned her head down closer, huffing a jetstream of hot air all over the roo.

"E... Easy there girl. You still remember me, right?" The kangaroo stammered nervously. The horse seemed to be stuck pondering still until the penny dropped.

Butterscotch opened her maw and went in. In an instant Roxxie Roo was surrounded by the wet cavern and the horse carefully closed her maw, her thick lips wrapping around the roo's legs. The bandit screamed as she felt her steed move its head but before things could take a turn for the nightmarish the huge maw opened again. The horse wiggled her tongue a little, letting her partner in crime slip out. She landed roughly on the mare's back, covered in horse drool. Her heart was racing. The pudgy mare couldn't bring herself to hurt her lifelong friend. Roxxie might be an ass sometimes, but she has taken care of Butterscotch for so long, kept her healthy and happy. And only in the bandit's line of work did the horse get to live out her malicious dreams of tormenting others with her farts and weight.

The colossal horse began trotting towards the unsuspecting town in the distance. It felt strange to not have the roo's considerable mass on her back. Roxxie was little more than a flea hitching a ride at this point. The roo was still trying to calm down after the scary trip in her steed's maw. Soon her eyes fell on Gold Springs and she began to puzzle things together. Her partner in crime was about to be having some fun there. The bandit had dreamed of taking on a whole town at once and now it was going to be a reality.

"Ooooh, I like where this is going." She said loudly, encouraging her horse. Butterscotch could barely understand her words, but that didn't matter. The towering mare was already daydreaming about what to do when she reached her destination. She couldn't wait to see the look on everyone's face as they were about to get stomped flat or sat on.

In the distance Abra had already packed up her things and was riding her cart far away from Gold Springs. She could see the humongous horse lazily trotting over and when she felt safe in the knowledge she wouldn't be caught up in all of it she stopped. The cheetah clambered up on top of her wagon, took a seat and fetched some snacks from the heap of miscellaneous furniture tied to the top. The witchdoctor smiled from ear to ear as she watched the destruction about to unfold.

The citizens of Gold Springs were quietly minding their own business when a distant heavy thump was heard. Shortly after another followed. People started looking around and it didn't take them long to see the enormous horse in the distance trotting closer. In mere moments panic set in and people began falling over eachother in a desperate bid to clear the streets and hide in their houses. Butterscotch regarded it all with an amused grin. They were like ants to her and she was about to have some fun playing with them.

"Go get 'em, girl!" Roxxie cheered from her back.
15531213112221.title: Butterscotch lets Roxxie Roo ride on her back

choices: Butterscotch sniffs so hard it sucks Texas up her nose
Butterscotch tears the roof off of the sheriff's office, staring down Texas
Butterscotch turns around and sits down on the sheriff's office
155312131122213.content:
The towering horse casually wandered into town. She gave the buildings a close look, her every step powerful enough to reduce them to splinters. But the mare wasn't just causing havoc for no reason. She was on the lookout for one building in particular. Her large nostrils twitched as she caught the smell she was looking for. It came from a slightly tougher looking building near the center of town.

Roxxie Roo tried to figure out what her partner in crime was up to, but from the horse's back she couldn't see much. Instead she began daydreaming about all the things she could accomplish with Butterscotch's new size. She could have Vivian's office trampled to nothing and rule Gold Springs with an iron fist. Or she could even just have her steed trot up and down main street a few times, leaving nothing but ruin behind. But most of all, she couldn't wait to see Texas. With a malicious chuckle she kept on trying to sneak a look at where Butterscotch was going until she realized, judging by nearby buildings, that they must be close to the sheriff's office. "Oh, this is gonna be good." She said gleefully, rubbing her hands.

Texas heard screams and commotion outside. She raised a curious brow, walking over to the shotgun mounted to the wall. Whatever this was, it sounded like it was going to need the heavy artillery. With several more rounds in her pocket she marched out calmly, ready to face down whatever threat was causing all this panic. The weasel looked down the street, seeing several enormous hooves. Slowly her view went up, following the muscular legs until finally she stared at the towering mare's face. The sheriff all but let the gun fall from her hands. She knew this horse and worse yet, she knew its owner. When it sniffed the air the weasel scurried back into the office.

The sheriff's heart was beating in her throat. It took her every ounce of willpower not to panic as well. What was she going to do against something of this scale? She'd need a cannon to even hope to damage it. Her whole body shook when she heard Butterscotch stomp another building to dust, fearing her office would be next beneath those trampling hooves. The only relief there was to be had was that the office was mostly empty. There were some cells filled with assorted scum, but her deputies were all out on their various duties. They would hopefully be spared the horror.

Suddenly darkness entered the office as the giant horse leaned in, blocking most of the windows. The weasel could hear the loud snorting close by, raising her heartbeat further. If Butterscotch was lingering here, whose smell was the horse tracking down? She pleaded silently to whoever would listen for it not to be hers, but she knew the odds were slim.
155312131122213.title: Butterscotch rushes to the sheriff's office

choices: Butterschotch sneezes, launching the weasel
Butterscotch snorts loudly, pulling Texas in deeper
Butterscotch keeps the weasel trapped in her nose, continuing her rampage
1553121311222131.content:
Each loud snort and grumble from the collosal horse rattled the windows of the sheriff's office in their frames. Texas stayed put, not daring to sneak out the backdoor. The moment that beast caught her in the open it'd take a step or two at most and she'd be at its mercy. And Butterscotch is not very familiar with the concept of mercy. She'd sat on the weasel for days in a row, just to make sure there would be no interference when Roxxie robbed the bank. The mere thought that she might try to repeat that act was chilling.

Suddenly Texas' fear were brought a litle closer to reality as a loud crash broke the doors off their hinges. The very tip of the horse's muzzle pushed in, no more than a giant pair of nostrils fitting through the gap. The weasel contemplated opening fire, but at this scale the best even a shotgun would do was piss the horse off. An angry horse of that size could well destroy the entire town. She held on to one of doorframes leading to the back, but struggled due to the hurricane winds now whirling around.

Each sniff and snort caused massive changes in airflow, pushing the weasel around. She desperately held on, not wanting to be blown around. Something seemed to go wrong though as a moment of quiet preceded the absolute storm that was the gigantic mare sneezing. The sheer force was enormous, the wooden inner walls of the sheriff's office groaning and warping. It was finally enough to rip the weasel away from her holdout and into the merciless torrents of air. A loud sniff pulled the weasel towards the large muzzle poking at the entrance. She tried to grab hold of anything within reach, but the floorboards were her only option. It was to no avail as the next sniff sealed her fate.

The gust of air pulled Texas up off the ground and straight into the left nostril of the horse. Butterscotch was more than enormous enough to suck the entire weasel up her nose, but the unexpected impact had her suprised all the same. The horse knew that distinct scent of weasel anywhere and she was gleeful to have sniffed her out. She could even feel the little thing in her nose squirming pathetically. A small satisfied snort nearly freed her prisoner, but Butterscotch was quick to ensure the weasel would have an unforgettable experience.

Texas shivered with disgust as she landed in a foul heap of snot. She'd been subjected to many different horrors in her career, but this one definitely ranked high among them. The thick ooze clung to her fur and soaked her clothes. The short, bristly hairs around her provided some handhold, but it seemed that every time she pulled on one another gust of air slammed her down into the slimy walls. Her surroundings moved around constantly, the weasel being pushed and pulled in the slimy passage. Muffled shreds of panicked screaming rang from the outside. Texas could only imagine what Butterscotch was up to now.

"What is it girl? What's that damn weasel done to ya?!" Roxxie shouted from the mare's back, seeing her partner in crime shaking her head and sniffing and snorting wildly. It looked like that damn weasel had put pepper up her nose. Roxxie swore she would make the sheriff pay for that, not knowing her horse was already several steps ahead of her.
1553121311222131.title: Butterscotch sniffs the weasel out

choices: An endless expanse of ass
Butterscotch's twitching butthole
Butterscotch's pussy
15531213112221311.content:
Butterscotch paces nervously in place. The weasel was more of a little irritant in her nose than she liked. There was only one solution, to forcibly evict the sheriff with as much violence as possible. The horse reared back and sneezed loudly. Nearly windows shattered from the volume alone. It had worked though, as amidst the spray of large wads of snot shooting down main street was also a snot-coated Texas. The sheriff flew through the air in a flat arc, rolling and tumbling as she landed in the rough dirt of the street.

Texas tried to move, but the sticky horse snot had her limbs glued to her body. She wanted to free herself from the smelly gunk, but progress was slow and time was not something the weasel had. Something made terrifyingly clear as a large shadow loomed over her.

Roxxie Roo got to see the weasel for the first time since she got into town atop the giant horse. Butterscotch had propelled the sheriff so far that even from her perch atop her steed's shoulders she could catch a glimpse of the goo-caked Texas.

"You're dead, you hear me?! Nobody hurts ma horse and walks away!" She yelled furiously, but the weasel didn't seem to react. The sheriff's eardrums were still ringing after being in the middle of that thunderous sneeze. Roxxie continued shouting threats down to the weasel, but Butterscotch was about to deliver a punishment far worse than anything Roxxie could deliver. The towering horse would make sure Texas was never seen again. She turned around and presented her enormous backside to the weasel. It blocked out the sun as the humongous horse slowly lowered her rear down. Not an easy feat for a horse, but Roxxie had trained her well. The kangaroo bandit held on to her steed's mane as best she could as Butterscotch was about to deliver the final blow to the weasel. The stench of horse ass filled the air as Texas desperately tried to free herself. But against the sheer size of the horse sitting down there was no escape. With a loud boom Butterscotch sat down on Texas, dumping every ounce of mass she had on the doomed sheriff.

The last thing the weasel saw before everything went dark was...
15531213112221311.title: Butterschotch sneezes, launching the weasel

choices: Abra visits the mayor
Abra seeks out Georgia
Abra is hit with a vision of another viable candidate
155312132.content: The witchdoctor does not feel like going all the way to the mines to get her revenge on Texas. There were plenty of options inside of Gold Springs for her to choose from. And with her empowering touch they would be the poor weasel's bane. That would teach this misguided lawman not to scoff at her powers. Who to pick though... The cunning mayor or the brutish former deputy?
155312132.title: Mayor Vivian/Georgia

choices: Georgia grows bigger than a house
Georgia becomes as tough and heavy as iron
Georgia gains a different blessing
1553121322.content:
Georgia's days weren't busy ever since she got the boot from Texas. The disgraced former deputy busied herself mostly with booze and running odd jobs for Vivian when nobody was looking. Today shaped up to be more of the same. With the weasel keeping a keen eye on the mayor work was at an all-time low, so booze was all there was left. At least the bribes she got fired for would fund a sizeable volume of alcohol to last her until she'd either find another well-paying gig or until she overthrew that damned weasel. The mare huffed. She should be the one maintaining the law in this town. Texas is far too scrawny to be any sort of imposing threat, not to mention her severe lack of vision. Surely she could see that the town would run so much better if the sheriff and the mayor aligned their goals? She could be swimming in money, but instead all she does is nose around in everyone's business. The mare grumbled to herself until she saw a small figure approaching her.

"Hello dere, me name be Abra. I can sense you and I have a mutual goal and I am here to help you."

"Hold on there, ya scrawny puke. What does a lil' varmint like you think you can do to help me? I could squash you flat in one step! I don't need your help!"

"Alright den, I guess you don't want to humiliate Texas and take her place..." Abra said nonchalantly and turned around. Predictably a large hand came down on her shoulder, stopping her in her tracks and roughly spinning her back around. Her smug grin was met with Georgia's intense stare. The mare glared at the small cheetah with such ferocity it felt like she was about to burn a hole right through her.

"Ah, I see I got your attention now..."

"You got my attention, make it good or you're the one getting humiliated." Georgia whispered as loudly and threateningly as she could without drawing any attention to the alleyway the two were in.

"It be simple. I use my wily magics and bestow you with a blessing. With it you can overwhelm Texas and take your rightful place as sheriff of this town."

The large mare smiled. She'd heard this before. "Uh huh, magic, right?" She wanted to continue but now it was Abra's turn to stare daggers. Her confident grin turned into a bitter scowl and her eyes lit up with fury. Suddenly the large mare felt a stinging pain shoot through her arm. She let go of the diminutive cheetah, stepping back and seeing the small totem in her hand. It looked vaguely horse-like and a pin was stuck in its arm. Georgia's eyes widened with disbelief and curiosity. Abra was about to stick another pin in the totem when she saw the look of wonderment on the mare's face.

"Ho-lee shit, you're a real magician!" Abra furrowed her brow. "Witchdoctor actually, but the name doesn't matter. What matters is whether you want my help now?"

Giddy like a schoolgirl Georgia nodded. Who knows what other tricks this 'witchdoctor' had up her sleeve. And moreover, how she could use them to destroy Texas. The cheetah smiled contently, seeing the large mare almost jump up and down with excitement. It was good to see not everyone was as cynical and jaded as that grumpy weasel, which brought her back to her scheme.

"Alright, here's the deal. I be givin you a special blessing on two conditions. Don't try to mess with me here, these are important to me." Georgia's face sank back into a serious glare. "Firstly, once you've gotten your power you will use it to take on Texas. After that you can use it to punch as many people and things as you like. But Texas will be the first to feel the sting of my magic, understood?"

"Hah, don'tcha worry little thing, tha's ma plan anyways. Now what else do ya want?"

"Before you smash her lights out, I want you to tell that weasel... 'Abra sends her regards.' That'll drive home that she brought de wrath of a real witchdoctor on her head. How long she be livin after dat I leave up to you. But make sure she knows it was my magic that brought about her downfall. It was my magic that made her enemy unstoppable."

"Yea, that sounds easy enough. Ya had me worried there for a moment, thinkin I had to be your servant or somethin."

"No, after you delivered my message and humiliate the weasel you can do as you please with your new gifts. De spirits be generous and so am I. Now, do we have a deal?"

"Damn straight you've got a deal." Georgia said with a beaming smile holding out her hand. Abra gently placed hers in the large palm only for the mare to unintentionally shake her about. The witchdoctor needed a moment to recover from her new partner's enthusiasm. She almost felt sorry for the sheriff, knowing what terrible vengeance the mare would unleash upon her. But first a more important question arose. What blessing should the mare get?
1553121322.title: Abra seeks out Georgia

choices: Georgia stops growing, she's as big as a house
Georgia keeps growing until she's twice as big as a house
Georgia grows so big one of her boots is as big as a house
15531213221.content:
"Tell me, miss Georgia, how do you bear it?"

"Bear what?" The mare replied, confused by the petite cheetah's words.

"Bear de constant mockery of dese houses. All around you they stand, taunting you with their size. You might be de biggest horse I ever laid eyes upon, but you be small compared to them. but no more, I can help you overcome dis hurdle. With my help you shall rise to meet their height, and then exceed it."

The mare didn't think her smile could get any bigger, but upon hearing those works she reached an all new level of giddiness. She'd used her size for as long as she can remember to intimidate those in her path. Now this magical little creature was going to make her as big as a house.

"First ting, follow me. Growing big in dis alley is gonna get awkward if you find yourself wedged stuck between two houses."

The large mare didn't expect to be following someone as puny as the cheetah. Were it not for her magics, Georgia reckons she would've probably just stepped on Abra for a laugh. It's not every day something that squishy and small has the balls to approach her. Even as a deputy she had a habit of using excessive violence during her job. When she wasn't bribed to look the other way some hidden folks gladly paid a little extra to ensure she dealt with their competition just that little bit more harshly. Texas would soon learn just how harsh her punishment could be. The pair walked a little bit away from the houses and Abra beckoned Georgia to lean down.

"Okay, listen closely. I'm going to give you two bottles with my special tincture. One of them will grow you, the other will return you to your current size."

"You make it sound like I'd ever want to be small again."

"All up to you, Georgia. But you might be finding that getting into your house will be difficult when you're as big as your house. Moving on, anything you're wearing will grow with you. That includes weapons. So prepare to make the term 'hand cannon' quite literal."

The mare chuckled a little at the cheesy pun. She pondered for a moment if she should get more ammo to grow along with her. But once she'd be as tall as a house, was there really that much need for a gun? Her body would be deadly enough without also adding a gun to the mix. Anything else that desperately needed growing? The mare couldn't think of anything. One burning question did emerge.

"So Abra, how long's this stuff gonna keep me big?"

"De changes are permanent, only de red bottle will reverse dem. Keep it safe because besides me dere's nobody in de whole big prairie dat can make you another. With all de explanations out de way, prepare yourself to become de biggest sheriff in Wild West history. You might want to start small on the blue bottle. Drink maybe a quarter and see where dat takes you in size."

The mare merrily ignored the cheetah's last warning and chugged the entire bottle at once, throwing it over her shoulder and looking down at her body expectantly. At first nothing seemed to happen bar a roiling, bubbling sensation in her gut. Was this some kind of joke? If that wretched little cheetah had...

"Do you feel it? Do you feel de spirits coursing through you? I can sense it well, ya be getting bigger real soon."

The bubbling in her gut evolved into a weird itch running along her skin. The mare's sight blurred a little, but even without all the details visible Georgia could tell without a doubt that her perspective was changing. Nearby houses were soon at eye level. How much further will this go?
15531213221.title: Georgia grows

choices: Georgia stomps Texas flat
Georgia sends Texas to prison... in her pants
Georgia leers at Texas hungrily
155312132212.content:
With her shaky vision Georgia saw eye to eye with the houses, but the strange concoction wasn't done yet. She kept on growing, looking down on all the buildings in town. the town hall was a little taller than most buildings, but the mare outgrew it too. When she finally stopped the spirits rushing through her faded. It left her with a lingering headache, made worse by the harsh bright daylight. She covered her eyes and realized she heard laughter. Abra was laughing maniacally, gazing at her work.

Not even in her wildest dreams did the witchdoctor think her mixture would be this effective. She'd expected to just about grow the mare to the size of the smaller houses, but she stood towering over all of them. Her revenge on Texas would be the stuff of legends. Though the cheetah normally prefers to stay away from the action, she can't help but feel immensely curious as to the things the huge mare is about to do. Before she can continue her train of thought she looks up to an imposing oversized gun barrel.

"Are you laughin at me?" Georgia huffed in a sinister tone.

"I be laughin at de face Texas is gonna make when she lays eyes upon her doom." Abra's answer seemed to please the giant mare, who holstered her gun and looked to the town. The sheriff was in there, clueless about the nightmare she was about to enter. Just before Georgia could turn and start her vengeance-fueled rampage the witchdoctor spoke up.

"Remember, tell that stupid weasel whose magics made you big. And do so before you kill her please." The horse woman smiled and nodded. As she set her first step towards the weasel the resounding boom surprised even the mare. She couldn't wait to put all that weight on the sheriff.

Texas was taking a well-deserved nap from her daily activities. The bandits were keeping quiet and she'd already gotten enough of a headache from this crazy woman claiming spirits talk to her. She already regretted not running that con artist out of town right away. There were so many more important things to worry about, she didn't need this on her plate as well. Suddenly the whole building shook as a loud thump was heard outside. The sheriff almost fell out of her chair, swearing under her breath and looking out onto the street. Most the townsfolk had stopped in their tracks or hurriedly tried to get out of the road. All were looking towards the sheriff's office, but up. Was someone on the roof? Some bandits might be trying to break their comrades out of the cells in the office. The weasel took no chances and busted out her old double-barrel. With a determined grimace she stepped out into the street and turned to see what the commotion was all about. Gripped by utter terror, the sheriff looked up wide-eyed at the towering mare.

"What in the world... ah don't recall drinkin anythin this potent..." She said in utter disbelief of the things her eyes were seeing. Georgia quickly snapped the sheriff to attention by stepping over her office. Even with her current size it was difficult and she almost made it. Unfortunatly she did smash a large hole in the building's facade. The enormous mare now stood looming over the sheriff. With a thundering voice she called out the weasel.

"Sheriff Texas Stanton, I hereby relieve you of your duties and promote myself to sheriff. You have been deemed to small and pathetic to govern the law in this town." The mare said with a big smile.

"You can't do that!" Texas yelled back. "The sheriff is elected by the townsfolk!"

"Well, why didn't you say so. I'm callin a vote. I'd like to nominate maself for the position of sheriff. Mah goal? It's simple, either you vote for me or I'll stomp you flat and sit on your house until it's nothin but firewood. Alright, quick show of hands. Who believes this puny weasel should be sheriff?" Barely a hand was raised. "Goody, now just to complete this formality, who votes for me?" Many fearful hands rose up, the mare basking in the moment.

"Well would ya look at that. It done look like there's a new sheriff in town. 's not like they had much choice. A vote for you is a waste as you'll be pushin' up daisies in a few minutes. Now if you'll excuse me..." Georgia reaches down to grab Texas' badge, the gleaming sheriff's star. The weasel isn't quite ready to part with her status as lawman in this town. She resists, drawing the mare's ire. The huge horse wasn't messing around though. Fat anthro fingers, each bigger than Texas, curled around the sheriff and squeezed. The shotgun in Texas' hands was crushed into scrapmetal and her revolver probably didn't fare much better. The sheriff cried out for help, but it was little use.

Georgia lifted her former employer up to her enormous muzzle. She looked the panicking weasel in the eye and smiled. She spoke softly as she shared the details of her little adventure with Abra. Soon it clicked and Texas knew she'd fucked up beyond all repair. She was going to have to endure a lot of giant horse-woman playtime.
155312132212.title: A new law in town

choices: She pushes Texas much deeper
She keeps the weasel in her new prison for years
She suffocates Texas with her farts
1553121322122.content:
Georgia squeezed Texas again, relishing the delightful feeling the weasel gave as she slowly lost her form. But just crushing the former sheriff in her fist was far too merciful for the likes of Texas. She deserved worse, so much worse.

"A'right ya scrawny little varmint, it's time ya get put in yer place. As the sheriff I arrest ya for... äh'll think of something later. First of all, gimme that." Two fat fingers approached the former sheriff as the hand grasping her loosens. The finger that had her chest covered curls away, the approaching fingers daintily pinching the sheriff's star, trying to tear it off. Unfortunately Georgia's new giant stature wasn't very helpful here and she unintentionally pinched the tiny badge too hard. It crumpled up like a tin can.

"Darnit." The mare grumbled. She looked around and saw the blacksmith, shaking on his feet. "You. Make me a new sheriff's badge befitting my stature."

"Yes ma'am, right away ma'am." The rhino man said with fear in his every word. Georgia raised a smile, she could get used to this.

"Alright, that was a waste of time." She spoke harshly, returning her attention to the weasel in her hand. "It's time ah send ye to yer cell. But yer office is going to need some renovations, so ah'm just gonna have t' improvise." Both of them knew the mare had already made up her mind as to where she should 'imprison' the weasel.

Texas was held high above the mare's huge, rounded butt. With her free hand Georgia pulled the waistband on those immense pants back. The tight-fitting fabric strained, but her strength overcame it with ease. The weasel began to squirm as best she could, but it was useless. With a loud laugh Georgia let the former sheriff fall into the gap, feeling her slide in deep. She adjusted her pants to ensure there wasn't an inch of spare room for any weasel stowaways and blew a small fart. Immediately her little prisoner wiggled, putting a smile on her face. Her little prisoner was laid out right along her crack, the only place in her pants with even the slightest hint of space. But with every struggle she felt the weasel slip in a little deeper between her massive cheeks. Soon the former sheriff was completely enveloped by warm, smelly buttflesh. The mare couldn't be happier.

"Okay, we gotta settle some business, people." She spoke sternly to the townsfolk that had gathered to witness the giant in their midst.

"First of all, this office is far to small for a sheriff as great as me. I want you guys to think up a nice alternative. How's about a giant chair for me to sit in an' a big cover for th' sun. I'll let you lot stew on that one. This little dump though..." Georgia raised a foot and brought it down on the building's already-damaged facade. The wood splintered and the innards of the building were exposed for all to see. Several prisoners, still stuck in their cages looked up in horror. The deputies had long fled the scene. Georgia grew a content smile. Those cowards would've been fired anyways. The prisoners on the other hand required her more immediate attention.

"Right, ah suppose ah better deal with this straight away. I ain't got no time t' be babysittin criminals." She reached in, smashing through the reinforced door of a cell and retrieved the prisoner. With a stern gaze she looked down on him and spoke.

"What're you in for?"

"I robbed a man." The quivering thug said. The colossal mare discarded him like a piece of garbage as she muttered about Texas wasting her time. The robber slammed into the ground, got up and dusted himself off. He'd feel that one in the morning, but did he just seriously get set free? He decides not to question a thing and walks away with a slight limp. Georgia had already busted open the next cell and interrogated the man.

"Ah killed five people, sheriff. And ah'd do it again!"

"What?!" Georgia flared up, squeezing a pathetic whine out of the murderer. "Tha's five people that ain't gonna be able to work for me. Unacceptable!" She threw the man onto the ground and lifted her massive foot over him. The last thing the murderer saw was her rapidly approaching boot. She leant into it for no reason other than to display maximum viciousness in dealing with anyone that upsets her. Fearful murmurs buzzed among the townsfolk. The next few criminals were all booked for petty crimes and set free. The last one claimed to be innocent.

"Tha's cute. Now tell me what ye'r in for or I'm gonna make somethin' up meself."

"T... T... Tax fraud. But y' gotta believe me. Vivian's got me in here because I know about..." He was cut off by the mare squeezing the air from his lungs. She let his squished body flutter down in the sheriff's office and turned to face the crowd.

"This ol' office is now officially closed. Ah'll save y'all the trouble o' breakin it down." The mare simply let herself fall backwards, sitting down on the building. It couldn't handle the massive glutes for even a second and like a house of cards the sheriff's office came down on the fraudster along with Georgia's ass.

Texas was forced to listen to the horrid display outside. Her deputy had made a mockery of the fair justice she'd worked so hard to install. From now on Georgia's will would be law. The only silver lining she could imagine was Vivian now probably getting rightly terrified that the mare's delusions of grandeur would see her take up the mantle of mayor too. Not even all her thugs at once would stand a chance. It was a small joy inbetween the smelly farts and brutal clenches she endured.

The former sheriff was completely at Georgia's mercy. What plans does the mare have for Texas?
1553121322122.title: Georgia sends Texas to prison... in her pants

15531213221221.content:
Georgia stood tall and proud, basking in her victory. No-one in this town would dare cross her ever again. Her word was law and she would uphold it with an iron fist. Anyone who broke the law would be captured and judged on the spot. No more of this long-winded bureaucratic nonsense. Vivian could keep doing that for all the mare cared. She would determine the punishment. As she stood before the awestruck townsfolk her smile couldn't be bigger. There was but one tiny distraction. From deep between her cheeks a very soft but distinct piercing squeaking could be heard. Texas was a fighter and even wedged in the biggest butt she'd ever seen she would not give up. She was no doubt yelling obscenities at the mare, but her words were too muffled by the immense volumes of soft ass surrounding her. Even reduced to a barely audible peep the weasel was able to get on her nerves.

"Will ya quit yer sniveling you pathetic rodent!" Georgia bellowed, staring at her own ass. The townsfolk feared for a moment their newly minted sheriff had already lost it. Texas, still entombed between those squeezing walls of horse butt, fumed at that rodent remark, but it did give her an idea.

"OW! You little runt! You bit me!" The mare growled. "Now you're in for it, weasel!"

Texas' whole world shook as she sank her teeth into the wall of short-furred flesh. She'd definitely managed to get a reaction this time. The huge cheeks slowly parted, thin rays of sunlight shining deep between the mare's massive glutes. Unfortunately the only reason those huge buttcheeks were moving was the mare's hand sliding itself between them. The weasel gulped as Georgia's thick fingers drew near. Already she was mentally preparing to be grabbed and squeezed. What else could the mare still do to her that would outdo being stuck here?

The answer turned out to be brutally simple. The mare never bothered to try and grab Texas. Instead the thick fingers simply pushed the mare's puny captive deeper. The former sheriff whimpered as she was sinking ever deeper between those mammoth buttcheeks. The light faded from her prison, smothered out by overwhelming amounts of fat and flab. It took the mare some effort to press the weasel all the way into her crack, but soon Texas felt her worst nightmares fade into reality. A gut-wrenching squelching could be heard just behind her. Though she was stuck in complete darkness, she didn't need to see it to know it was there. The mare's twitching pucker was mere inches away from her. The sounds it produced would haunt her nightmares. The air around it smelled like her farts, only ten times worse. Unseizing and overwhelming, it made breathing normally near impossible.

Being stuck in the deepest depths of Georgia's buttcrack would be one thing, but the cruel mare wasn't done. The fingers kept poking Texas' chest and gut, pushing her along. Her back was the first thing to make contact with the sensitive pucker. Feeling the sheer enormity of it made the former sheriff realize what was about to happen. She was powerless to stop it as the fingers simply kept pushing. Sure enough the tightly sealed passage opened up. She felt herself get pushed inside, the slimy walls of the mare's rectum greeting the weasel with a coat of sticky gunk. The yawning pucker closed again, squeezing her torso and continuing the stream of disgusting noises. Mild terror turned to full-blown panic as the weasel felt the muscular ring tighten and loosen, her body slipping in just a little deeper every time. This couldn't be how it ended. She deserved better that to be slowly sucked into a horse's ass. She screamed and shouted, but deep between those huge buttcheeks not a sound escaped.

Everyone stood frozen in horror as they watched the new sheriff stick a finger up her own ass. Nobody dared to move of even say anything, lest they'd ruin the moment and incur Georgia's wrath. She could feel it. The weasel was wiggling as best she could, but Texas was no match for her beautiful body. It slowly pulled the weasel into her final resting place. With what restraint she had the mare stopped herself from farting. Now wasn't the time to gas the little runt unconscious. She wanted her victim to feel her immense body. Soon enough the walls around the weasel began to shudder to life. They brutally clenched together, painfully crushing their prey. Between clenches the mare's rear sucked even more of the squirming weasel inside.

Texas was resigned to a life inside of Georgia's butt. Inexorably the pucker sealed up over her head, locking her inside a tube of muscle, slime and nothing even close to breathable air. The only question remaining was what would rob her of consciousness first, the stench or the pressure? The former sheriff was beaten and bruised from the ordeal, the crushing walls not helping one bit. She should've been more careful around Abra. Underestimating her had cost the weasel everything. With her final thoughts on the cheetah the lights finally go out. Georgia either doesn't notice or simply doesn't care that her prisoner is no longer moving. It was the inevitable fate of all those that would soon face her judgment. A long, heavy fart dispels the notion for everyone around that somehow Texas might be okay in there.

"Welp, consider that weasel properly judged. Now get moving ya lazy freeloaders. This new throne ain't gonna build itself." Her harsh words whipped the crowd into a frenzy, all busily trying not to be be her next prisoner. In the years that follow Georgia deposes mayor Vivian, sending her to meet the same fate as the weasel. By all accounts Gold Springs was peaceful. The massive mare kept the town in a death grip. Anyone who even slightly stepped out of line was dealt with... harshly. Only those with a bribe big enough could get away with anything. And even though Texas was a fine meal for Georgia's ass, it was merely the first of many unusual 'meals' for the towering mare. From her newly built throne she oversaw the daily bustle, demanding her every whim be met with severe punishment for any who refused. Her jacket proudly boasted a large iron star, making it clear to any and all who dared to end up in this town: Georgia is the sheriff, and her word is the law.

Abra left a few days after. The sight of the enormous mare putting the weasel in her place would stay with her for some time. But the Wild West is a big place. There were many more towns in need of her services. Though a town like Gold Springs and a horse woman as enormous and relentlessly enthusiastic as Georgia would be something she never came across again.

Thus ends the tale of Texas, swallowed up by a giant horse woman's ass never to be seen again.
15531213221221.title: She pushes Texas much deeper

choices: Her clothes were as fitting as they had ever been
She was totally naked, her clothes just a small bit of fabric on the ground
155312132213.content:
Something neither Georgia nor the witchdoctor were expecting was for the rapid acceleration of height to keep going, surpassing Georgia’s measly goal of being house sized.

Eventually, the titan finally stopped growing and her head was in the clouds both literally and metaphorically. She stood at a staggering 250’ of pure fat, muscle and Sheriff squishing power.

Abra let her face fall into her hand, groaning at the mare’s inability to follow basic instructions. “I SAID A QUARTER OF THE BOTTLE!” She yelled, not so much out of anger but to ensure that the horse actually heard what she was saying.

Georgia gave a terrifying grin, not concerning herself with the worries of the pathetic witchdoctor. The only issue she had now was whether her clothes were affected by her growth too.

She looker down at the body which had crushed the weasel many times to check for her clothes...

Georgia gets a different blessing.

“Pff, what else ya got?” Georgia asked, already content with her current height and strength.
“Hmm, well what about...?”

“I give ya a blessing which makes Texas fall in love with ya?”

155312132232.title: Georgia gets a different blessing.

choices: She tries to escape.
She waits for the strange woman to return.
1553122.content:
Texa's job was hectic enough without the threat of a bounty hunter hanging over her head. She had a good track record with dealing with their kind, but one stray pot shot could spell then end for her while on the line of duty. The brave sheriff wasn't going to sit idly by and wait for them to make their move. She was going to seek out this would-be hitman and leave them beaten and hogtied outside of the mayor's office as a warning. With that goal in mind, she set off for the old coal mine.

Her nose crinkled as she approached the aged cavern, the familiar smell of dust and soot filling her lungs. She was certainly no stranger to this type of environment. Prior to becoming a sheriff, she cut her teeth working as a coal miner as a teenager. It didn't pay well and the hours were rough but there were very few alternatives for employment in such a small town. It was a chapter of the sheriff's life that she would much rather forget. The sweltering heat, the lack of clean air, the backbreaking labor; it was like being trapped in the back of Georgia's pants, except it didn't happen on rare occasion.

As she traveled down the deserted tunnels of the old mine, something caught her attention. Through the piercing silence her ears could easily pick up on any sudden disturbances. She could hear a very faint footsteps steadily approaching her. Normally she would've assumed that it was just some worker who had come in early, but her intuition told her otherwise. These were not the footsteps of just some average joe. They were light, quick, and barely audible; the footsteps of a trained killer.

"Awright, that's far enough. Take one more step and ah'll open fire!" Texas threatened.

Her words did nothing to impede the approaching threat and as it drew closer the sheriff could vaguely make out its silhouette. It stood a good four or five feet over Texas' and it's rather bulky looking frame was obscured by a cloak of some kind. A growing tension filled the air as the figure stepped out of the shadows, revealing itself in full under the dim glow of the nearest lantern. Texas had hoped to get a good look at her killer, but its face was obscured by plain white mask. The sheriff quickly drew her gun, aiming dead center between the stranger's eyes.

"Ah said that's far enough--"

Texas' words died in her throat as a the figure bolted towards her, moving with speed that should've been impossible for one so large. The sheriff's brain was given no time to process the oncoming threat, but her body reflexively responded by firing off two shots. The cloaked behemoth averted the bullets with ease as he jumped to the side and clung to the wall in a hunched over position. It bounced from the wall to the top of the ceiling and back onto the ground, inches away from Texas' face. Before she could fire another shot, the figure reached out and snatched the pistol out of her hand.

Texas watched in horror it crushed her gun in it's massive gloved hand and tossed its crumpled remains to the side. Soon, fear gave way to anger fueled determination as she pounced on her attacker, her teeth gritted as she threw a fierce haymaker at its masked face. Like before, the figure managed to side step her attack with little effort, though Texas refused to let up as she threw punch after punch. Whomever this person was, they needed to pay for destroying her favorite handgun.

Eventually the cloaked figure had grown tired of dodging and decided to act as it delivered a swift jab to Texas' nose, sending the lawman flying back. Everything was a blur for the sheriff as she struggled to collect herself, though her attacker would give her no time to recoperate before it was on her again. A massive foot came down on Texas, with enough force to pin her down without causing serious harm to her. With her hand clutched on her aching nose, the she looked up at the imposing figure with wide eyes.

Whomever this person was, they were a cut above the usual thugs that Vivian set her way. She'd lost her fair share of fights, but very rarely did her opponent beat her with skill alone. Her typical foes tended to rely on brute force and deception to get the better of her, so she wasn't quite prepared to deal with someone who could outdo her in a fair fight.

Huh... the mayor spared no expense this time around... she thought morosely.

The cloaked figure wasted no time as it removed its foot from her chest and flipped the sheriff over into a face down position. Texas couldn't see what it was doing, but she could feel her wrists and legs getting tied up. She began to speak out in defiance towards the mysterious figure, but a gag slipped over her mouth the moment she opened it. The bounty hunter then slung her over its massive shoulder and made its way out of the mine.

Texas shuddered at what was to come. She had been beaten handily and was being delivered to Mayor Vivian's doorstep. The irony of this situation wasn't lost on her, as she remembered having envisioned this scenario but in reverse. She could only imagine what sort of twisted games that sinister lynx had in store for her, but before she could even steel herself for the horrors that awaited her, things took an unexpected turn.

The cloaked figure walked right past the mayor's office. Texas raised a brow and glanced down at the bounty hunter in confusion. She tried to inquire as to wear it was taking her, but she could do little more than mumble with the gag in her mouth. She was carried away from Vivian's office and eventually out of Gold Springs altogether. Texas began to wonder if they'd ever reach their destination, though it wasn't long before the bounty hunter came to a sudden stop. The sheriff raised a brow and looked forward, her confusion only doubling at what she saw.

It was a trailer. A double wide, two story trailer parked out half a mile outside town. Judging by the size of the door, it was clearly intended for use by larger attendants, like her assailant. For someone physically imposing, she wasn't expecting this to be its base of operations.

The bounty hunter opened the door to pitch black, though it must've been used to the dark as it entered and shut the door behind it, leaving them in complete darkness. Texas yelped as her bound body fell to the floor with a light thump. She wanted to complain about the shoddy treatment, but that was the least of her concerns at the moment. She was trapped, alone and in the dark with no way to defend herself. With Vivian she knew to expect the worse, but she had no idea what this stranger had in store for her.

She heard a the click of a light switch and as the darkness dispersed the sheriff finally got good look at her surroundings. Once again, the sheriff was surprised by what she saw. Her trailer had a rather homey feel to it, with floral wall paper, potted plants, bookshelves, two sofas, a coffee table and several photos adorning the walls. It was just so... normal looking, not at all like she was expecting.

She was so absorbed in her environment that she didn't notice the figure reaching down until she felt its hands graze her neck slightly. She felt the gag slip out of her mouth, though the binds around her limbs remained. With her ability to speak given back to her, she decided to try and reason with this mysterious stranger.

"L-look, ah don't know what Vivian's payin' ya but--"

"Paying me?" the figure responded, its voice so light and feminine that Texas was completely struck silent. "No one's paying me, ya silly goose! I took this job for free!" it said before letting out a cute, snorting laugh. Texas stared up at her blankly. Today was just full of surprises for the sheriff.

"Hold on, let me get settled in a bit"

The bounty hunter undid her cloak and tossed it to the side, finally exposing herself to Texas. Her attire beneath the cloak consisted of a pair of denim jeans stretched their very limit by her thick hips and a tanktop that barely seemed up to the task of containing her massive breasts. How this woman managed to hide such features with little more than a cloak was a mystery to Texas. She then removed her mask, revealing a plump, youthful face with large buck teeth and a cute button nose.

"Much better! Now let's get you nice an' cozy" she said as she reached down and hoisted the sheriff up by the scruff of her neck and gently sitting her down onto a sofa. "Which doya prefer, tea or coffee? If ya got a hankerin' fer some hot chocolate, I got plenty of it!" she giggled as she stepped into her large walk-in kitchen. As she turned her back to the sheriff, Texas' could see the large flat beaver tail wagging behind her.

"C-coffee's fine..." Texas stammered as she fidgeted uncomfortably. She wasn't sure what to make of this bizarre woman, but her overly friendly demeanor put her even more on edge. In her experience, the friendlier the criminal the more like it was that they had a screw loose in their heads. Still, the sheriff couldn't help but be curious by her eccentric behavior and was tempted to stay and see what she had in store for her.
1553122.title: Texas investigates the rumors about the bounty ...

choices: ... go take a shower.
...go to bed.
15531222.content:
Texas sighed and slumped back in her seat. It wasn't like she could escape in her present condition and try as she might, she couldn't do away with the rope tied around her wrists. Until an opportunity presented itself, she had no other choice but to sit and wait. With nothing else to do she began to do, she went surveying the beaver anthro's home, specifically the pictures she had hung up. Most of there of other beavers, presumably family. From the corner of her eye, she spotted something very peculiar.

On the far end of the living room there a framed snippet of a newspaper. It was too far away for her to read, but that wasn't what caught her attention. The photo accompanying the picture was of her with her foot propped up on the beaten body of a cattle rustler. She had dealt with so many lawbreakers that she could scarcely remember half of the men she put away, but she could tell by her leaner build that it was a photo from her early days as Sheriff of Gold Springs.

"Alright, here we go" the stranger beaver woman said as she came back into the room with a tea tray holding two cups and a plate full of treats. She sat it down on the coffee table and dropped down onto the sofa across from the sheriff. Her hefty frame caused the trailer to shudder from her sudden descent, but by some miracle their drinks managed to stay within their respective cups.

"Ooooh, I can't believe I'm finally talkin' to Texas! Ya may not know it, I'm yer biggest fan!" she gushed excitedly.

"That's... nice. Aren't you 'spose to be a bounty hunter or something?" Texas asked cautiously.

"Oh, you betcha! Yer lookin' at the best bounty hunter in all the east coast!" the beaver woman boasted as she puffed out her chest.

"Before ya said that ya took the job for free? Why's that?"

"Why? Are ya kidding? Gettin' ta meet my idol was more'n enough for me! You shoulda seen my face when I got the contract and I saw yer name on it. Boy howdy, I couldn't sleep for days!" she laughed.

"Yer gonna have to slow down a bit, 'cus ah'm still trying to catch up. Who are ya and how do ya know who ah am?"

"Oh my gosh, I'm such a clod! All this excitement and I haven't even gotten around to introducing myself! Sally Mayflower, professional bounty hunter!" she said extending her hand out. It took a minute for her to realize that the sheriff was in to position to shake hands and she quickly pulled it back with a sheepish smile.

"Texas. Now ya mind answerin' mah second question?"

"Oh, that's easy. I've been hearin' about ya ever since you became sheriff!" she said pointing to the newspaper on the wall. "Back up north, yer somethin' of a folk hero! We read all about yer adventures and whatnot! Ever since I were a teen I wanted to be just like ya!

"So... ya became a bounty hunter?" Texas asked raising a brow.

"Hey, it's what I'm good at and it pays the bills... most of the time. This time I didn't mind doing the job fer nothin'" she said before taking a sip of her coffee. "Don't be shy, help yourself. It isn't poisoned or anything" she joked.

Before Texas could snap back at her for yet again failing to realize that she was tied up, Sally reached over the table and grabbed her cup, bringing it to Texas' lips. She wanted to keep her mouth shut tight in fear of it actually being in any way contaminated, but the heavily aroma wafting near her nose was too tempting to ignore. She took a sip and let out an involuntary moan at the rich flavor that hit her tongue.

"I knew ya'd like it. That's the good stuff. Imported from Greece, dontcha know!"

"It's... it's good" the sheriff conceded as a half smile touched her face.

"I got plenty if yer ever in the mood fer some more. I also got a whole buncha soda pop in the fridge. Got of rum too, if that's more yer thing!" she prattled excitedly. The slightest bit of approval from her idol seemed to perk her up considerably. If it weren't the hostile circumstances that led up to their meeting, Texas could even call it cute. But one thought soon entered her mind as she sipped away at her coffee.

"So... when uh... when do ya'll plan on lettin' me go?"

"Never!" the beaver woman chimed happily.

"Ah'm sorry, Ah didn't quite catch that... what did you just say?" Texas asked narrowing her eyes a bit.

"Oh, I can't ever let ya go. See, when I said I took this job fer free, I was stretchin' the truth just a teensy bit. Yer actually my payment for the job" she said as she set their cups down and jumped to her feet. "That's a pretty sweet trade off, idnit? Ol' Vivian has ya outta her hair and I get to be with my hero fer the rest of my life!" she giggled.

"Y-you... you can't do that! Ah ain't no trophy! Ah'm a person!" Texas cried.

Sally just smiled as she reached down and picked the sheriff up, bringing her into her massive chest in a bone crushing embrace. The air was forced from Texas' lungs, though she hesitated in trying to take in air as the beaver's fur carried the musky scent of week old sweat. Her head was practically buried between Sally's boulder like tits, and she began to feel light headed. A large hand pulled her head back, giving her a chance to breath as she was forced to look up into Sally's face. There was no malice behind the eyes of her starstruck fan, but there was an undercurrent of intensity in her gaze. This woman like Texas. She passionately, intensely liked Texas.

"Dontcha worry none. You'll have all the food you can ever want, and I'll keep ya nice and clean" she said softly.

"Sally, ah really don't think--"

Texas hoped to appeal to the crazed woman, but was silenced as she was shoved deep down the giant beaver's cleavage. Sally cooed affectionately as she hugged stomach pressing her breasts together and unintentionally crushing the sheriff flat.

"Yer gonna love bein' here..." she whispered happily. With her prize secure, Sally decided to...
15531222.title: A Professional Bounty Hunter... Named Sally

choices: Sally finishes up and takes her to her room.
The massage gets a bit... steamy.
155312221.content:
Texas kicked and pushed against the sweat slick walls of Sally's cleavage, her outrage giving her newfound strength as she struggled to free herself from her binds. It was one thing for Vivain to sic the likes of Georgia and Roxxie on her, but for her to hire this lunatic to essentially hold Texas hostage for the rest of her life, she had gone one step too far. As soon as she got out of this situation, she planned on making a beeline over the the mayor's office and giving her beating of a lifetime, consequences be damned. It's not like she didn't have a case against her, as Sally outright admitted to being under her payroll.

The sheriff's struggles came to quick halt as her nose caught whiff of a most unpleasant stench. She'd been so caught up in escaping her confinement that she didn't notice the musky odor that seemed etched into her captor's fur. It wasn't the worse smell she'd ever endured, but it was just bad enough to make her nose crinkle and her eyes water.

"Damn, dontcha ever wash up?! Smells like somethin' died in here!" she cried out in a muffled voice. Somehow Sally picked up on her words as she blushed bright with embarrassment.

"I know I know, I must stink somethin' fierce. Dis body'o mine ain't built for all this heat. Shoot, back up north 60 degrees is considered a heatwave, dontcha know!" she giggled as wiped the sweat from her brow. "Plus all dat time I spent waitin' fer ya in the mine built up a bit of a sweat"

Before Texas could complain any further, her environment began to shake and jiggle wildly, indicating that Sally was on the move. On the outside, her captor was running up the stairs of her home up to the second floor where her bathroom resided. She was quite unlike the other thugs and brutes that the sheriff encountered, as she was quite self-conscious about her body odor and struggled to keep herself smelling fresh at all times. It ultimately proved a fruitless endeavor as her enormous body was quick to perspire and it was rather difficult to get the scent out of her fur.

By the time the quaking stopped, Texas was left completely dazed and disheveled, so much so that she offered no resistance as Sally's hand reached in and pulled her out by the scruff of her neck fur. It took a second for her eyes to readjust themselves but once they did she saw that she was in what appeared to be a large bathroom. Much like the rest of her home, it had a cozy feel to it with rustic wooden walls and toiletries. Texas was out on her morning patrol during what seemed like a relatively quiet day in Gold Springs, when there came a commotion from the town gates. Many a traveler passed through the gates of Gold Spring, some innocent travelers and some much less innocent, but none traveled like this.

At first glance it seemed like a normal covered wagon, but the strange part of it wasn't the wagon itself; it was who was pulling it. A two rows of women three long were tied together by harnesses and stocks, clad in nothing more than rags. They were all beaten and haggard, with vacant expressions, all pulling the wagon like they were common beats of burden. Sitting in the driver's seat of the wagon was a black bull, one a good head taller than even the largest man in Gold Springs and covered in muscle. He wore a ten gallon atop his horns and a pair of assless chaps, but nothing else. His knee-length cock was on full display for anyone who dared to look.

Texas pulled up in front of him to stop his wagon, "Alright stranger, state yer business!"

The bull laughed, "Stranger?! You honestly gonna say you don't know Black Brass when you see 'em? I'm insulted."

"And I don't care! I said state yer business." Texas said once again.

"Not one for titles, huh bitch?" Brass snorted, "Well I'm here to collect any fine pieces of meat you got. Like the ones here." He cracked his reigns and his slave girls whimpered, "And if any y'all got beef with me, you tell your sheriff to come hash it out."

Texas drew her gun, "I'm sheriff around here, so you'll answer to me!"

Brass laughed, "Is that so? Well let me tell you somethin', little missy. Womenfolk like you aren't fit to be sheriff. You know what happened to the last woman who thought she were good enough to be sheriff and talk back to Black Brass?"

Brass leaned to the side in his seat and cut a wet, sloppy sounding fart. He reached under his ass and pulled out, by the ears, a black rabbit. She was nude, terrified and soaked head to toe in filth. It was obvious that Brass had been keeping her in there deep. He threw her to the ground, then hopped off the wagon. The rabbit tried to crawl away, but Brass came down on her like a lead weight, crushing her flat. He ground his hooves into her and snorted.

"So since yer so bold," He said, "I'm gonna tell you what I'm gonna do. I'm gonna go in this here saloon and have me a drink. When I'm done, you and I are gonna have us a duel. And when you lose, I'm gonna make you lick my last buttplug off my hooves before I make you her replacement."

And with that, Brass swaggered into the saloon, leaving Texas to contemplate her fate

They kept exchanging massive blows, neither brute giving an inch. Slowly they paced away from the saloon and into the street, a crowd forming around the two, cheering them on. The fighting went on for minutes, both the mare an the bull collecting bruises but refusing to back down. As the blows started to slow the crowd quickly dissipated before the brutes might turn their attention on them. The two kept landing hits, but they were weaker and weaker. Neither of them wanted to be the first to give up. But after another handful of minutes they had come to a standstill, too tired to even throw a punch. Impressed by the mare, Black Brass tried his best to speak, breathing heavily from the brawl.

"I'll say... You've got... quite some fight in ya... Not bad..." He stammered, taking a few more deep breaths to catch his wits.

"You ain't so bad yourself." Georgia wiped a bit of blood from her mouth, impressed by the bull's prowess.

"I've never met a woman like you. Most of 'em are well..." He gestured to his wagon and the scrawny assortment of worn-out women in front of it.

"Ah'm one of a kind." The massive mare proudly boasted. "Now let's get outta the road before Texas barges in to complain."

"Texas? Wait, you mean that weasel?" Black Brass said, raising a bruised eyebrow.

"What? You met her before?" Georgia sighed. Was that damn sheriff's reputation spreading beyond Gold Springs? It should be the mare who's name is heard and feared far and wide.

"Met her? I rammed that scrawny bitch right up my ass! She tried to mess with the wrong bull today!" He said proudly. Georgia's jaw nearly hit the floor. Some part of her was sad that someone had beaten her to it, but when the consequences of his actions finally got through to the mare she was over the moon with happiness.

"You know what this means?! Now ah can get Vivian to promote me to sheriff!" She cheered.

The bull visibly and audibly retched with disgust. "What, you want to be some no-good lawful-" Again he was cut off by the mare.

"Lawful? Ya don't know me yet, but lemme tell ya that ah intend to anythin but lawful when ah'm sheriff." Georgia said with a cruel smirk. Black Brass was enamored. The massive mare before him was strong, stubborn and always hungry for power. The womanizing bull felt his heartrate quicken as she rambled on about her plans as sheriff. For the first time in years the bull felt the warmth of love radiating from within. Could this enormous mare really be the one? He felt compelled to tag along as Georgia started walking towards the town hall.

"So... uhm..." He stammered, realizing now he never caught her name. "Georgia." the mare snapped.

"So Georgia. With you as the soon-to-be sheriff, do you want to have... some fun together?

There sure were a lot of dang villains and outlaws in this town, and part of the reason for that was Annabelle and her 'perfectly law-abiding bar.' Maybe it was time Texas stormed that place and shut it down for good.

155342.content:
As dusk settled on the little town of Gold Springs, and sunlight was replaced by the dim glow of lamplight, Texas yawned and pushed her hat up from over her eyes. While she did have a bed in the upstairs portion of the sheriff's office, she personally preferred napping at her desk, her gun and lasso within easy reach in case of sudden emergencies. It certainly wasn't comfortable by any means, but her job wasn't really a comfortable one, so she saw it as a good fit. After standing up and stretching out her aching limbs, the weasel gave a tired sigh and headed for the door, ready for her night patrol.

Stepping out into the town at night, she instantly shivered as the biting night wind blew through her. The temperature dropped so quickly as night fell, but as the weasel began to walk, she figured that was Gold Springs in a nutshell. A town of extremes. Hot and cold, big and small, good and evil, this place didn't seem to do anything in moderation. Musing as she strolled through the streets, the weasel heard the muted sounds of laughter and music coming from the saloons, where most of the citizenry retired in the evening before heading home, the noise barely cutting through the still night air. Up ahead, the warm lights of L'Odeur Séduisante, the town's all-skunk brothel, spilled out onto the streets. As she approached, a few of the curvacious skunk girls began to approach, hoping to lure her inside, but as they saw the light glinting off her badge, they quickly turned up their noses haughtily, heading back into the light and the warmth of the brothel's common room.

Shaking her head, Texas moved on, but as she did, she couldn't help but feel that she was being followed. Turning, the weasel looked back the way she had come, but the lights from the brothel had ruined her night vision. She fancied that, just for a split second, she had seen something dart back into an alleyway, but she couldn't really say for sure... Still, it wouldn't hurt to go looking, would it? Or she could just continue the patrol. Or maybe even head back into the brothel, and see what the Madame knew about the disappearances. Texas and Lucy weren't on great terms, what with the curvy skunk being on Vivian's payroll, but at least she wasn't as outright hostile as some of the girls around here...
155342.title: Rats in the Dark

choices: Stand and fight!

1553421.content:
Better safe than sorry. Texas began to move up to the dark alleyway, before rounding the corner and seeing... nothing. The small street was dark, but open at the other end, and the weasel could see everything inside it silhouetted against the moonlight reflected off the desert sands beyond. Shaking her head a little, Texas stepped inside and walked down a distance, just to be sure, then froze as something snickered in the darkness. The weasel's hand dropped to her lasso as she suddenly heard the chitting and snickering of multiple creatures around her, and looking up, she just managed to catch a glimpse of something watching her from the rooftops before it quickly pulled away. This was a trap, and she needed to get out of here right now.

Wheeling around, Texas moved to sprint out the way she came, then stopped dead in her tracks. As she had spun around, she had come face-to-face with a white skull mask, a pair of crazed, yellow-red eyes, and a wide, jagged, toothy grin. The weasel gasped and instantly took a step back, while the huge rat, at least ten feet tall and about as wide with fat, chuckled and straightened up.

"Molly..." Texas hissed. Of course. Who else could it have been? The weasel had hoped to not see, or smell, the rat for a while after her last defeat, but it seemed that she had dragged herself up out of her lair much more quickly than Texas had anticipated.

"Hello, weasel..." The huge rat hissed, advancing the half-step that Texas had taken backwards, and letting her oppressive odour wash over Texas. As always, the rat bore a general miasma all around her, smelling like she bathed in a mixture of sweat and raw sewage. "You shouldn't be walking these streets all alone..." She chuckled in her unnerving, chittering manner, "Haven't you heard? It's dangerous at night..."

Texas, her blood running cold, glanced behind her. The end of the alleyway wasn't too far, but Molly had her pack of rat mooks and her own voodoo powers to try and stop her. On the other hand, Molly wasn't a particularly good fighter, though she was tricky. While in the dark she seemed to be able to move impossibly quickly, or sometimes seeming like she even teleported around, and there was still her magic to contend with, as well as her aura of stench. If Texas did fight her, she would need to fight smart.
