She had a briefcase full of interested killers that could keep Molly occupied for years to come. And if they somehow succeeded the fat rat would be gone for good. But right now all she wanted to know is how many enthralled henchmen were on the other side of this wall. Nothing, not a footstep to be heard. Perfect.

The shambling horde closed in, only to see Vivian reach over to a nearby bookcase and activate a lever. A panel of the wooden wall opened up and she ran off, closing the secret door behind her.

As she ran through the hall, the mayor could smell the perfidious stench of rat breath lingering in the air. It fogged her mind a little, but failed to do much more. She all but crashed through the back door and made a run for the stables. She could hear footsteps behind her as her henchmen had found other ways of getting back on her trail, shambling slowly out of the mansion. She had a considerable headstart, though she wasn't quite prepared for the horrifying scene inside the stables.

They were almost completely abandoned, with only her trusty stable-hand left. His eyes had turned black like her enthralled minions, but fortunately he wouldn't be much of a threat. His body had been flattened thin as a sheet, no doubt Molly's handiwork. Far worse were the horses. All of them had been let out. Vivian frantically looked around. That fat bitch had cut off her main escape route. Or had she? One horse was still left. It was the horse that carried her here. It looked haggard, but with the looming threat of Molly nearby the mayor couldn't afford to be picky. She threw a saddle on its back faster than she'd ever thought possible and by the time her henchmen started banging on the stable doors she was ready to go.

Vivian charged away through the small crowd, knocking them aside. Thankfully her horse still had enough stamina to carry her to her next secret hideout. She had a contingency for every occasion, and this would be no different. It would be a left turn at the next crossroads, but her horse seemed to have a different plan. It turned right, racing down a road further into some farmland.

"Hey! What gives?! Turn around you stupid animal!" She snarled, pulling on the reins. But the horse had become completely unresponsive to her commands. It's only reaction was to gallop even faster. It turned another sharp right, sprinting into an open cow pasture. Vivian's eyes went wide as she saw the voodoo rat standing ahead of her in the field, arms wide open and a cruel smile on her face. Molly was still quite far away, but the horse was sprinting so fast the mayor couldn't risk jumping off without badly hurting herself and making her easy prey for the fat rat.

Molly laughed, seeing her nemesis come charging towards her. She leaned down a little, ready to absorb what would come next. The horse ran towards her at full speed, a collision inevitable. But the large voodoo rat had several tons of weight over the horse and with a loud WHUMP it was brought to a standstill. Vivian was catapulted from the saddle and right into Molly's chest. The sweaty stench burned the mayor's nose and the fat rat was quick to wrap her in an inescapable hug. The horse bounced off her large body and fell onto its side. The voodoo rat quickly turned around and sat down, squashing the exhausted animal beneath her immense rear.

"Mayor! I missed you. How good to be reunited with you. I do believe our little chat hadn't quite finished." She spoke, her voice dripping with malice and glee. She squeezed Vivian tighter, forcing the mayor's head between her sweaty unwashed breasts. She ground her butt down on the horse at the same time, flattening it to ensure the mayor had no chance of escape.

"Now where did we leave off..." Molly mused aloud. "Oh yeah, I believe we were at the part where you were going to beg for me to save your pathetic little life." She cackled maniacally, pulling the mayor's head from the sweaty embrace and waiting for an answer.

"P... Please..." Vivian whimpered. She had no more escapes or plans in her back pocket. She was at the mercy of the voodoo rat and there wasn't a worse place to be in right now in all the world. She had no hope to fight off the larger and fatter bandit. "I'll give you a... anything." She wheezes out, barely able to draw a breath between Molly's crushing embrace and foul stench.

"Anything?" Molly repeated, a second, booming dark voice echoing alongside her own.
15534231311221221111213233121.title: Vivian manages to slip past her henchmen

choices: Try and sneak out.
Stay put and not risk angering Molly.
One of Molly's minions comes in before she can make her decision.
155342313112212211112132331212.content:
"Y-yes...!" Vivian cried as she could feel Molly's grip slackening slightly. "I've got connections! I... I can get you anything you've ever wanted! Money, power, anything!"

Molly couldn't help but laugh at the mayor's pathetic grovelling. All of the bravado and confidence she had shown in their first confrontation was gone in the face of her impending demise. It just went to show that no matter how much power people claimed to have, they were all helpless before her own power. Their delusions of authority was an affront to beings like her and as such, she saw fit to put them in their place. She roughly caressed the back of the lynx's head, not-so-subtly emphasizing the discrepancy between them in strength.

"What use does someone like me have for money? If I want something, I take it. As for your other offer... well, as you've seen, I'm plenty powerful... or do you mean that phony type of power that weaklings like you constantly cling to? The kind where you give me a fancy title and expect people to obey me based on that alone? If that's the case, I may have to punish you for just for having the temerity of offering me something so useless..."

"N-no! Please, I... t-t-there has to be something that I can offer you! Just tell me what you want!" the mayor pleaded.

Her heartfelt plea seemed to fall on deaf ears as Molly's smile widened into a frightening grin. A tense silence hung on the air as the rat's unblinking eyes seemed to pierce right through her. It in that moment, staring into those crazed bloodshot eyes, that Vivian experienced the sensation of fear. No one, not Annabelle, not Madame Lucy, not even her arch nemesis Texas, could elicit such a response from her. This monster of a woman was unlike any other rival she'd had in the past. Despite her manic and crazed demeanor, she boasted a strategic mind that surpassed even her own. That fact alone made the mayor fear her.

Molly could feel the dread building in Vivian's heart, her thick tongue licking her chops as she drank it in. There was a distinct pleasure she derived from breaking people mentally, watching their confidence die as it eventually dawned on them just how helpless they were before her. As far as she was concerned, the lynx's demise was a foregone conclusion. She wouldn’t end it all right then and there though. The lynx didn’t deserve such mercy after acting all haughty before. No, her punishment would be long and agonizing. By the time she was done with the mayor, she’d be on her hands and knees pleading to have her life snuffed out beneath the rat’s mighty derriere.

Vivian was dropped to the ground abruptly, though before she could scramble to freedom, Molly’s meaty paw grabbed a fistful of her hair. She cried out in pain as she was dragged through the empty field, her eyes going wide as she saw her steed’s flattened, unconscious body. She immediately silenced her screaming as Molly glanced over her shoulder and gave her an intense glare. Painful as it was, this was the closest the rat would come to showing restraint. If she so wanted, she could’ve stored the lynx in her stomach or between deep inside her hellish buttcrack. Thankfully, her silence was only answered with a grunt as Molly continued on her merry way.

It took everything Vivian had to keep from tearing up at her predicament. She did nothing to instigate Molly’s wrath yet she was going to be tortured in the most painful manner possible. The injustice of it all was staggering. She was dragged back into town with Molly sticking to the shadows in order to avoid detection. The risk of getting caught meant next to nothing for her but she wasn’t in the mood to deal with any would-be heroes. The smell of sweat and dirt hit the mayor’s nose in an instant once they reached their destination. Molly’s perpetual odor was already strong enough to make the eyes water, so it only stood to reason that her lair would carry that same pungent stench.

“Let me show you something, Vivian. This is what real power looks like…” Molly said with a snicker snapping her fingers. A very slight rumbling could be heard, the sounds dozens of feet treading through the dirt covered tunnels of Molly’s lair. Vivian was painfully held up in front of the rat by her hair and she was stunned to see the rat’s manic henchmen all present and accounted for. Their bodies were littered with wounds, some of them struggling to stand under their own power after having the roof collapse on top of them. The mayor would’ve thought that they would hold some contempt towards their leader for causing their injuries, but they stared upon Molly with a shared reverence unlike anything she’d ever seen.

“See the look in their eyes? See the love they have for me? That’s a type of love that comes from respecting the natural order of things. The strong rule and the weak serve. They know it and they embrace it. No matter what I do, they’ll keep serving me… because they can only be happy when their master is happy. You’re not too far off from sharing that belief yourself, but you seem to be confused regarding where your place is in that order. You think having money makes you powerful enough to rule…”

She gave the mayor one quick shake, forcing a pained yelp from her as she felt her hair getting tugged at the roots. She could feel their eyes running up and down her body, no doubt envisioning all of the cruel acts of perversion they could engage in with her. Molly grinned as she could practically smell the fear emitting from Vivian.

“What do you think would happen if I threw you over to them? Do you think your money would save you? Do you think they would respect your fancy title and leave you alone? Why don’t we find out if your ‘power’ holds any real weight, hm?”

“NO!” Vivian cried out, her eyes turning wide as dinner plates as she looked back at Molly. “Please… I’m sorry for ever thinking I had any real power! If you let me go, I’ll step down as mayor and you won’t ever see me again!” she pleaded.

“Like I care about you being mayor!” the rat laughed. “No, I’m just trying to make a point. Funny as it would be so see my minions use you as their plaything, I’m still in the process of figuring out just what to do with you”

Her minions parted as their mistress walked by them, the mayor swung over her shoulder as though she were a towel. The lynx wept silently as she was brought to Molly’s private chambers and dumped unceremoniously onto the rat’s filthy sweat stained bed.

“You be a good girl and stay here while I go fetch some things” Molly ordered flatly before walking out and shutting the door behind her. She didn’t appear to be overly concerned with securing Vivian, though the lynx could hardly blame her. The only thing she had to fall back on were the contracts in their briefcase and even if she were to somehow escape, Molly would hunt her down before she could even make use of them. Still, she couldn’t stand being in such a helpless position. A woman of her class having to sit in a filthy hovel, hoping that her captor was in a good enough mood to spare her life.

That disgusting rat, she fumed. If I get out of this alive, I swear I’ll have her sent to the gallows!

Morbid as it was, she found a bit of amusement imagining the sheriff’s office trying to hang Molly and having the rope break the second the trap went off. It certainly wouldn’t have been the first time that something like that happened, what with a fair amount of the populace being hefty in their stature. Of course, public executions stopped occurring once that bleeding heart yokel Texas took over.

“Wait a minute… Texas…!” Vivian murmured as a thought struck her.

As much as she despised the weasel, she was the only person she knew to have stood toe to toe with Molly and lived to tell the tale. Surely she would be able to lend aid to the mayor! That thought would have to wait, as she'd have to think of a way to escape Molly’s clutches, although she wasn’t certain if that would do more harm than good were she to get caught. She didn’t have a lot of time to think things over, so after weighing the pros and cons, Vivian decided to...
155342313112212211112132331212.title: Molly takes Vivian back to her lair

choices: The endless depths of her maw
The unwashed horror of her pussy
The harrowing contents of her bag of things
1553423131122122111121323312121.content:
If she'd try to slip away and got caught, Molly wouldn't hesitate to torment her to death in this hellhole. But staying put would probably have the same effect. Maybe the fat rat would be a little nicer about it, but that really didn't change the fact that if Vivian didn't get out of here this would be the end for her. Accepting her fate was never her strong point. She didn't scheme and plot all these years just to perish in some smelly hovel at the hands of a paranoid rat.

With all the confidence she could muster the mayor opened the bedroom door and began to walk for the exit. The rat warren was a maze of tunnels with no kind of signs anywhere. The winding passages scrambled her sense of direction. She just had to follow her instincts and her nose. If the foul stench got weaker she was probably nearing an exit. She made some progress before she stopped in her tracks. Footsteps up ahead. Not heavy enough to be Molly herself, but definitely a group of rats. She turned around to hide when more steps were heard coming from the other direction too. With no other passages in this narrow tunnel Vivian began to panic. She was about to get caught. She pushed herself up against the wall and hoped it would be over quick.

The first pack of rats came into view and though they all saw the mayor whimpering softly they gave her no more than a quick glance, never even slowing their pace. Was this a trick by Molly? Why didn't they raise the alarm? Were they really so obedient they could no longer fathom the mere concept of going against Molly's orders? Whatever it was, Vivian breathed a small sigh of relief. She wasn't about to risk letting herself be seen though. These guys might've been passive, but who knows how the other rats might react. The current pack was still closing in and a new problem presented itself. Though Molly was the fattest and widest rat by a significant margin and easily able to navigate these tunnels, this group of rats together was filling the whole tunnel. And they were making no efforts to clear a gap in their formation for the mayor.

"Hmmmf." She groaned as the hefty flank of one of the rats brushed harshly against her, pressing her against the dirt walls. Was this the kind of wringer that Texas so often was put through? Vivian was surprised the weasel hadn't quit much sooner if this was her job. Worse yet, she's fairly certain the smelly rat is leaning into her just for that little added pressure and humiliation. She took a moment to regain her bearings after that painful event. The steps behind her were still closing in and she was in no mood to get squashed between more rat bodies and dirt walls.

With each step closer to the exit Vivian couldn't believe her fortune. There was barely a rat present between her and freedom bar that unfortunate little incident a moment ago. She began to think on Molly's words. She had a terrifying presence, commanding total obedience from her minions. If only there was a way to channel that herself. She'd have no need for a sheriff anymore, or henchmen. Everyone would do as she pleased whenever she demanded it. Wouldn't that be amazing... She grinned a little wider as a thin ray of what looked to be daylight shone from the next tunnel. She was getting so close. But as she turned the corner her heart skipped a beat.

Sitting at the far end was Molly, a cruel grin on her face and a little mirror in her hand. She played with it, reflecting some light from a nearby torch into the mayor's eyes. Vivian froze up, the hairs on her neck standing on end. Sitting on the ground next to the voodoo rat was a large doctor's bag. It was richly embroidered with all kinds of strange symbols, little trinkets and totems hanging from the handles. But the biggest blow of all was the distinct shape of the bedroom door right next to Molly. She had wandered in a circle and ended up right where she started.

"Aaaah, hold that face. That's the defeat I'm looking for. You will not set foot outside my home without my permission. Now get back where you belong or I will have you empty the cesspit with your bare hands. I'm sure the remains of your little sentry will be happy to see you again." Molly chuckled, patting her belly. Vivian's expression was one of horror. What was that vile beast inferring?

"He got off easy. Not unlike you... or your little associate." The voodoo rat said threateningly, standing up and grabbing the doctor's bag. She opened the bedroom door, but when the mayor tried to obey and enter the voodoo rat grabbed her head and pressed it into her blubbery, unwashed belly. Vivian gave some token resistance before hearing a muffled, bloodcurdling shriek echo from the rat's depths. Her blood ran cold. There was someone in there.

"Oh yes, your little friend Penelope is having a great time experiencing her worst fears over and over again until I tire of her and permit her to digest. Now on you go... it's your turn." Molly muses as she shoves Vivian into the bedroom. She follows her in, snapping her fingers to close the door and lock it.

"There, no further disturbances. Now it's just little you and all of me." Her gleeful smirk and unflinching stare sapped the last of the mayor's nerve. But before she could break down into a tearful plea for mercy the fat rat gave Vivian a frightening look at...
1553423131122122111121323312121.title: Vivian tries to sneak out

choices: Molly places the dolls somewhere else on her body.
Molly goes looks through her bag again.
Molly grabs Vivian and tosses her back onto the bed.
15534231311221221111213233121213.content:
Molly's gaze didn't leave the mayor for a second, not even as she knelt down and rummaged through her sinister looking bag. Her already big grin stretched even wider as she pulled out a doll. It wasn't just any doll however. It was a crude looking recreation of the Vivian, patched together in what had to have been in ten minutes. The sight of it brought the lynx to her knees in sheer terror. She wasn't nearly as well versed in the dark arts as Molly, but she knew enough to recognize a voodoo doll when she saw one.

"Please... don't..." the mayor whimpered as tears flowed freely down her face. Any concerns about maintaining her dignity were tossed to the wayside at that moment.

"What're you crying about? You don't even know what I'm going to do to you yet!" Molly laugh as she walked over to her bed and took a seat at the edge.

"Sit" she ordered, pointing down to the ground in front of her.

The mayor responded with fearful obedience as she crawled over to the rat, her nose curling at the odor radiating from her lower half. Looking up at the massive rat, she couldn't help but be slightly awed. For one so vile and repugnant, it was impossible to deny the otherworldly air of menace she exuded as she towered over her much smaller body. Everything about her seemed designed to inspire fear and submission, from her imposing sizes, to her blood red irises, to the intense musty odor that clung to her fur. It was no wonder that she was able to command such reverence from her minions.

"Don't you worry your pretty little head, Vivian. I'm not going to end you. Not yet, at least" the rat said with a sneer.

Vivian breathed a sigh of relief, though she quickly tensed back up as the realization hit her. Technically speaking, Penelope was another woman who Molly had chosen to keep alive. That fact alone hammered home the point that there really was no room for mercy in the sinister rat's heart.

"W-what're you going to do with me?" the lynx inquired.

"What indeed" Molly asked back with a laugh as she gently stroked the doll on its head. Vivian flinched as she felt a sudden pressure on her head, as though she were being caressed by a giant.

"On our little trip back home, I was racking my brain trying to think of a suitable punishment for you. I could've let you join Penelope, I could've sewn you to the back of my underwear, I could've given you to my minions to play with. They do get rowdy being cooped up inside all day" she said, grinning as she saw the color drain from her captive's face.

“Although the more I thought about it, the more I began to rethink things. Pathetic as you are, you’re still a cut above the usual weaklings that try to challenge my magics. That little ambush of yours actually managed to catch me off guard and that’s not a feat that even Texas can boast”

Vivian wasn’t sure how to respond as she remained silent. Was the villainous rodent praising her intelligence? She never would’ve thought her capable of having anything other than smug contempt for others, so this came as a bit of a shock.

“It isn’t often that someone manages to garner my respect, Vivian. For that, I’m going to grant you the ultimate kindness…”

Vivian was about to question what she meant when a horrid smell caused her to fall to the floor gagging. She grasped onto her throat, her eyes bulging and her lungs burning as the familiar stench of Molly’s sweat soaked cleavage seemed to completely encompass her. She looked up to see that Molly was no longer holding the voodoo doll, though she didn’t have to wonder what happened to it as she saw one of its limbs poking out of the top of her cleavage.

“That’s right, breath it in... familiarize yourself with my many scents…” she cooed as she gave her boobs a quick squeeze. Vivian groaned as the horrid smell was contrasted by the plush softness of Molly’s breasts pushing against her body. She was left frozen in place, helpless before the rat’s powers as she watched her stand up and kneel down to meet her gaze.

“Don’t worry. You’ll grow to love it eventually. You’re a lot sharper than the others, so it might take a few months” she said as she gave the mayor a pat on the head.

“W-what… what’re you… talking about…?” Vivian wheezed.

“Weren’t you listening? I told you, I’m going to grant you the ultimate kindness: a lifetime of servitude towards me” Molly explained, her voice dripping with sinister glee.

“Wait, what?!” Vivian cried, a jolt of panic induced energy running through her as she sat up.

“As I said before, there can be no greater joy for the weak than to serve the strong. Don’t act like you don’t know what I’m talking about. I saw it in your eyes when you were seated in front of me. It was that very same look that I saw in my minions when I first invited them into my flock: Fear turned to admiration…”

She narrowed her eyes, her crimson irises seeming to stare right into the mayor’s soul. There was a hypnotic quality to them, though that might’ve just been the blossoming fear taking hold of the lynx again. She cringed as she watched the rat’s large tongue slowly slither out of her mouth and trail along her cheek. It was any wonder how the lynx was able to stay conscious, with her voodoo doll forcing her to breathe in Molly’s sweat and the smell of her rancid breath inches from her nose.

“Yes… you’re going to be a fine servant. Maybe even the best…” she murmured before standing up and retrieving the voodoo doll from her cleavage. The invisible walls of flesh immediately eased off of the mayor, along with the stench. She coughed and weakling tried to crawl over to the door. Frightened as she was, her pride wouldn’t allow her to act as this disgusting woman’s lacky. She didn’t get very far before she felt something tugging against her leg and anchoring her in place. She looked back to see Molly pinching down on her legs with very little pressure.

“Ah ah, not so fast. I haven’t finished with your initiation” she said with a grin. “Once I’m done, you’ll be allowed to roam the tunnels and mingle with your new family…”

Her words made Vivian feel violently ill. If this was truly her fate, perhaps death was the more preferable option. She didn’t get a chance to say as much as the air was forced from her lungs. Molly had given the doll a good squeeze around the waist, grinning at the pained expression on Vivian’s face.

“Let’s not waste any more time” she said with a grin.
15534231311221221111213233121213.title: The harrowing contents of her bag of things

choices: Vivian is Molly's obedient little slave
Vivian is not under Molly's control. More severe measures must be taken
Vivian is still free, but pretends to be enslaved in a bid to escape
155342313112212211112132331212131.content:
"It is time for you to be reborn as a member of our great little family. Oh, the fun we'll have..." Molly laughed maliciously.

Vivian's eyes were locked onto the little doll of herself. She dreaded to think what the cruel rat had in mind and her heartbeat rose as it was lowered down. Was Molly going to stomp on it? The weasel finished, her voice raising. It was only as her shouting faded away that she noticed that the noise of the piano and the low murmuring from the patrons and skunks had gone silent. Glancing to her left, the weasel noticed the skunk by the stairs had her eyes firmly fixed on Texas, while her hand had snaked into the hidden pocket of her dress, no-doubt resting on the secret pistol that the sheriff had noticed earlier. Lucy noticed this too, and raised a hand to calm the skunk down.

"Arrêtez, Melody." Lucy said, and the skunk guard relaxed slightly, removing her hand from her weapon, though still looked quite on edge. The madame looked back to Texas and narrowed her eyes. "As for you, sheriff, I believe you have overstayed your welcome. I have tried to be hospitible, and you have thrown that back in my face. Therefore, I insist that you leave. Immediately." She said forcefully, while Texas grit her teeth. She still didn't have any information, and despite Lucy's guard, she was pretty sure she could strong-arm the skunk into telling her what she wanted to know. Lucy was a schemer, not a fighter, after all. On the other hand, that wasn't the kind of person Texas was, and lackey of the mayor or not Lucy was still a citizen of this town who Texas was sworn to protect and serve. Maybe it would be wisest just to de-escalate the situation and go back to her patrol?
15534232.title: No deal.

choices: "I might've seen somethin' like that around Molly's shack in the swamp."
"I saw your hearthtrob, Roxie, with something like that, headed to her hideout."
"Gimme some alone-time with the new girl and I'll tell ya' where it is."
155343.content:
Texas stepped out of the office, stretching her arms over her head. The day was quiet. But at risk of jumping out of her skin should that change, the sheriff kept her eyes and ears alert and her body tense.

The town doctor, Howliday, chided her that the tension would put her in an early grave sooner than a vengeful bandit with an ass to grind.

Still, it served its purpose.

But not a damned thing in the world would have prepared Texas for what happened. And the sheriff had seen some truly demented shit in her time.

She saw what looked like a mirror, but it was... floating above the street...?

Circling it, she saw one side of it was a swirling black void that felt like looking down a gulch... and the other side looked like a street... but it was clean, white, smooth, with buildings to match beyond it.

Texas' jaw hung open in confusion and awe just in time to see a wolf woman in a figure-hugging blue bodysuit come dart around the corner, shooting what looked like a pistol... if a pistol shot bolts of green light!

She couldn't move her feet, fixed in one spot, as the wolf leaped backwards through the opening, ass-first, slamming it right into Texas' face!

Both women fell to the ground as the portal closed.

Texas' face had been smooshed into many a backside in her time, but this was the first time the experience hadn't been a traumatizing one. At least to her nostrils... The black-haired, gray wolf's booty smelled of vanilla and rubber.

"Ooofh!!! Gerrof me, ya' varmint!!!" The weasel muffledly exclaimed.

The wolfess pried her generous butt off of the sheriff's face and turned around, kneeling to help up the fallen lawwoman.

"I am SO sorry about that... Look, I wasn't watching where I was-OHCRAP! It's gone AGAIN?!" The woman yowled.

"Wh-What's gone...? What again..?" The sheriff was clueless.

"My time machine! The agency's gonna paste me for sure this time! I-ohhh double-crap... I'm not even in my own time anymore... aaaaand I've just revealed I'm a time traveler to a sentient, more-or-less modern person. Super! Spectacular!" She howled.

Texas took off her glove and WHACKED the wolfess across the chops hard enough to make her torso corkscrew tightly, squishing her...!

-BRRZAP!!-

"OW! That wasn't cool!!! I don't know what barn or cave you were raised in, but you can't just hit pe-" Texas sighed and threw her own ample rump onto the blue-clad wolfess' face, smooshing her into the dirt.

-BRRZAP!!-

"Okay... SERIOUSLY not nice! Don't hit me or sit on me again!"

"Again...?" Texas mumbled. She hadn't hit her. Though she'd been thinking about it. Or sitting on her just to make her stop talking...

"Err, sorry. Short-range time backleap. Feature of the suit. Which, thanks to you, now only has two charges left. Thanks loads for that, by the way!" She huffed.

"D'ya wanna tell me just who in the Hell you are before I ACTUALLY hit you?" Texas groaned.

"Samantha Simmons, Time Enforcement Agency!" She tapped her badge, which Texas had just noticed.

"Ahh, fellow law woman, huh? Was that... window or what-have-you, your time machine?" Texas asked. She'd read Jules Verne's works but after reading 'The Time Machine', which gave her nightmares, she vowed never to broach the subject again.

Now it's here, broaching itself, like everything else in the weasel's life.

"Nope... I was being shot at when I crossed the threshold and my time machine got lost. Again... It's somewhere within a few miles, that at least I know." Samantha said.

"Well, I'm inclined to help a fellow law officer out. So let's get a move on." Texas mumbled, tipping her hat.

"I can't even begin to thank you enough! At least this time I've found a friendly face and not a bunch of stupid dinosaurs that want to mash me into paste..." Samantha breathed.

"Dinosaurs...?" Texas asked skeptically.

"Errr.... um..... Thunder Lizards? Giant bones in the badlands? Well, they belonged to massive creatures. And thanks to those stupid lizards, the academy is filled with video of me being eaten and mashed up, ground into paste, spitroasted by cannibal pigs, squashed by a giant chief and used as buttfloss before being crammed into her pucker and my personal favorite, getting chewed up and blown into a bubble by a tyrannosaurus-freaking-rex prior to being swallowed! All the timelines where I apparently screwed up got... cluttered. So there's ample time-dilation video showing all of that! From every angle! Best part, the professors MAKE ME WATCH TOO. IN FRONT OF EVERYONE... I've never been so humiliated..."

Texas listened as the futuristic wolfess carried on, wallowing in self-pity. Tex knew she wasn't the mightiest in the West, but a complainer she was not.

"I'mma ask at the saloon. Maybe someone saw your doo-hickey." Texas said.

"'The Crushed Weasel', huh? Is there a story there...?" Samantha curiously asked.

Texas' face reddened. "Yeah. A stupid one. Don't ask." She snipped, stepping up to the swinging doors.

Samantha cut in front of her. "Sorry, sorry... I've just ALWAYS wanted to do this..."

The wolfess flung open the doors dramatically... and YAPPED as they violently sprung back to slam into her with such force as to smear her across both of them. She slowly slid down, dropping into a pile of blue, gray and black mush, her gold eyes looking pitifully up at Tex, who chuckled sheepishly.

"Yeeeah, sorry about that, sugar. The fat cow what runs this place, Anna, put a mighty strong spring into the doors after she got tired of replacin' em when people opened them too fast."

-BRRZAP!-

"Oh SON OF A-!" Samantha yelled from behind Tex as the weasel carefully pushed open the doors, looking over her shoulder, holding them open a little to let the time traveler in. "S-Sorry! Just a time-traveler thing..." She mumbled, down to one charge left on her suit until she could find one of the scattered power cells.

They pair stepped in and the music stopped, the denizens staring at the pair.

"Who's the sexy little slip, Sheriff?" The obese mare propping up the bar asked after a throaty belch. "And how much is it to roll in the hay with her?"

"Ease up, deputy. Out of towner. She lost summin' pretty important." Texas said, stepping between Samantha and Georgia.

Samantha's face reddened some. Both at the insult and the implication that followed it, as well as Texas' protectiveness of her. A far cry from the prehistoric shenanigans. "Th-That's right! It's a box with a little scre-err, window on it that glows!"

Georgia smirked, looking the pair over and replied with...
155343.title: Samantha Simmons, Time Wolf, to the aid!

choices: "I won't put up with this! Georgia seemed nice. She can help me find it!"
"I'm... sorry Texas. I should've guessed it's a sensitive topic. Let's go?"
1553431.content:
The mare let out a noxious backside blast and indulged in a relaxed sigh. "Yup... Voodoo Mama Molly's penned up in Bubblegloop Swamp down the river. She said something about the box being 'from da futures' or whatever that crazy rodent said."

Samantha beamed. "Oh! Thank you, Miss Georgia!"

Texas frowned at the mare. "You're being uncharacteristically helpful... what's your angle?"

Georgia planted her hand on her voluminous chest. "Is mending my good name with the law something to be suspicious of? I'd love my old job back..."

Texas huffed. "Not a snowball's chance in your asscrack." The weasel huffed.

Samantha's brow arched upward. "Texas! That wasn't very nice..."

Georgia cackled. "Yeah, that wasn't nice at all, Sheriff. I guess it's true what they say! No good deed goes unpunished!"

Texas snarled. "You just keep doing what you're best at... drinking yourself into an early grave and filling the air with stench from your lies and ass alike."

Samantha cringed, but followed Texas outside.

"What was that all about? That's a lot of bad blood..." Samantha murmured.

Texas shot her a scowl. "Reckoned that all by yerself, eh? No wonder you're a high-falootin' time traveler!"

Samantha's face flushed and she planted her feet, fists clenched.
1553431.title: Giorgia spills the beans... from both ends.

choices: "I should give Texas another chance..."
"Right! Let's go to  this swamp and get my time machine back!"
15534311.content:
Texas huffed. "Is everyone in the future as easily butthurt, or is it just you?" The weasel snorted.

Samantha felt a pang. She had lost a lot of friends after the prehistoric debacle and she had felt a kinship with the Sheriff. Or at least the beginnings of the sparks of friendship.

The words snapped the last bit of that strand...

Samantha sniffled, wiping her eye. "Maybe we're more sensitive... But it's not because we're weak." She said, turning away from Texas, who paused, reaching after the time traveler a moment before grimacing, turning away herself and stomping back to the office.

She sat at the bar next to Georgia, who chuckled. "Breakups are always messy. Did she hit ya'?"

"As a matter of fact, she did." Samantha sighed.

Georgia gestured to Annabelle. "This girl just pissed off Texas. I'd say that's earned her a shot of whiskey, mm?"

Anna poured a double shot and slid it to Samantha, who stared at it a moment.

Georgia chuckled. "You'll wanna be careful with a big shot like-"

Samantha gulped the whole thing down, licking her chops.

"... -that. Damn..." Georgia was, in spite of herself, impressed.

She reached over, hand stroking up and down Samantha's back, daring so far down as to caress her impressive rump... "You've got some spunk, cutie. I'll give ya' that. And anyone who rebuffs that stick in the mud of a sheriff is a winner in my book."

Samantha sniffled, looking up at the mare, even leaning a bit into the stroking. "Really...?"

"Sure thing! You're a real gem. And a time traveler too, eh?" Georgia chuffed.

Samantha opened her mouth to object, but slumped against the bar. "Uh huh... guess there's no undoing the damage now. Might as well turn in my T.E.A. badge..."

Georgia smacked Samantha's ass, the glossy blue material jiggling around it. "EEP!"

"Now that ain't no kinda talk for a girl with fire in her belly. Let's get that time machine of yours back from Molly and see if we can't fix things up, eh? That backbiting sheriff of ours doesn't deserve you." The fat mare snorted.

"You think so...?" Samantha whispered, biting her lip. Texas had offered, without even knowing her, to help her find her time machine.

But then she got mean...

Samantha bit her lip. "You're about my only friend in all of creation now, Georgia."

The mare finished her beer. "Then listen to your friend. Let's go find Molly."
15534311.title: "I won't put up with this! Georgia seem...

choices: Left!
Right!
Straight!
155343112.content:
Samantha bit her lip as they strode into the sunken town of Silver Lakes and back towards the swamp that was slowly engulfing it.

"So who is this 'Molly', anyway?" Samantha tepidly asked.

"Creepy, spooky, about the most unpleasant thing you'll meet for miles. She hates the law, but more than that, she hates Texas. Now... lemme make somethin' clear here... when I say she hates her... like... I don't care for Texas because she's a stick-in-the-mud, goody-two-shoes who can't pull the stick out of her ass. I'd be fine being her deputy if she didn't ride me about 'letter of the law' this and 'drunken disorderly' that. But Molly... oooh, is Texas were on fire in the street, Molly wouldn't take a dump on her to put her out." Georgia explained.

Samantha bit her lip. "What happened between them...?"

"Texas is the only one who ever busted Molly. Busted her good too. Her whole gang brought down and her big plans to engulf Gold Springs in the same swamp that ate up Silver Lakes all down the tube. Seems Texas destroyed some important hoodoo artifact or another and Molly's never forgiven her since." The gigantic mare snorted.

The gray wolf adjusted her suit nervously, but heard a chime from her suit's readout. It had accumulated enough power for a fresh charge, giving her two.

'Phew...'

They came to a spooky looking entrance to a gooey maze and Georgia took out a tattered rag, studying it. "Okaaaaay... so left, left, right, left, right, right, straight, left, right..." She mumbled.

"Molly gave me directions for the maze. It's pretty crazy..." Georgia grunted.

They went left twice, right, left, right twice...

"Pretty creepy too..." Samantha chuffed, sticking her tongue out at the big fat spider sliding down a web.

She turned around, seeing no one.

"W-Wait... Georgia...?" She called out.

Silence.

"Georgia! Come on... this isn't funny...!" Samantha snarled.

Silence.

"I am straight up going to count to one!!"

Silence.

"Three!"

Silence.

"Two!"

Silence.

"ONE..." Came another voice entirely.

Speaking right above Samantha's head.

"AAAAAIIIIEEEEE!!!!" The wolfess screamed and darted in a random direction!
155343112.title: Silver Lakes, Bubblegloop ho...

choices: She doesn't trust the stranger, having faith Georgia will find her...
She agrees!
1553431122.content:
Samantha screamed as she ran to the right, then came to a dead end, biting her lip in horror...

She heard thunderous footsteps approaching... but that wasn't what had caught her attention.

The fact that she was up to her knees in gooey, glossy black tar was of much more interest to her...!

"Ewww...!" She groaned, looking around for anything to grab onto... and finding nothing!

She felt it creep up around her thighs next...

The footsteps came to a head and she looked up, seeing a dark figure standing in front of her, where it's safe...

"Well... aren't you in a little predicament?" The stranger chortled. "Isn't that a fancy outfit..."

"Y-Yes it is... now PLEASE get me out of this!!" Samantha squeaked.

"Hah... well, I can help with that..." The stranger churred.

"Wait... can I trust you...?" Samantha asked, frowning.

"Do you have any choice?"

Well, does she?
1553431122.title: That sinking feeling...

15534311222.content:
Samantha let out a sigh. "I trust you..." She breathed.

A huge hand suddenly clamped around her head, the other tugging at the collar of her time suit while lifting up...!

Samantha yelped as she was lifted straight out of the blue time suit and lowered right back into the tar!!

"Heh heh, moron." The figure snickered, plucking her suit from the tar and walking off...

"HEY!!! YOU CAN'T LEAVE ME HERE LIKE THIS!!" Samantha screamed.

"I'll tell the mistress that she's got fresh bones for her spell..."

"What?! What does that mean?!" Samantha shrieked angrily as she continued to sink into the stinking mire, up her hips next! Then her belly, her breasts, her arms...

Only her head remained above the goop and she kept whispering and begging and pleading, hoping Georgia would come around the corner.... but she never did...

"D-Damn you, Texas...!" She whimpered before her head went under...

The dead end, now very literally so, became quiet, save for the soft PLIPs of a few bubbles surging from the tar's latest victim.


Two weeks later...


Texas sat in her office, whittling a piece of wood. It was early evening and a chill was in the air. She tugged her coat around herself, frowning as she had a look around her office, seeing shadows dancing in the corner of her eye. She'd sent April home earlier.

She stepped onto the front porch wandered around the perimeter of the office and came back to the front. She was about to lock up when she looked down then frowned, seeing a trail of gooey black substance leading inside her office.

Texas drew her gun, walking in, looking around more carefully...

She went back to her desk to find another handful of bullets, when a skeletal hand coated in tar grabbed her wrist!

"Teeeeexaaaaas...!" Came a horrible, empty, hissing voice.

Texas' blood ran cold as she looked up into a pair of glowing golden eyes staring from empty sockets in a wolf skull, also covered in tar.

"Youuuuu let meeee go ooooff with that idioooot.... nooooow loooook aaaat meeeee!!!!" The voodoo-animated skeleton of the time traveler hissed at Texas, who screamed in utter horror...

"Moooolly waaaaaantsssss to seeeee youuuuuu..... Buuuuut nooooot beeeefooooore I taaaaake myyyyy CUT!"

Texas was never seen again...

With Georgia and Texas gone, April became Sheriff and maintained law and order from that day out, bringing in many criminals to justice, but always wondering what ever became of her partner...
15534311222.title: Why does everyone take me literally?!

choices: Help Molly.
Decline and explain.
Try to steal her time machine back.
1553431123.content:
Samantha slammed into something soft, squishy and smelly...

"HEY!" Georgia hollered, then reached around, grabbing Samantha. "Oh... it's just you. Where the hell'd you get off to?"

Samantha let out a sigh. "I think this maze may be haunted..."

"That's puttin' it generously!" The mare snorted. "At least we're here... let's get this over with."

She knocked on the door of the sunken shack, the sound of crickets audible around them.

"Come awwwwn in!" A gravy-thick https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cajun_English
Cajun
-a ccented voice called from inside.

Georgia walked in, clearing her throat. "Hey Molly. Got someone here who wanted to find ya'."

"Mmmm.... a real cutie pie you dragged in, mon ami..." Came a sultry swoon from what Samantha could only describe as a walking, glossy black mountain of nearly naked blubber.

The gigantic, fat black rat wore a perfectly kept silk top hat on her head, a tarot card tucked in the band. The Emperor. Her figure is clad in a minuscule loincloth and breastwrap.

Samantha gulped as she waddled up to her, taking her muzzle in her hand. "Mmm... you're not from these parts, are you m'child? You're from further away than anyone in this little town realizes!" She exclaimed.

"Y-Yes ma'am..." Samantha said. "I'm t-trying to find something. It's a green box with an elastic strap and lots of blinking lights..."

"Oooh... it's a powerful thing inDEED! Heeheee... but you're it's rightful owner, aren't you?" She cooed as she stroked under Samantha's chin.

The wolfess' face reddened as Molly carried on... "M-May I have it back, please...?"

"I mean to use it, but I haven't the foggiest idea how... Won't you be a dear sweet thing and help me? I'd show my appreciation in more ways than one..." She whispers as she leans her ten foot tall bulk down, lips inches from Samantha's, eyes boring right into the time traveler's...

Samantha's heart skipped a beat as she tackled with what to do...

It was against T.E.A. policy to take anyone along on a time travel excursion... but it's certainly an option.

She could decline and try to explain what's wrong with such a task.

Or she could try snatching the time machine off of Molly and using it immediately...
1553431123.title: Molly's Shack

choices: "I'm willing to take that chance, now show me how to use it!"
"You may have a point, but I can use to give me an edge in the present!"
"If I give this back, you need to do me a favor, girl..."
15534311232.content:
"Okay... where to begin...?" Samantha groans. "So... if you go back in time to stop Texas from being born or whatever, you STOP the reason you'd go back in the first place. If Texas isn't born, I don't make the choices I have and don't even wind up here to help you. So the timeline gets ruined and we all cease to exist." Samantha explains.

Molly rubs her doughy chin, weighing her options.
15534311232.title: You'll make a time paradox!

choices: I saw your heartthrob, Roxie, with something like that, headed to her hideout.
Create a villain or start another story?
Create a villain or start another story?
1553432.content:
Or, instead of this story path, would you like to create a different villain or start another story?

(Edited by SquashedFlat)
1553432.title: Brief Interlude

choices: set sail to the island
Texas in quest of the infinte power
15534322.content:
story one: It has come into the hands of Mayor Vivian, a mysterious map to a dangerous island in which there are so many great treasures, but many of minor subordinates have fled, so Vivian comes up with an idea to kill two birds with one stone and decides to "convince" Texas and April to accompany her on this journey


story two :a extraterrestrial being like a purple wingless dragoness, has arrived to Gold Springs Looking for six mysterious gems and they give whoever finds them and manages to tame their power, they will be granted a power beyond their dreams, now Texas and April will not only have to stop this crazy titanide but prevent the other enemies of the duo from achieving get this power coast to coast because if they fail they will become toys for the rest of eternity for the winner
15534322.title: ! some crazy ideas ¡

choices: "Thank you, Deputy, but I'll go with Texas and see what I can find."
"S-Sure, Deputy... I'll do what you want. This is really important."
1553433.content:
Samantha gulped, gold eyes wide in alarm. "H-Hey... that's nuts..!"

Georgia chuckled. "I overheard ya' since ya' talk louder'n a lowin' cow... and some o' the things you were caterwauling about gave me some solid gold ideas."

Texas took Samantha's arm, tugging her towards the door. "Come on, sug'. We don't have to listen to this horse-dung."

Samantha stood her ground. "Suppose I agree... You promise you'll help me find my box?"

Georgia slipped out of her stool, adjusting her pants. She decided that this newcomer would make a delicious distraction away from her plot to overthrow Texas and set herself up as Sheriff. She stomped up to Samantha, tilting her chin upwards to look at her over the horizon of her gut and bust. "Cross my heart'n hope to fart."

Samantha bit her lip, looking at Texas, who could only offer a helpless shrug.

She turned back to Georgia...
1553433.title: Samantha's choice

choices: "We can ask at the mayor's office if anyone's mentioned seeing your doo-hickey."
"Let's go find my GOOD deputy. She can help us."
"Let's check out Roxie's hideout. That bandit's bound to have seen it!"
15534331.content:
Texas breathed a sigh of relief as they stepped out onto the street again. "Glad ya' chose to put that good fer' nothin' deputy of mine to the wind. She's got her uses, but I wouldn't trust her any further than I can toss her blubbery ass."

Samantha smiled, relieved to be out of the seedy saloon too. The way the horse was looking at her reminded her of the way that brontosaurus chief looked at her...

'Me squash furry bug."

She shuddered at the memories.

"So where do we go from here?" The time traveler asked.

"Well..." Texas thought aloud.
15534331.title: Looking for leads.

choices: "I remember seeing something like that in the old cannery."
"Voodoo Mama Molly said she found something interesting this morning..."
"I think I might have seen it..."
155343312.content:
April glanced up as her boss came back in.... accompanied by a mysterious looking wolf woman in a skintight blue bodysuit, a badge resting upon her breast.

What the heck is the T.E.A....?

"Hey April... I dun suppose you've seen a green time mach-" Texas began.

"HSST! Ixnay on the imetay achinemay!" Samantha snipped.

April slowly looked at the raven-haired wolf, then back to Texas. "Uhh..."

"It's a green box! With flashy-blinky lights. Have you seen it...?" Samantha asked.

"Well... now that you mention it..." April trailed off.
155343312.title: All the good in Golden Springs in one office

choices: "... over at the mill I think!"
"... on Roxxie's saddlebag this morning when she fled that attempted rustle!"
"... maybe.... huuuuuuuh......."
1553433123.content:
"Well...?" Samantha urged, eyes wide.

The suspense was killing her.

Texas couldn't help but draw amusement from the time traveler's frustration...

"Ease up, alright? It was..." April trailed off again.
1553433123.title: "I think I might have seen it..."

choices: "It's definetely at Cleo's boutique! I saw her making a brooch with it!"
"Heh, it's right here, actually! Good Samaritan turned it in this morning!"
"Uhhhhhh....."
15534331233.content:
"OKAY, NOW YOU'RE JUST TORTURING ME!" Samantha yowled.

"Keep rackin' that big city brain, deputy..." Texas laughed.

April smirked, speaking slow again...
15534331233.title: "... maybe.... huuuuuuuh......."

choices: April is kidnapped! Are Texas and Samantha bad enough babes to rescue her?
One point twenty one gigawatts?!?!
Sam and Tex's Excellent Adventure? Or their Bogus Journey?
155343312332.content:
Samantha's jaw gaped. She beamed happily. "Oh thank God!!! I was worried sick I'd have to look for it all over creation! No bellyflpping stegosaurs! No bubble-blowing T-Rexes! No curb-stomping brontos! No FREAKING VOLCANO!!!"

Texas and April exchanged glances, both women shrugging, understanding about a third of the time traveler's babbling.

Samantha reached out for it, striding towards April, eyes glistening with tears of relief and joy...

Suddenly...!!!

Option1:
The door bursts open as Roxxie's ass engulfs April (And the time machine) and a monster fart sends Texas and Samantha reeling back into the closet!

Option 2:
Samantha finds, to her horror, that the time machine isn't working!

Option 3:
Samantha activates the time machine, opens the portal and in her unnecessarily long farewell, doesn't see it coming when Roxxie bursts through the door, causing all four of them to travel to the distant future of 30XX!
155343312332.title: Too good to be true

choices: "My crack needs the attention only a loudmouth like you can fix..."
"Let's give this saloon a nice new gray carpet!"
"Wonder what flavor gum you'll be?"
15534332.content:
Georgia smirked, strolling in a predatory circle around the wolfess, shoving Tex aside. The weasel scowled at her, but didn't retaliate.

"Let's see what'cha got under the blue..." Georgia giggled.

"Y-You're not serious...! We're in public..." Samantha whimpered, looking around at the outlaws who watched the proceedings with much interest and mocking laughter.

"Shuck it, tenderfoot. Or I will..." Georgia rumbled.

Samantha meekly unzipped the front of her suit, stepping out of it after peeling it off. Without it, she'd be unable to jump back if the worst should happen.

And the worst was yet to come!

Georgia giggled. "Those things ya' said... Usin' ya like buttfloss would be great since I work harder than any other lawlady in town and I work up a real sweat down there..."

Samantha whimpered, eyes wide.

Texas snorted. "Drink harder'n anyone else, maybe."

"Shut up." Georgia retorted, picking up Texas and stuffing her into a barrel.

"Next possibility, I could jump on you and see how far I can spread your pretty ass across the floor of the saloon..." The fat mare chortled.

The time traveler squirmed as the deputy groped her ass. "Mrrmph..!"

"Or I could squash ya', wad ya' up and make bubblegum outta ya'! Need to work out the ol' jaw muscles. Hope ya' don't mind the ol' halitosis!"

Samantha shuddered.

Texas popped out of the barrel. "You don't have to do any of it! I'll help ya' find the tootin' thing!"

Georgia rolled her eyes and grabbed the nearby spittoon, turning it upside down and smooshing it over Texas with the kind of slimy, wet squish that only a week's worth of bandit snot and gooey tobacco could produce, compacting the weasel into the metal bowl until all that stuck out was Texas' squirming booty.

"Now... what shall we do with you?" Georgia chuckled, kicking the booty-overflowing spittoon back to the barside with a metallic THWING.
15534332.title: Georgia has fun with Samantha

choices: Samantha manages to dodge the incoming buttslam, snatches Texas up and runs out
Samantha dodges the attack and manages to grab her time suit before leaving
Samantha stands there in indecision and gets hit by the mare's butt
155343321.content:
"Whaddaya say, greybutt? Let's see how ya' like a little back and forth t'wixt my legs!" Georgia chortled.

And since ya' did such a good job, I'mma tell ya' what I saw... Roxxie Roo was yakkin' about some green box she found this mornin'. It made hummin' noises and blinked a lot."

15534332132.title: Samantha is bewildered...

155343321321.content:
"What the hell are you saying....?" Texas asked her, frowning with concern.

"Sh-She said I was the best... a-and.... I was actually useful... and I got it done... r-really well... and it was so warm and slippery in there..." Samantha whispered.

Texas bit her lip. She wished she could say it was crazy talk, but she had felt the same urges too. But she'd built up a resistance to those feelings due to all the incidents involving her getting smooshed.

"You're sure you want to do this? I'll back you up either way, sugar..." Texas swore.

The wolfess smiled weakly, leaning in to kiss Texas' cheek. "You gave me your best shot, sheriff... thanks for that. I'll never forget you."

Texas touched her cheek, face red as she watched the time traveler return to the saloon.

Samantha went back into the bar, dropping her time suit outside, letting the shiny blue garment get carried away by the wind. She stood in front of Georgia, who raised an eyebrow.

"Lose somethin', assfloss? Excepting you dignity?" The mare chuckled.

"Y-Y-You said you'd take me back in a heartbeat... y-yes...?" The wolfess whimpered.

A wide, cruel grin creased Georgia's flabby face. "I did mention that, didn't I?"

"Th-That I'm the best you've ever had...?" The wolfess whispered.

"Damn straight, Buttfloss. I'mma just call you that from now on."

Samantha smiled weakly.

Her psyche was shattered and her will completely broken. She knew the T.E.A. counselor would say she's got Stockholm syndrome to the worst degree... but she was past caring.

"W-W-Will you t-take me back...?"

The bar's chatter halted as they listened in.

Anna chuckled. "Oh, now this is precious..."

Georgia smirked, kneeling and scratched under Samantha's chin. "Good Buttfloss! You know your place! Nothin' sexier than an officer of the law that turns a new leaf, eh Annabelle?"

"And how, deputy." Anna giggled.

Samantha laid on the floor, managing a timid smile up at the one who now dominated her every thought.

"W-Well come on... your crack won't clean itself, will it?" Buttfloss murmured.

Georgia grinned proudly. "Right you are." She dropped her pants, then slammed into Samantha, squashing her flat, repeating the process of feeding her through the sausage press (Annabelle decided she'd be cleaning the hell out of it afterwards though) and soon returned Samantha to a long, ropey figure, then looped her under her leg. "Ready, Buttfloss?"

"Mmm-hrmmm...!" Buttfloss eagerly replied, then allowed herself to give up everything, moaning as she sunk up into those beautiful, sweat-drenched, gooey thighs and asscrack, feeling herself pulled back and forth, cleaning her owner where the sun don't shine...

In the year 30XX...

"As you can see, class, Samantha Simmons' first failure back in prehistoric times marked her with a streak of misfortune that followed her all the way to her end as a time traveler." The wide-bootied weasel professor explained. "My ancestor did everything in her power to talk her out of it, but when the psyche is broken, without help from a T.E.A. counselor, poor Samantha's whole universe had become that deputy's buttcrack. Georgia kept using her and even washed her so she could reuse her, forever."

The weasel closed the holographic slideshow. "So remember students... don't make the same mistakes Agent Simmons did, or you too may wind up becoming arsefloss for life!"

One of the students shrugged. "Well, at least she was happy being buttfloss, right?"

Professor Stanton shrugged. "I do give you that... We should all be so lucky."

Texas sighed, head tilting back up. "The worst of my Rogue's Gallery. A real troublemaker. Robber, thief, highwaywoman and so on. I'll have to pull out all the stops... worse, she rides a deadly whale of a horse. Either one is a handful .Together they're a damn nightmare."

Samantha grinned, leaning forward a bit, but drew back... "Oh Texas... I am so sorry.... I'd be breaking about a million temporal policies if I... if we..."

She wasn't...

She then flung herself, backside first, towards the ladies in the tub!

Texas panted, eyes wide as she saw dozens of Roxxie's gang coming out of the woodwork around town, giving chase!

"The... two o-clock... mail carriage...! It's... our only... chance...!!" The vixen wheezed.

"I'M GONNA MASH YOU INTO PASTE! I'M GONNA LINE MY CRAPPER WITH YOU! I'M GONNA MAKE YOUR LIFE HEEEELL, TEXAS STANTON!!!" They heard bellowed like a beast behind them.

They ran up the gangplank at the railroad station, past the station mistress, a cat in a blue uniform. "I say! Stop right there! You need-" That was the last thing to leave her mouth as the horde of gangsters trampled her flat!

April dove onto the back of the caboose as it began to roll out of the station, pulled by the engine ahead!

Samantha grabbed onto the rail, fueled by adrenaline, hauling herself over the barrier.

Texas ran alongside, catching up, grabbing the safety railing on the back of the caboose..... just as Georgia grabbed her foot!

"YOU'RE GONNA DIE, TEXAS STANTON! I'M GONNA CRUSH YOU INTO DUST!!!!" The deranged mare bellowed...!!!

Texas whimpered, gripping the rail with both hands, her body starting to stretch and Georgia slowed down and the train sped up!

*Creeeeeeeeeak!!!!*

Texas' eyes widened, her body stretching like a rubber band! "AAAAAHHH!!!! Let go of me, you varmint!!!"

"HAHAHAHAHA!!!! NOW.... NOW YOU WON'T GET AWAY!!!"

155343321322221.content:
Texas felt Georgia's grip release, sending the weasel snapping like a whip, smacking into the back of the caboose, right on the door, sliding down before she popped back to normal, panting.

Georgia dropped to her knees, arms thrust to the sky!

The most bloodcurdling sound all three women had ever heard erupted forth...

"NOOOOOOOOOOOoooooooooooooOOOOOOOOOOoooooOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAUGH!!!! !!!!!!!!"

Texas slumped against the wall, chest heaving as April sat beside her. Samantha followed suit, all just panting hard, catching their breath...

It was the sheriff that broke the silence after what felt like an eternity, though by then, Georgia's tireless bellow could still be heard behind them, even as she faded into a speck.

"Yeehaw..."

Samantha looked at her in surprise. "Huh...?"

April chuckled softly, shaking her head.

"Five years I've been tryin' to bag that varmint, Roxxie. Then my former Deputy goes and squashes her by accident. How do ya' like that? Accidentally doing the job she was supposed to do." Texas exclaimed, grabbing her hat from the crumbled pile of clothes, putting it back on her head and slumping against the door.

... which swung open, causing her head to THONK against the floor of the caboose.

"Can I assist you ladies in some way...?" Asked the caboose guard, a trim wolf man with voluminous blonde hair and ocean blue eyes, fur gray and gold.

Texas held up her badge after fishing it from her clothes pile. "Texas Stanton, Golden Springs Sheriff. We need a ride to the next town over. Get us a posse organized."

"Ah. Well then... might I suggest you take shelter in the caboose? It's evening, you're all wet and the desert gets quite cold at night." The wolf said, welcoming them all in.

A stove was burning warmly, a kettle resting on top of it.

"Coffee...?" Texas asked hopefully.

"Tea. But you're welcome to it." The guard said.

Samantha sat on a bench, dressing in her time suit again, taking a deep breath, hugging her knees to her chest.

April collapsed onto one of the bench-beds, putting her hat over her face while Texas poured herself a cup of tea.

"It's nine hours until the next town. I suggest you all get some rest. You look like you've had quite a day." The wolf gently suggested.

Texas was the only one on her feet still after dressing. "Soon as the adrenaline dies down, partner. Till then, I've half a mind that Georgia will come exploding through that back door and make good on those promises..."

Eventually, they were able to calm down and close their eyes, comforted by the kindly guard who kept watch over them as they slept.

When Samantha awoke, she saw Texas at the small writing desk and saw the legs of the guard, sitting in the elevated watch post. The sun was just starting to rise and as she watched the first rays bathe Texas in their glow, her heart skipped a beat.

'Beautiful... strong... amazing...'

And strictly forbidden by the T.E.A. Agent's code of conduct.

It was too risky, besides. In 30XX, Samantha's society was relaxed, open, accepting of many ways of life. Back in this era... what were the odds Texas would be receptive to any gestures?

Was the look on her face, in the bath house, just due to the awkwardness?

Or was it something more?

choices: Samantha escapes the tub while Texas is squished into it!
Texas vaults from the tub as Samantha is crushed inward!
Roxxie misses the tub entirely...?!
1553433213223.content:
"LOOK OUT!" Tex screamed, bolting upright!

Samantha scrambled up as well!

Who manages to escape...?
1553433213223.title: Something else entirely happens!

choices: Georgia swallows her gum
Georgia sticks the wad of Samantha under her boot
Georgia goes to a friend, still chewing on the wolf
155343323.content:
Samantha took a step back, horrified by the mare's words. But Georgia wasn't one to tease her victims. She was a mare of action. With a broad smirk she reached for the puny wolf. Samantha dodged back, but her tail wasn't quick enough to follow. The mare's iron grip locked around it and she dragged the whimpering wolf close.

"Ain't many of your kind 'round these parts, le's see if it's because o yer taste."

First things first though, she'd need to squash this wolf into a more malleable form to fit her inside those big jaws. The mare flashed a cruel grin and held Samantha close to her enormous thighs. She shuffled them back and forth, pushing the twitching wolf tail between them.

Samantha panicked, feeling the monstrous thighs squeeze her tail flat. Worse yet, they were pulling the rest of her into their smothering embrace. Georgia was impatient though, gleefullly helping out by putting a big hand on Samantha's gut and pushing her in.

"Someone help me!" She cried out, but the biggest reaction from the bar was some distant laughter. Nobody was stupid enough to get between the mare and her playthings. Texas tried to say something, maybe an 'I told you so', but her current predicament left those words as indecipherable mumbling.

The powerful thighs effortlessly squished her into a thick grey paste, her lower body feeling numb. Georgia put a hand on Samantha's head and pushed the rest of her between those crushing walls of muscle and fat too. Finally the mare parted her legs, picking up the ball of Samantha, now looking more like a lump of clay with eyes. It was time for the good part. Georgia licked her chops and opened her maw wide. A wave of rancid horse breath washed over the wolf. Those halitosis comments were and understatement and then some. The unfortunate wolf wondered briefly how she was even able to smell anything in this form, but the mare soon gave her far worse things to worry about.

The mare chomped down on her new piece of gum, the gooey wolf sticking to her teeth. She loudly chewed away at it, her tongue slathering whatever parts of Samantha it could reach in slimy, pungent drool. The wolfess felt nothing but a dull ache resonating throughout her body. This wasn't the first time she'd ended up in the jaws of some foul creature. But usually intelligent lifeforms abstained from these acts. Then again, was this mare really all that 'intelligent'? More concerning was that without her suit, she had no way of escaping this torment. And Georgia's comments did little to ease her mind.

"Hmmm... You'sh real tashty, y' know thah?" The bar crowd laughed aloud.

The mare kept chewing, infusing the wolf with the stench of horse spit and her gross horse breath. Her dull teeth squeezed and chomped the amorphous ball of grey paste, preventing any shot at reforming back into her normal shape. The taste was great, but as with any gum it started to fade after a few minutes. The mare frowned a bit, annoyed that her gum was already losing its unique flavour. The wild chomping had left Samantha completely disoriented. She couldn't tell up from down any more, completely at the horse's mercy.
155343323.title: "Wonder what flavor gum you'll be?"

choices: Texas' foot impacts with the massive mare's doughy middle...
Georgia snags Texas' foot, shucks her outfit and wads her up too...
1553433231.content:
Georgia wadded up Samantha in her mouth and blew a bubble with her, causing a big, shiny and smooth, light and dark gray balloon to blossom forth, the poor wolf's face widened out and spread, eyes blinking helplessly as she's made into a six foot wide bubble...

Samantha whimpered, feeling Georgia suck the air out of her, causing her to deflate into a limp wad before being drawn back into the mare's mouth.

"Alright, Georgia, you've had yer' fun with that poor id'jit... now spit her out!" Texas snarled.

Georgia huffed. "Awww c'mon now, Sheriff... you're no fun. I'll just give her a few more-*GULP!*-BLEH!"

Texas' eyes widened. "What... in tarnation... did'ja do...?!"

Samantha felt herself being drawn down by powerful, wet muscles, pulling her from the mare's gooey mouth and down... down, her mushy, mashed up form plopping into Georgia's stomach!

Without her time suit, this was a one-way ticket...

Texas heard whimpering from Georgia's rumbling gut...

"Heh... oops." The mare chuckled. "Hey, what's some idiot out-of-towner, anyway?"

Texas growled... "An innocent..."

Georgia guffawed, slapping her thigh. "Innocent?! Haw! D'you even listen to yerself?!"

Texas let out a hoot and launcher herself at the mare, aiming to kick her hard enough in the gut that she's hopefully evacuate the time traveler...

If she messes up though, Georgia is sure to capitalize on her mistake, strip her and make a new wad of gum...
1553433231.title: Down the hatch...

choices: Georgia shrugs it off, now she's angry.
Georgia holds down the wolf, but she needs a minute.
Out comes Samantha
15534332311.content: Georgia's tall frame didn't make her a very evasive opponent and the weasel's foot lands square in the middle of that large belly. The mare produced a loud "oof", but was Texas' flying kick enough?
15534332311.title: Texas' foot impacts with the massive mare's gut

choices: The mare reunites Texas and Samantha with a loud gulp
Georgia gets back to drinking, chewing her new gum
Georgia goes somewhere else with her new gum
155343323111.content:
The mare takes a single step back before straightening herself out. The rebound threw the weasel back onto the ground. Georgia acted quick, stomping towards the sheriff and looming over her ominously.

"Y' always gotta butt in when I'm havin my fun?! I've had it up to here with you, Tex. Ah reckon it's high damn time someone oughta show you your place!" She shouted. Her temper was short by nature, and the booze wasn't helping one bit here. She picked Texas up from the floor and returned the favor by delivering a haymaker to her gut. The weasel wheezed loudly as she felt her body turn malleable from the heavy impact.

Before the weasel could grab her gun the mare tore off Texas' belt, throwing it aside. The rest of the sheriff's outfit was turned to scraps of cloth and leather in Georgia's strong hands. As more and more was revealed the other patrons in the bar hollered and whistled, making the weasel blush. But her attention was set squarely on the irate horse woman. Soon she had the weasel naked and she started to stretch her.

The sheriff's elasticity was put to the test, the mare pulling her and squeezing her back together in a weasel-colored wad. Soon the mare was satisfied with her efforts, bring the balled up Texas to eye level. Her body was reduced to a brownish wad with two frightened eyes staring down the mare's yawning gullet.

"Since ya made me swallow me last piece 'o gum, how's about you take its place!" The mare crowed loudly. Her breath made the weasel's eyes water with its horrifying stench. The alcohol in it burned the sheriff's non-existent nose. Georgia opened wide and stuffed her new gum into her large maw. She chomped down hard, chewing the taffy-like body of Texas and getting her stuck to her grime-ridden teeth. The weasel felt sick, both from the foul smells around her and the constant disorientation from being chewed on.
155343323111.title: Georgia shrugs it off, now she's angry.

choices: The lucky charm that old native chief brave glows...!
*tummy rumbling noises*
1553433231111.content:
Georgia blew an enormous bubble with Tex, letting the bar witness her enormity before popping and taking her in again...

Texas let out horrified whines and whimpers inside the smelly mouth of the smelly mare, eharing someone say something outside, but not able to hear much of it. Apparently it made the mare laugh so hard she accidentally swallowed the weasel-flavored gum!

Texas felt wet cilia guide her downward through a noxious tunnel of flesh...

... and with a splat, she emerged into the mare's stomach, her gooey body smooshing against Samantha's. Their eyes regarded eachother in the murky stomach, both letting out frightened whines!

Georgia laughed, shaking her head >"Well.... guess the Sheriff and her idiot friend are chow now! Who wants to place bets on the size of the dump I'm gonna have to take after these two are finished?"

Texas and Samantha heard muffled cheers, both whining as they begin to melt and meld together....

What happened next...? What COULD indeed happen? They're pretty much one person now, fused together. Would the lucky charm Texas got years back begin to shine and make way for a wolf-weasel aiming to take revenge...?

.... or will the pair, more likely, just digest, as food for their superior?
1553433231111.title: SPLAT!

15534332311112.content:
"A round for everyone, on the house!" Annabelle, the owner of the saloon, hollered out to a chorus of loud cheers.

"To Georgia, for finally ridding us of that no-fun sheriff Texas!" Many a glass was raised and the inebriated mare gladly joined them. She needed a drink to settle her stomach after swallowing those two scrawny pests. It rumbled and roiled loudly, working away at the mare's substantial latest meal.

Inside that big gut the wolf and the weasel struggled to keep together. They'd been fused together into a singular puddle of squashed goop, but that was far from their biggest concern. From the fringes of their being they could feel themselves merging with Georgia's foul stomach juices too. It became increasingly difficult to tell where they ended and the stomach started. All they could do was whine uselessly as they fought to keep some level of consciousness. Finally everything turned black.

Three beers later the massive mare clutched her belly. "Ah got some business 't tend to..." She announced. Annabelle immediately directed her to the outhouse, the mare quickly making her way there.

The outhouse was basic, Georgia barely fitting in and making the simple wooden seat creak. Below was a deep pit, half-filled already. The mare sat down and grit her teeth. "Alright Tex, ye get 't be a pain in ma rear one last time." She grumbled to herself as she began to push. Her unwashed rear widened and the first of many thick horse apples plopped out. It took a considerable amount of time for the mare to finish, her big gut rumbling with satisfaction and a refreshed hunger. Georgia pulled her pants back up and looked at her handiwork. Amidst the pungent heap she could barely identify some tufts of grey and brown fur. With a satisfied smirk she patted her belly, pleased to see it deliver such fine work.

Samantha's time travel device remained lost and her story was nearly forgotten, save for a few embarrassing details that were recorded before her suit went haywire. She served as a cautionary tale for all time travelers to keep a safe distance with the locals of their time periods. Who knows what acts of gluttonous barbarism they were into back then?

Texas' legacy as the sheriff of Gold Springs was swiftly erased when the mayor assigned Georgia to be the new sheriff. Every ounce of justice and honesty was removed in favor of the violent mare's preferred method of lawgiving: bribes and corruption. She used her power to punish whoever she saw fit, keeping an iron grip on the town. Any out-of-towner coming to visit quickly learned to supplement their monetary bribe with food, lest the mare decide to relive that glorious moment that propelled her into this position one more time.
15534332311112.title: *tummy rumbling noises*

info.brief_description: Follow Sheriff Texas as she tries to take back her town! Or get squashed in the process.
info.description:
Gold Springs is a town of anthro animals in the middle of the wild west. Once a profitable goldmining town, it has fallen to corruption and banditry. Follow the adventures of the town's sheriff, Texas, as she and her deputy April try to bring back law and order to Gold Springs, fighting fat and smelly villains who want nothing more than to squash and gas our heroes into paste. This is a fetish story, and while it will mostly be focused on themes such as squashing, flattening, gassing and some scat, really all fetishes are welcome here. However, if those fetishes offend you, do not read this interactive.

Character Bios:

Texas Stanton: The weasel sheriff of Gold Springs. Texas is one of the last forces for law and order in town, and fights relentlessly against criminals and corrupt officials, trying to restore the town to it's former glory.
(http://squashedflat.deviantart.com/art/Texas-Reference-566137052)

April Briggs: Texas's loyal deputy and friend who was sent from the big city so that she could prove herself in a tough environment. Unfortunately the environment proved far, far tougher than she imagined.
(http://goopitygahpghee.deviantart.com/art/April-Briggs-571279404)

Roxxie Roo: Bandit, outlaw and all-round bad girl, Roxxie is Texas's biggest (literally and figuratively) rival, having clashed many times in the past. The only thing Roxxie loves more than money is squashing Texas.
(http://goopitygahpghee.deviantart.com/art/Hot-summer-days-581306025)

Smiling Jacks: A cattle rustler and occasional bandit, Smiling Jacks is the leader of the Red Hand bandit gang, who Texas has run afoul of many a time. Smiling Jacks herself is a cheerful and happy-go-lucky young rabbit who enjoys robbing banks, stealing livestock and having said livestock sit on top of Texas.

Mayor Vivian: The mayor of Gold Springs, Vivian is a sly, cultured lynx who has big plans for the town, as soon as she has the sheriff out of the picture. Vivian is loathe to get her hands dirty herself, but luckily she has a gang of thugs for that sort of thing.

Georgia: Texas's old deputy, who was fired when she started taking bribes. The massive mare now as Vivian's right hand man, and has been promised the position as the town's sheriff once Texas is out of the picture.
(http://www.furaffinity.net/view/18399092/)

Well, that's everything! Feel free to add, create your own villains, whatever you like! Ending the story is also completely acceptable, as having 'bad ends' for Texas can be some great fetish fuel.

Enjoy!
